log/fortiguard/override-setting (object)

Override global FortiCloud logging settings for this VDOM.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/log/fortiguard/override-setting
Attribute ListDescriptions
max-log-rateunsigned int32
FortiCloud maximum log rate in MBps (0 = unlimited).
overrideoption
Overriding FortiCloud settings for this VDOM or use global settings.
"disable"Use global FortiCloud logging settings.
"enable"Override FortiCloud logging settings.
priorityoption
Set log transmission priority.
"low"Set FortiCloud log transmission priority to low.
"default"Set FortiCloud log transmission priority to default.
statusoption
Enable/disable logging to FortiCloud.
"disable"Disable logging to FortiCloud.
"enable"Enable logging to FortiCloud.
upload-daystring
Day of week to roll logs.
upload-intervaloption
Frequency of uploading log files to FortiCloud.
"daily"Upload log files to FortiCloud once a day.
"weekly"Upload log files to FortiCloud once a week.
"monthly"Upload log files to FortiCloud once a month.
upload-optionoption
Configure how log messages are sent to FortiCloud.
"store-and-upload"Log to the hard disk and then upload logs to FortiCloud.
"realtime"Log directly to FortiCloud in real time.
"1-minute"Log directly to FortiCloud at 1-minute intervals.
"5-minute"Log directly to FortiCloud at 5-minute intervals.
upload-timestring
Time of day to roll logs (hh:mm).

 

log/fortiguard/setting (object)

Configure logging to FortiCloud.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/log/fortiguard/setting
Attribute ListDescriptions
conn-timeoutunsigned int32
FortiGate Cloud connection timeout in seconds.
enc-algorithmoption
Configure the level of SSL protection for secure communication with FortiCloud.
"high"Encrypt logs using high encryption.
"low"Encrypt logs using low encryption.
"high-medium"Encrypt logs using high and medium encryption.
interfacedatasource, refer to system interface (maximum 1)
Specify outgoing interface to reach server.
interface-select-methodoption
Specify how to select outgoing interface to reach server.
"auto"Set outgoing interface automatically.
"sdwan"Set outgoing interface by SD-WAN or policy routing rules.
"specify"Set outgoing interface manually.
max-log-rateunsigned int32
FortiCloud maximum log rate in MBps (0 = unlimited).
priorityoption
Set log transmission priority.
"low"Set FortiCloud log transmission priority to low.
"default"Set FortiCloud log transmission priority to default.
source-ipIPv4 address
Source IP address used to connect FortiCloud.
ssl-min-proto-versionoption
Minimum supported protocol version for SSL/TLS connections (default is to follow system global setting).
"default"Follow system global setting.
"TLSv1"TLSv1.
"TLSv1-1"TLSv1.1.
"TLSv1-2"TLSv1.2.
"SSLv3"SSLv3.
statusoption
Enable/disable logging to FortiCloud.
"disable"Disable logging to FortiCloud.
"enable"Enable logging to FortiCloud.
upload-daystring
Day of week to roll logs.
upload-intervaloption
Frequency of uploading log files to FortiCloud.
"daily"Upload log files to FortiCloud once a day.
"weekly"Upload log files to FortiCloud once a week.
"monthly"Upload log files to FortiCloud once a month.
upload-optionoption
Configure how log messages are sent to FortiCloud.
"store-and-upload"Log to the hard disk and then upload logs to FortiCloud.
"realtime"Log directly to FortiCloud in real time.
"1-minute"Log directly to FortiCloud at 1-minute intervals.
"5-minute"Log directly to FortiCloud at 5-minute intervals.
upload-timestring
Time of day to roll logs (hh:mm).

 

log/gui-display (object)

Configure how log messages are displayed on the GUI.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/log/gui-display
Attribute ListDescriptions
fortiview-unscanned-appsoption
Enable/disable showing unscanned traffic in FortiView application charts.
"disable"Disable showing unscanned traffic.
"enable"Enable showing unscanned traffic.
resolve-appsoption
Resolve unknown applications on the GUI using Fortinet's remote application database.
"disable"Disable unknown applications on the GUI.
"enable"Enable unknown applications on the GUI.
resolve-hostsoption
Enable/disable resolving IP addresses to hostname in log messages on the GUI using reverse DNS lookup
"disable"Disable resolving IP addresses to hostnames.
"enable"Enable resolving IP addresses to hostnames.

 

log/memory/filter (object)

Filters for memory buffer.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/log/memory/filter
Attribute ListDescriptions
anomalyoption
Enable/disable anomaly logging.
"disable"Disable anomaly logging.
"enable"Enable anomaly logging.
filterstring
Memory log filter.
filter-typeoption
Include/exclude logs that match the filter.
"include"Include logs that match the filter.
"exclude"Exclude logs that match the filter.
forward-trafficoption
Enable/disable forward traffic logging.
"disable"Disable forward traffic logging.
"enable"Enable forward traffic logging.
gtpoption
Enable/disable GTP messages logging.
"disable"Disable GTP messages logging.
"enable"Enable GTP messages logging.
local-trafficoption
Enable/disable local in or out traffic logging.
"disable"Disable local in or out traffic logging.
"enable"Enable local in or out traffic logging.
multicast-trafficoption
Enable/disable multicast traffic logging.
"disable"Disable multicast traffic logging.
"enable"Enable multicast traffic logging.
severityoption
Log every message above and including this severity level.
"emergency"Emergency level.
"alert"Alert level.
"critical"Critical level.
"error"Error level.
"warning"Warning level.
"notification"Notification level.
"information"Information level.
"debug"Debug level.
sniffer-trafficoption
Enable/disable sniffer traffic logging.
"disable"Disable sniffer traffic logging.
"enable"Enable sniffer traffic logging.
voipoption
Enable/disable VoIP logging.
"disable"Disable VoIP logging.
"enable"Enable VoIP logging.

 

log/memory/global-setting (object)

Global settings for memory logging.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/log/memory/global-setting
Attribute ListDescriptions
full-final-warning-thresholdunsigned int32
Log full final warning threshold as a percent (3 - 100, default = 95).
full-first-warning-thresholdunsigned int32
Log full first warning threshold as a percent (1 - 98, default = 75).
full-second-warning-thresholdunsigned int32
Log full second warning threshold as a percent (2 - 99, default = 90).
max-sizeunsigned int32
Maximum amount of memory that can be used for memory logging in bytes.

 

log/memory/setting (object)

Settings for memory buffer.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/log/memory/setting
Attribute ListDescriptions
diskfulloption
"overwrite"
"blocktraffic"
statusoption
Enable/disable logging to the FortiGate's memory.
"disable"Disable logging to memory.
"enable"Enable logging to memory.

log/null-device/setting (object)

Settings for null device logging.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/log/null-device/setting
Attribute ListDescriptions
statusoption
Enable/disable statistics collection for when no external logging destination, such as FortiAnalyzer, is present (data is not saved).
"disable"Disable statistics collection for when no external logging destination, such as FortiAnalyzer, is present (data is not saved).
"enable"Enable statistics collection for when no external logging destination, such as FortiAnalyzer, is present (data is not saved).

 

log/setting (object)

Configure general log settings.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/log/setting
Attribute ListDescriptions
brief-traffic-formatoption
Enable/disable brief format traffic logging.
"disable"Disable brief format traffic logging.
"enable"Enable brief format traffic logging.
custom-log-fieldsdatasource, refer to log custom-field (maximum 5)
Custom fields to append to all log messages.
daemon-logoption
Enable/disable daemon logging.
"disable"Disable daemon logging.
"enable"Enable daemon logging.
expolicy-implicit-logoption
Enable/disable explicit proxy firewall implicit policy logging.
"disable"Disable explicit proxy firewall implicit policy logging.
"enable"Enable explicit proxy firewall implicit policy logging.
faz-overrideoption
Enable/disable override FortiAnalyzer settings.
"disable"Disable override FortiAnalyzer settings.
"enable"Enable override FortiAnalyzer settings.
fortiview-weekly-dataoption
Enable/disable FortiView weekly data.
"disable"Disable FortiView weekly data.
"enable"Enable FortiView weekly data.
fwpolicy-implicit-logoption
Enable/disable implicit firewall policy logging.
"disable"Disable implicit firewall policy logging.
"enable"Enable implicit firewall policy logging.
fwpolicy6-implicit-logoption
Enable/disable implicit firewall policy6 logging.
"disable"Disable implicit firewall policy6 logging.
"enable"Enable implicit firewall policy6 logging.
local-in-allowoption
Enable/disable local-in-allow logging.
"disable"Disable local-in-allow logging.
"enable"Enable local-in-allow logging.
local-in-deny-broadcastoption
Enable/disable local-in-deny-broadcast logging.
"disable"Disable local-in-deny-broadcast logging.
"enable"Enable local-in-deny-broadcast logging.
local-in-deny-unicastoption
Enable/disable local-in-deny-unicast logging.
"disable"Disable local-in-deny-unicast logging.
"enable"Enable local-in-deny-unicast logging.
local-outoption
Enable/disable local-out logging.
"disable"Disable local-out logging.
"enable"Enable local-out logging.
log-invalid-packetoption
Enable/disable invalid packet traffic logging.
"disable"Disable invalid packet traffic logging.
"enable"Enable invalid packet traffic logging.
log-policy-commentoption
Enable/disable inserting policy comments into traffic logs.
"disable"Disable inserting policy comments into traffic logs.
"enable"Enable inserting policy comments into traffic logs.
log-user-in-upperoption
Enable/disable logs with user-in-upper.
"disable"Disable logs with user-in-upper.
"enable"Enable logs with user-in-upper.
neighbor-eventoption
Enable/disable neighbor event logging.
"disable"Disable neighbor event logging.
"enable"Enable neighbor event logging.
resolve-ipoption
Enable/disable adding resolved domain names to traffic logs if possible.
"disable"Disable adding resolved domain names to traffic logs.
"enable"Enable adding resolved domain names to traffic logs.
resolve-portoption
Enable/disable adding resolved service names to traffic logs.
"disable"Disable adding resolved service names to traffic logs.
"enable"Enable adding resolved service names to traffic logs.
syslog-overrideoption
Enable/disable override Syslog settings.
"disable"Disable override Syslog settings.
"enable"Enable override Syslog settings.
user-anonymizeoption
Enable/disable anonymizing user names in log messages.
"disable"Disable anonymizing user names in log messages.
"enable"Enable anonymizing user names in log messages.

 

log/syslogd/filter (object)

Filters for remote system server.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/log/syslogd/filter
Attribute ListDescriptions
anomalyoption
Enable/disable anomaly logging.
"disable"Disable anomaly logging.
"enable"Enable anomaly logging.
filterstring
Syslog filter.
filter-typeoption
Include/exclude logs that match the filter.
"include"Include logs that match the filter.
"exclude"Exclude logs that match the filter.
forward-trafficoption
Enable/disable forward traffic logging.
"disable"Disable forward traffic logging.
"enable"Enable forward traffic logging.
gtpoption
Enable/disable GTP messages logging.
"disable"Disable GTP messages logging.
"enable"Enable GTP messages logging.
local-trafficoption
Enable/disable local in or out traffic logging.
"disable"Disable local in or out traffic logging.
"enable"Enable local in or out traffic logging.
multicast-trafficoption
Enable/disable multicast traffic logging.
"disable"Disable multicast traffic logging.
"enable"Enable multicast traffic logging.
severityoption
Lowest severity level to log.
"emergency"Emergency level.
"alert"Alert level.
"critical"Critical level.
"error"Error level.
"warning"Warning level.
"notification"Notification level.
"information"Information level.
"debug"Debug level.
sniffer-trafficoption
Enable/disable sniffer traffic logging.
"disable"Disable sniffer traffic logging.
"enable"Enable sniffer traffic logging.
voipoption
Enable/disable VoIP logging.
"disable"Disable VoIP logging.
"enable"Enable VoIP logging.

log/syslogd/override-setting (object)

Override settings for remote syslog server.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/log/syslogd/override-setting
Attribute ListDescriptions
certificatedatasource, refer to certificate local, or vpn certificate local (maximum 1)
Certificate used to communicate with Syslog server.
custom-field-nametable
enc-algorithmoption
Enable/disable reliable syslogging with TLS encryption.
"high"SSL communication with high encryption algorithms.
"low"SSL communication with low encryption algorithms.
"disable"Disable SSL communication.
"high-medium"SSL communication with high and medium encryption algorithms.
facilityoption
Remote syslog facility.
"kernel"Kernel messages.
"user"Random user-level messages.
"mail"Mail system.
"daemon"System daemons.
"auth"Security/authorization messages.
"syslog"Messages generated internally by syslog.
"lpr"Line printer subsystem.
"news"Network news subsystem.
"uucp"Network news subsystem.
"cron"Clock daemon.
"authpriv"Security/authorization messages (private).
"ftp"FTP daemon.
"ntp"NTP daemon.
"audit"Log audit.
"alert"Log alert.
"clock"Clock daemon.
"local0"Reserved for local use.
"local1"Reserved for local use.
"local2"Reserved for local use.
"local3"Reserved for local use.
"local4"Reserved for local use.
"local5"Reserved for local use.
"local6"Reserved for local use.
"local7"Reserved for local use.
formatoption
Log format.
"default"Syslog format.
"csv"CSV (Comma Separated Values) format.
"cef"CEF (Common Event Format) format.
interfacedatasource, refer to system interface (maximum 1)
Specify outgoing interface to reach server.
interface-select-methodoption
Specify how to select outgoing interface to reach server.
"auto"Set outgoing interface automatically.
"sdwan"Set outgoing interface by SD-WAN or policy routing rules.
"specify"Set outgoing interface manually.
max-log-rateunsigned int32
Syslog maximum log rate in MBps (0 = unlimited).
modeoption
Remote syslog logging over UDP/Reliable TCP.
"udp"Enable syslogging over UDP.
"legacy-reliable"Enable legacy reliable syslogging by RFC3195 (Reliable Delivery for Syslog).
"reliable"Enable reliable syslogging by RFC6587 (Transmission of Syslog Messages over TCP).
overrideoption
Enable/disable override syslog settings.
"disable"Do not override syslog settings.
"enable"Override syslog settings.
portunsigned int32
Server listen port.
priorityoption
Set log transmission priority.
"low"Set Syslog transmission priority to low.
"default"Set Syslog transmission priority to default.
serverstring
Address of remote syslog server.
source-ipstring
Source IP address of syslog.
ssl-min-proto-versionoption
Minimum supported protocol version for SSL/TLS connections (default is to follow system global setting).
"default"Follow system global setting.
"TLSv1-1"TLSv1.1.
"TLSv1-2"TLSv1.2.
"SSLv3"SSLv3.
"TLSv1"TLSv1.
statusoption
Enable/disable remote syslog logging.
"disable"Do not log to remote syslog server.
"enable"Log to remote syslog server.

 

log/syslogd/override-setting/custom-field-name (table)

Custom field name for CEF format logging.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/log/syslogd/override-setting/custom-field-name
Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/log/syslogd/override-setting/custom-field-name/<custom-field-name_id>
Attribute ListDescriptions
customstring
Field custom name.
idsequence, master key
Entry ID.
namestring
Field name.

"high"SSL communication with high encryption algorithms.
"low"SSL communication with low encryption algorithms.

"kernel"Kernel messages.

Specify outgoing interface to reach server.

source-ipstring

"TLSv1-1"TLSv1.1.
"TLSv1-2"TLSv1.2.
"SSLv3"SSLv3.
"TLSv1"TLSv1.

Table object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/log/syslogd3/override-setting
Attribute ListDescriptions
certificatedatasource, refer to certificate local, or vpn certificate local (maximum 1)
Certificate used to communicate with Syslog server.
custom-field-nametable
enc-algorithmoption
Enable/disable reliable syslogging with TLS encryption.
"high"SSL communication with high encryption algorithms.
"low"SSL communication with low encryption algorithms.
"disable"Disable SSL communication.
"high-medium"SSL communication with high and medium encryption algorithms.
facilityoption
Remote syslog facility.
"kernel"Kernel messages.
"user"Random user-level messages.
"mail"Mail system.
"daemon"System daemons.
"auth"Security/authorization messages.
"syslog"Messages generated internally by syslog.
"lpr"Line printer subsystem.
"news"Network news subsystem.
"uucp"Network news subsystem.
"cron"Clock daemon.
"authpriv"Security/authorization messages (private).
"ftp"FTP daemon.
"ntp"NTP daemon.
"audit"Log audit.
"alert"Log alert.
"clock"Clock daemon.
"local0"Reserved for local use.
"local1"Reserved for local use.
"local2"Reserved for local use.
"local3"Reserved for local use.
"local4"Reserved for local use.
"local5"Reserved for local use.
"local6"Reserved for local use.
"local7"Reserved for local use.
formatoption
Log format.
"default"Syslog format.
"csv"CSV (Comma Separated Values) format.
"cef"CEF (Common Event Format) format.
interfacedatasource, refer to system interface (maximum 1)
Specify outgoing interface to reach server.
interface-select-methodoption
Specify how to select outgoing interface to reach server.
"auto"Set outgoing interface automatically.
"sdwan"Set outgoing interface by SD-WAN or policy routing rules.
"specify"Set outgoing interface manually.
max-log-rateunsigned int32
Syslog maximum log rate in MBps (0 = unlimited).
modeoption
Remote syslog logging over UDP/Reliable TCP.
"udp"Enable syslogging over UDP.
"legacy-reliable"Enable legacy reliable syslogging by RFC3195 (Reliable Delivery for Syslog).
"reliable"Enable reliable syslogging by RFC6587 (Transmission of Syslog Messages over TCP).
overrideoption
Enable/disable override syslog settings.
"disable"Do not override syslog settings.
"enable"Override syslog settings.
portunsigned int32
Server listen port.
priorityoption
Set log transmission priority.
"low"Set Syslog transmission priority to low.
"default"Set Syslog transmission priority to default.
serverstring
Address of remote syslog server.
source-ipstring
Source IP address of syslog.
ssl-min-proto-versionoption
Minimum supported protocol version for SSL/TLS connections (default is to follow system global setting).
"default"Follow system global setting.
"TLSv1-1"TLSv1.1.
"TLSv1-2"TLSv1.2.
"SSLv3"SSLv3.
"TLSv1"TLSv1.
statusoption
Enable/disable remote syslog logging.
"disable"Do not log to remote syslog server.
"enable"Log to remote syslog server.

 

log/syslogd3/override-setting/custom-field-name (table)

Custom field name for CEF format logging.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/log/syslogd3/override-setting/custom-field-name
Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/log/syslogd3/override-setting/custom-field-name/<custom-field-name_id>
Attribute ListDescriptions
customstring
Field custom name.
idsequence, master key
Entry ID.
namestring
Field name.

 

log/syslogd3/setting (object)

Global settings for remote syslog server.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/log/syslogd3/setting
Attribute ListDescriptions
certificatedatasource, refer to certificate local, or vpn certificate local (maximum 1)
Certificate used to communicate with Syslog server.
custom-field-nametable
enc-algorithmoption
Enable/disable reliable syslogging with TLS encryption.
"high"SSL communication with high encryption algorithms.
"low"SSL communication with low encryption algorithms.
"disable"Disable SSL communication.
"high-medium"SSL communication with high and medium encryption algorithms.
facilityoption
Remote syslog facility.
"kernel"Kernel messages.
"user"Random user-level messages.
"mail"Mail system.
"daemon"System daemons.
"auth"Security/authorization messages.
"syslog"Messages generated internally by syslog.
"lpr"Line printer subsystem.
"news"Network news subsystem.
"uucp"Network news subsystem.
"cron"Clock daemon.
"authpriv"Security/authorization messages (private).
"ftp"FTP daemon.
"ntp"NTP daemon.
"audit"Log audit.
"alert"Log alert.
"clock"Clock daemon.
"local0"Reserved for local use.
"local1"Reserved for local use.
"local2"Reserved for local use.
"local3"Reserved for local use.
"local4"Reserved for local use.
"local5"Reserved for local use.
"local6"Reserved for local use.
"local7"Reserved for local use.
formatoption
Log format.
"default"Syslog format.
"csv"CSV (Comma Separated Values) format.
"cef"CEF (Common Event Format) format.
interfacedatasource, refer to system interface (maximum 1)
Specify outgoing interface to reach server.
interface-select-methodoption
Specify how to select outgoing interface to reach server.
"auto"Set outgoing interface automatically.
"sdwan"Set outgoing interface by SD-WAN or policy routing rules.
"specify"Set outgoing interface manually.
max-log-rateunsigned int32
Syslog maximum log rate in MBps (0 = unlimited).
modeoption
Remote syslog logging over UDP/Reliable TCP.
"udp"Enable syslogging over UDP.
"legacy-reliable"Enable legacy reliable syslogging by RFC3195 (Reliable Delivery for Syslog).
"reliable"Enable reliable syslogging by RFC6587 (Transmission of Syslog Messages over TCP).
portunsigned int16
Server listen port.
priorityoption
Set log transmission priority.
"low"Set Syslog transmission priority to low.
"default"Set Syslog transmission priority to default.
serverstring
Address of remote syslog server.
source-ipstring
Source IP address of syslog.
ssl-min-proto-versionoption
Minimum supported protocol version for SSL/TLS connections (default is to follow system global setting).
"default"Follow system global setting.
"TLSv1-1"TLSv1.1.
"TLSv1-2"TLSv1.2.
"SSLv3"SSLv3.
"TLSv1"TLSv1.
statusoption
Enable/disable remote syslog logging.
"disable"Do not log to remote syslog server.
"enable"Log to remote syslog server.

log/syslogd4/filter (object)

Filters for remote system server.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/log/syslogd4/filter
Attribute ListDescriptions
anomalyoption
Enable/disable anomaly logging.
"disable"Disable anomaly logging.
"enable"Enable anomaly logging.
filterstring
Syslog 4 filter.
filter-typeoption
Include/exclude logs that match the filter.
"include"Include logs that match the filter.
"exclude"Exclude logs that match the filter.
forward-trafficoption
Enable/disable forward traffic logging.
"disable"Disable forward traffic logging.
"enable"Enable forward traffic logging.
gtpoption
Enable/disable GTP messages logging.
"disable"Disable GTP messages logging.
"enable"Enable GTP messages logging.
local-trafficoption
Enable/disable local in or out traffic logging.
"disable"Disable local in or out traffic logging.
"enable"Enable local in or out traffic logging.
multicast-trafficoption
Enable/disable multicast traffic logging.
"disable"Disable multicast traffic logging.
"enable"Enable multicast traffic logging.
severityoption
Lowest severity level to log.
"emergency"Emergency level.
"alert"Alert level.
"critical"Critical level.
"error"Error level.
"warning"Warning level.
"notification"Notification level.
"information"Information level.
"debug"Debug level.
sniffer-trafficoption
Enable/disable sniffer traffic logging.
"disable"Disable sniffer traffic logging.
"enable"Enable sniffer traffic logging.
voipoption
Enable/disable VoIP logging.
"disable"Disable VoIP logging.
"enable"Enable VoIP logging.

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/log/webtrends/filter
Attribute ListDescriptions
anomalyoption
Enable/disable anomaly logging.
"disable"Disable anomaly logging.
"enable"Enable anomaly logging.

Webtrends log filter.
filter-typeoption
Include/exclude logs that match the filter.
"include"Include logs that match the filter.
"exclude"Exclude logs that match the filter.

Enable/disable forward traffic logging.
"disable"Disable forward traffic logging.
"enable"Enable forward traffic logging.
gtpoption
Enable/disable GTP messages logging.
"disable"Disable GTP messages logging.
"enable"Enable GTP messages logging.

"disable"Disable local in or out traffic logging.
"enable"Enable local in or out traffic logging.

"enable"Enable multicast traffic logging.

monitoring/np6-ipsec-engine (object)

Configure NP6 IPsec engine status monitoring.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/monitoring/np6-ipsec-engine
Attribute ListDescriptions
intervalunsigned int32
IPsec engine status check interval (1 - 60 seconds, default = 1).
statusoption
Enable/disable NP6 IPsec engine status monitoring.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
thresholdstring array
IPsec engine status check threshold (x x x x x x x x, 8 integers from <1> to <255>, default = 15 15 12 12 8 8 5 5). Example: Log is generated if IPsec engine 0 is busy each of every 15 consecutive interval checks.

backgroundstring

"traffic"Traffic.
"event"Event.

Comment.

Bind dataset to chart.

"2D"2D graphic.
"3D"3D graphic.

"no"Not a favorite chart.
"yes"Favorite chart.

"none"None.
"flow"flow Chart.

Enable/Disable Legend area.
"disable"Disable legend area.
"enable"Enable legend area.

"last24h"Last 24 hours.
"last7d"Last 7 days.
policyunsigned int32
styleoption
Style.
"auto"Auto.
"manual"Manual.

Chart title.

Chart type.
"graph"Graph.
"table"Table.

"greater"Greater than.
"greater-equal"Greater than or equal to.
"less"Less than.
"less-equal"Less than or equal to.
"equal"Equal to.
"between"Between value 1 and value 2.

"string"String.
"integer"Integer.

Value 1.
value2string
Value 2.

report/chart/x-series (object)

X-series of chart.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/report/chart/<chart_name>/x-series
Attribute ListDescriptions
captionstring
X-series caption.
caption-font-sizeunsigned int32
X-series caption font size.
databindstring
X-series value expression.
font-sizeunsigned int32
X-series label font size.
is-categoryoption
X-series represent category or not.
"no"X-series is not category.
"yes"X-series is category.
label-angleoption
X-series label angle.
"45-degree"45-degree.
"vertical"Vertical.
"horizontal"Horizontal.
scale-directionoption
Scale increase or decrease.
"decrease"Decrease.
"increase"Increase.
scale-formatoption
Date/time format.
"YYYY-MM-DD-HH-MM"YYYY/MM/DD HH:MM
"YYYY-MM-DD"YYYY/MM/DD
"HH"
"YYYY-MM"YYYY/MM
"YYYY"
"HH-MM"HH:MM
"MM-DD"MM:DD
scale-stepunsigned int32
Scale step.
scale-unitoption
Scale unit.
"minute"Minute.
"hour"Hour.
"day"Day.
"month"Month.
"year"Year.
unitstring
X-series unit.

 

report/chart/y-series (object)

Y-series of chart.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:

"disable"Disable second Y-series.
"enable"Enable second Y-series.

Extra Y-series legend type/name.

Y-series group option.

Y-series label angle.
"45-degree"45-degree.
"vertical"Vertical.
"horizontal"Horizontal.
unitstring
Y-series unit.
y-legendstring

"run-time"Run time.
"custom"Custom.

"tuesday"Tuesday.
"wednesday"Wednesday.
"thursday"Thursday.
"friday"Friday.
"saturday"Saturday.

"disable"Disable sending emails after generating reports.
"enable"Enable sending emails after generating reports.

"pdf"PDF.

Maximum number of PDF reports to keep at one time (oldest report is overwritten).

Report layout options.
"include-table-of-content"Include table of content in the report.
"auto-numbering-heading"Prepend heading with auto numbering.
"view-chart-as-heading"Auto add heading for each chart.
"show-html-navbar-before-heading"Show HTML navigation bar before each heading.
"dummy-option"Use this option if you need none of the above options.

"daily"Schedule daily.
"weekly"Schedule weekly.
"once"
"demand"Run on demand.
style-themestring

subtitlestring

titlestring

router/bgp (object)

Configure BGP.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/router/bgp
Attribute ListDescriptions
additional-pathoption
Enable/disable selection of BGP IPv4 additional paths.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
additional-path-selectunsigned int32
Number of additional paths to be selected for each IPv4 NLRI.
additional-path-select6unsigned int32
Number of additional paths to be selected for each IPv6 NLRI.
additional-path6option
Enable/disable selection of BGP IPv6 additional paths.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
admin-distancetable
aggregate-addresstable
aggregate-address6table
always-compare-medoption
Enable/disable always compare MED.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
asunsigned int32
Router AS number, valid from 1 to 4294967295, 0 to disable BGP.
bestpath-as-path-ignoreoption
Enable/disable ignore AS path.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
bestpath-cmp-confed-aspathoption
Enable/disable compare federation AS path length.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
bestpath-cmp-routeridoption
Enable/disable compare router ID for identical EBGP paths.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
bestpath-med-confedoption
Enable/disable compare MED among confederation paths.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
bestpath-med-missing-as-worstoption
Enable/disable treat missing MED as least preferred.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
client-to-client-reflectionoption
Enable/disable client-to-client route reflection.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
cluster-idIPv4 address
Route reflector cluster ID.
confederation-identifierunsigned int32
Confederation identifier.
confederation-peersstring array
Confederation peers.
dampeningoption
Enable/disable route-flap dampening.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
dampening-max-suppress-timeunsigned int32
Maximum minutes a route can be suppressed.
dampening-reachability-half-lifeunsigned int32
Reachability half-life time for penalty (min).
dampening-reuseunsigned int32
Threshold to reuse routes.
dampening-route-mapdatasource, refer to router route-map (maximum 1)
Criteria for dampening.
dampening-suppressunsigned int32
Threshold to suppress routes.
dampening-unreachability-half-lifeunsigned int32
Unreachability half-life time for penalty (min).
default-local-preferenceunsigned int32
Default local preference.
deterministic-medoption
Enable/disable enforce deterministic comparison of MED.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
distance-externalunsigned int32
Distance for routes external to the AS.
distance-internalunsigned int32
Distance for routes internal to the AS.
distance-localunsigned int32
Distance for routes local to the AS.
ebgp-multipathoption
Enable/disable EBGP multi-path.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
enforce-first-asoption
Enable/disable enforce first AS for EBGP routes.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
fast-external-failoveroption
Enable/disable reset peer BGP session if link goes down.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
graceful-end-on-timeroption
Enable/disable to exit graceful restart on timer only.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
graceful-restartoption
Enable/disable BGP graceful restart capabilities.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
graceful-restart-timeunsigned int32
Time needed for neighbors to restart (sec).
graceful-stalepath-timeunsigned int32
Time to hold stale paths of restarting neighbor (sec).
graceful-update-delayunsigned int32
Route advertisement/selection delay after restart (sec).
holdtime-timerunsigned int32
Number of seconds to mark peer as dead.
ibgp-multipathoption
Enable/disable IBGP multi-path.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
ignore-optional-capabilityoption
Don't send unknown optional capability notification message
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
keepalive-timerunsigned int32
Frequency to send keep alive requests.
log-neighbour-changesoption
Enable logging of BGP neighbour's changes
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
multipath-recursive-distanceoption
Enable/disable use of recursive distance to select multipath.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
neighbortable
neighbor-grouptable
neighbor-rangetable
neighbor-range6table
networktable
network-import-checkoption
Enable/disable ensure BGP network route exists in IGP.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
network6table
redistributeobject
redistribute6object
router-idIPv4 address
Router ID.
scan-timeunsigned int32
Background scanner interval (sec), 0 to disable it.
synchronizationoption
Enable/disable only advertise routes from iBGP if routes present in an IGP.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
vrf-leaktable

router/bgp/neighbor (table)

BGP neighbor table.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/router/bgp/neighbor
Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/router/bgp/neighbor/<neighbor_ip>
Attribute ListDescriptions
activateoption
Enable/disable address family IPv4 for this neighbor.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
activate6option
Enable/disable address family IPv6 for this neighbor.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
additional-pathoption
Enable/disable IPv4 additional-path capability.
"send"Enable sending additional paths.
"receive"Enable receiving additional paths.
"both"Enable sending and receiving additional paths.
"disable"Disable additional paths.
additional-path6option
Enable/disable IPv6 additional-path capability.
"send"Enable sending additional paths.
"receive"Enable receiving additional paths.
"both"Enable sending and receiving additional paths.
"disable"Disable additional paths.
adv-additional-pathunsigned int32
Number of IPv4 additional paths that can be advertised to this neighbor.
adv-additional-path6unsigned int32
Number of IPv6 additional paths that can be advertised to this neighbor.
advertisement-intervalunsigned int32
Minimum interval (sec) between sending updates.
allowas-inunsigned int32
IPv4 The maximum number of occurrence of my AS number allowed.
allowas-in-enableoption
Enable/disable IPv4 Enable to allow my AS in AS path.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
allowas-in-enable6option
Enable/disable IPv6 Enable to allow my AS in AS path.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
allowas-in6unsigned int32
IPv6 The maximum number of occurrence of my AS number allowed.
as-overrideoption
Enable/disable replace peer AS with own AS for IPv4.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
as-override6option
Enable/disable replace peer AS with own AS for IPv6.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
attribute-unchangedflags
IPv4 List of attributes that should be unchanged.
"as-path"AS path.
"med"MED.
"next-hop"Next hop.
attribute-unchanged6flags
IPv6 List of attributes that should be unchanged.
"as-path"AS path.
"med"MED.
"next-hop"Next hop.
bfdoption
Enable/disable BFD for this neighbor.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
capability-default-originateoption
Enable/disable advertise default IPv4 route to this neighbor.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
capability-default-originate6option
Enable/disable advertise default IPv6 route to this neighbor.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
capability-dynamicoption
Enable/disable advertise dynamic capability to this neighbor.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.

Enable/disable advertise IPv4 graceful restart capability to this neighbor.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
capability-graceful-restart6option
Enable/disable advertise IPv6 graceful restart capability to this neighbor.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
capability-orfoption
Accept/Send IPv4 ORF lists to/from this neighbor.
"none"None.
"send"Send ORF list.
"receive"Receive ORF lists.
"both"Send and receive ORF lists.
capability-orf6option
Accept/Send IPv6 ORF lists to/from this neighbor.
"none"None.
"send"Send ORF list.
"receive"Receive ORF lists.
"both"Send and receive ORF lists.
capability-route-refreshoption
Enable/disable advertise route refresh capability to this neighbor.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.

connect-timerunsigned int32
Interval (sec) for connect timer.

Route map to specify criteria to originate IPv4 default.
default-originate-routemap6datasource, refer to router route-map (maximum 1)
Route map to specify criteria to originate IPv6 default.
descriptionstring
Description.
distribute-list-indatasource, refer to router access-list (maximum 1)
Filter for IPv4 updates from this neighbor.
distribute-list-in6datasource, refer to router access-list6 (maximum 1)
Filter for IPv6 updates from this neighbor.
distribute-list-outdatasource, refer to router access-list (maximum 1)
Filter for IPv4 updates to this neighbor.
distribute-list-out6datasource, refer to router access-list6 (maximum 1)
Filter for IPv6 updates to this neighbor.
dont-capability-negotiateoption
Don't negotiate capabilities with this neighbor
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.

Enable/disable allow multi-hop EBGP neighbors.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.

EBGP multihop TTL for this peer.

BGP filter for IPv4 inbound routes.
filter-list-in6datasource, refer to router aspath-list (maximum 1)

filter-list-outdatasource, refer to router aspath-list (maximum 1)
BGP filter for IPv4 outbound routes.
filter-list-out6datasource, refer to router aspath-list (maximum 1)
BGP filter for IPv6 outbound routes.
holdtime-timerunsigned int32
Interval (sec) before peer considered dead.
interfacedatasource, refer to system interface (maximum 1)
Specify outgoing interface for peer connection. For IPv6 peer, the interface should have link-local address.
ipstring, master key
IP/IPv6 address of neighbor.
keep-alive-timerunsigned int32
Keep alive timer interval (sec).

Enable/disable failover upon link down.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
local-asunsigned int32
Local AS number of neighbor.

Do not prepend local-as to incoming updates.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
local-as-replace-asoption
Replace real AS with local-as in outgoing updates.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.

Maximum number of IPv4 prefixes to accept from this peer.
maximum-prefix-thresholdunsigned int32
Maximum IPv4 prefix threshold value (1 - 100 percent).
maximum-prefix-threshold6unsigned int32
Maximum IPv6 prefix threshold value (1 - 100 percent).

"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.

"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.

"enable"Enable setting.

"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.

"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
passiveoption

"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.

Password used in MD5 authentication.

IPv4 Inbound filter for updates from this neighbor.

router/bgp/neighbor/conditional-advertise (table)

Conditional advertisement.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/router/bgp/neighbor/<neighbor_ip>/conditional-advertise
Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/router/bgp/neighbor/<neighbor_ip>/conditional-advertise/<conditional-advertise_advertise-routemap>
Attribute ListDescriptions
advertise-routemapdatasource, refer to router route-map (maximum 1), master key
Name of advertising route map.
condition-routemapdatasource, refer to router route-map (maximum 1)
Name of condition route map.
condition-typeoption
Type of condition.
"exist"True if condition route map is matched.
"non-exist"True if condition route map is not matched.

router/isis (object)

Configure IS-IS.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/router/isis
Attribute ListDescriptions
adjacency-checkoption
Enable/disable adjacency check.
"disable"Disable adjacency check.
"enable"Enable adjacency check.
adjacency-check6option
Enable/disable IPv6 adjacency check.
"disable"Disable IPv6 adjacency check.
"enable"Enable IPv6 adjacency check.
adv-passive-onlyoption
Enable/disable IS-IS advertisement of passive interfaces only.
"disable"Advertise all IS-IS enabled interfaces.
"enable"Advertise passive interfaces only.
adv-passive-only6option
Enable/disable IPv6 IS-IS advertisement of passive interfaces only.
"disable"Advertise all IS-IS enabled interfaces.
"enable"Advertise passive interfaces only.
auth-keychain-l1datasource, refer to router key-chain (maximum 1)
Authentication key-chain for level 1 PDUs.
auth-keychain-l2datasource, refer to router key-chain (maximum 1)
Authentication key-chain for level 2 PDUs.
auth-mode-l1option
Level 1 authentication mode.
"md5"MD5.
"password"Password.
auth-mode-l2option
Level 2 authentication mode.
"md5"MD5.
"password"Password.
auth-password-l1password
Authentication password for level 1 PDUs.
auth-password-l2password
Authentication password for level 2 PDUs.
auth-sendonly-l1option
Enable/disable level 1 authentication send-only.
"disable"Disable level 1 authentication send-only.
"enable"Enable level 1 authentication send-only.
auth-sendonly-l2option
Enable/disable level 2 authentication send-only.
"disable"Disable level 2 authentication send-only.
"enable"Enable level 2 authentication send-only.
default-originateoption
Enable/disable distribution of default route information.
"disable"Disable distribution of default route information.
"enable"Enable distribution of default route information.
default-originate6option
Enable/disable distribution of default IPv6 route information.
"disable"Disable distribution of default IPv6 route information.
"enable"Enable distribution of default IPv6 route information.
dynamic-hostnameoption
Enable/disable dynamic hostname.
"disable"Disable dynamic hostname.
"enable"Enable dynamic hostname.
ignore-lsp-errorsoption
Enable/disable ignoring of LSP errors with bad checksums.
"disable"Disable ignoring of LSP errors with bad checksums.
"enable"Enable ignoring of LSP errors with bad checksums.
is-typeoption
IS type.
"level-1-2"Level 1 and 2.
"level-1"Level 1 only.
"level-2-only"Level 2 only.
isis-interfacetable
isis-nettable
lsp-gen-interval-l1unsigned int32
Minimum interval for level 1 LSP regenerating.
lsp-gen-interval-l2unsigned int32
Minimum interval for level 2 LSP regenerating.
lsp-refresh-intervalunsigned int32
LSP refresh time in seconds.
max-lsp-lifetimeunsigned int32
Maximum LSP lifetime in seconds.
metric-styleoption
Use old-style (ISO 10589) or new-style packet formats
"narrow"Use old style of TLVs with narrow metric.
"narrow-transition"Narrow and accept both styles of TLVs during transition.
"narrow-transition-l1"Narrow-transition level-1 only.
"narrow-transition-l2"Narrow-transition level-2 only.
"wide"Use new style of TLVs to carry wider metric.
"wide-l1"Wide level-1 only.
"wide-l2"Wide level-2 only.
"wide-transition"Wide and accept both styles of TLVs during transition.
"wide-transition-l1"Wide-transition level-1 only.
"wide-transition-l2"Wide-transition level-2 only.
"transition"Send and accept both styles of TLVs during transition.
"transition-l1"Transition level-1 only.
"transition-l2"Transition level-2 only.
overload-bitoption
Enable/disable signal other routers not to use us in SPF.
"disable"Disable overload bit.
"enable"Enable overload bit.
overload-bit-on-startupunsigned int32
Overload-bit only temporarily after reboot.
overload-bit-suppressflags
Suppress overload-bit for the specific prefixes.
"external"External.
"interlevel"Inter-level.
redistributeobject
redistribute-l1option
Enable/disable redistribution of level 1 routes into level 2.
"disable"Disable redistribution of level 1 routes into level 2.
"enable"Enable redistribution of level 1 routes into level 2.
redistribute-l1-listdatasource, refer to router access-list (maximum 1)
Access-list for route redistribution from l1 to l2.
redistribute-l2option
Enable/disable redistribution of level 2 routes into level 1.
"disable"Disable redistribution of level 2 routes into level 1.
"enable"Enable redistribution of level 2 routes into level 1.
redistribute-l2-listdatasource, refer to router access-list (maximum 1)
Access-list for route redistribution from l2 to l1.
redistribute6object
redistribute6-l1option
Enable/disable redistribution of level 1 IPv6 routes into level 2.
"disable"Disable redistribution of level 1 IPv6 routes into level 2.
"enable"Enable redistribution of level 1 IPv6 routes into level 2.
redistribute6-l1-listdatasource, refer to router access-list6 (maximum 1)
Access-list for IPv6 route redistribution from l1 to l2.
redistribute6-l2option
Enable/disable redistribution of level 2 IPv6 routes into level 1.
"disable"Disable redistribution of level 2 IPv6 routes into level 1.
"enable"Enable redistribution of level 2 IPv6 routes into level 1.
redistribute6-l2-listdatasource, refer to router access-list6 (maximum 1)
Access-list for IPv6 route redistribution from l2 to l1.
spf-interval-exp-l1int array
Level 1 SPF calculation delay.
spf-interval-exp-l2int array
Level 2 SPF calculation delay.
summary-addresstable
summary-address6table

"enable"Enable IP multicast routing.

route-limitunsigned int32
Maximum number of multicast routes.
route-thresholdunsigned int32

router/multicast/interface (table)

PIM interfaces.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/router/multicast/interface
Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/router/multicast/interface/<interface_name>
Attribute ListDescriptions
bfdoption
Enable/disable Protocol Independent Multicast (PIM) Bidirectional Forwarding Detection (BFD).
"disable"Disable Protocol Independent Multicast (PIM) Bidirectional Forwarding Detection (BFD).
"enable"Enable Protocol Independent Multicast (PIM) Bidirectional Forwarding Detection (BFD).
cisco-exclude-genidoption
Exclude GenID from hello packets (compatibility with old Cisco IOS).
"disable"Send GenID according to standard.
"enable"Do not send GenID.
dr-priorityunsigned int32
DR election priority.
hello-holdtimeunsigned int32
Time before old neighbor information expires (0 - 65535 sec, default = 105).
hello-intervalunsigned int32
Interval between sending PIM hello messages (0 - 65535 sec, default = 30).
igmpobject
join-grouptable
multicast-flowdatasource, refer to router multicast-flow (maximum 1)
Acceptable source for multicast group.
namedatasource, refer to system interface (maximum 1), master key
Interface name.
neighbour-filterdatasource, refer to router access-list (maximum 1)
Routers acknowledged as neighbor routers.
passiveoption
Enable/disable listening to IGMP but not participating in PIM.
"disable"Participate in PIM.
"enable"Listen only.
pim-modeoption
PIM operation mode.
"sparse-mode"
"dense-mode"
propagation-delayunsigned int32
Delay flooding packets on this interface (100 - 5000 msec, default = 500).
rp-candidateoption
Enable/disable compete to become RP in elections.
"disable"Do not compete for RP elections.
"enable"Compete for RP elections.
rp-candidate-groupdatasource, refer to router access-list (maximum 1)
Multicast groups managed by this RP.
rp-candidate-intervalunsigned int32
RP candidate advertisement interval (1 - 16383 sec, default = 60).
rp-candidate-priorityunsigned int32
Router's priority as RP.
rpf-nbr-fail-backoption
Enable/disable fail back for RPF neighbor query.
"disable"Disable fail back for RPF neighbor query.
"enable"Enable fail back for RPF neighbor query.
rpf-nbr-fail-back-filterdatasource, refer to router access-list (maximum 1)
Filter for fail back RPF neighbors.
state-refresh-intervalunsigned int32
Interval between sending state-refresh packets (1 - 100 sec, default = 60).
static-groupdatasource, refer to router multicast-flow (maximum 1)
Statically set multicast groups to forward out.
ttl-thresholdunsigned int32
Minimum TTL of multicast packets that will be forwarded (applied only to new multicast routes) (1 - 255, default = 1).

 

router/multicast/interface/igmp (object)

IGMP configuration options.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/router/multicast/interface/<interface_name>/igmp
Attribute ListDescriptions
access-groupdatasource, refer to router access-list (maximum 1)
Groups IGMP hosts are allowed to join.
immediate-leave-groupdatasource, refer to router access-list (maximum 1)
Groups to drop membership for immediately after receiving IGMPv2 leave.
last-member-query-countunsigned int32
Number of group specific queries before removing group (2 - 7, default = 2).
last-member-query-intervalunsigned int32
Timeout between IGMPv2 leave and removing group (1 - 65535 msec, default = 1000).
query-intervalunsigned int32
Interval between queries to IGMP hosts (1 - 65535 sec, default = 125).
query-max-response-timeunsigned int32
Maximum time to wait for a IGMP query response (1 - 25 sec, default = 10).
query-timeoutunsigned int32
Timeout between queries before becoming querier for network (60 - 900, default = 255).
router-alert-checkoption
Enable/disable require IGMP packets contain router alert option.
"disable"don't require Router Alert option in IGMP packets
"enable"Require Router Alert option in IGMP packets.
versionoption
Maximum version of IGMP to support.
"1"Version 1.
"2"Version 2 and lower.
"3"Version 3 and lower.

router/multicast/pim-sm-global (object)

PIM sparse-mode global settings.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/router/multicast/pim-sm-global
Attribute ListDescriptions
accept-register-listdatasource, refer to router access-list (maximum 1)
Sources allowed to register packets with this Rendezvous Point (RP).
accept-source-listdatasource, refer to router access-list (maximum 1)
Sources allowed to send multicast traffic.
bsr-allow-quick-refreshoption
Enable/disable accept BSR quick refresh packets from neighbors.
"disable"Do not allow quick refresh packets.
"enable"Allow quick refresh packets.
bsr-candidateoption
Enable/disable allowing this router to become a bootstrap router (BSR).
"disable"Do not allow this router to function as a BSR.
"enable"Allow this router to function as a BSR.
bsr-hashunsigned int32
BSR hash length (0 - 32, default = 10).
bsr-interfacedatasource, refer to system interface (maximum 1)
Interface to advertise as candidate BSR.
bsr-priorityunsigned int32
BSR priority (0 - 255, default = 0).
cisco-crp-prefixoption
Enable/disable making candidate RP compatible with old Cisco IOS.
"disable"Allow sending group prefix of zero.
"enable"Do not allow sending group prefix of zero.
cisco-ignore-rp-set-priorityoption
Use only hash for RP selection (compatibility with old Cisco IOS).
"disable"Do not ignore RP-SET priority value.
"enable"Ignore RP-SET priority value.
cisco-register-checksumoption
Checksum entire register packet(for old Cisco IOS compatibility).
"disable"Do not register checksum entire packet.
"enable"register checksum entire packet.
cisco-register-checksum-groupdatasource, refer to router access-list (maximum 1)
Cisco register checksum only these groups.
join-prune-holdtimeunsigned int32
Join/prune holdtime (1 - 65535, default = 210).
message-intervalunsigned int32
Period of time between sending periodic PIM join/prune messages in seconds (1 - 65535, default = 60).
null-register-retriesunsigned int32
Maximum retries of null register (1 - 20, default = 1).
register-rate-limitunsigned int32
Limit of packets/sec per source registered through this RP (0 - 65535, default = 0 which means unlimited).
register-rp-reachabilityoption
Enable/disable check RP is reachable before registering packets.
"disable"Do not check RP unicast reachability.
"enable"Check target RP is unicast reachable before registering.
register-sourceoption
Override source address in register packets.
"disable"Use source address of RPF interface.
"ip-address"Use a local IP address.
"interface"Use primary IP of an interface.
register-source-interfacedatasource, refer to system interface (maximum 1)
Override with primary interface address.
register-source-ipIPv4 address
Override with local IP address.
register-supressionunsigned int32
Period of time to honor register-stop message (1 - 65535 sec, default = 60).
rp-addresstable
rp-register-keepaliveunsigned int32
Timeout for RP receiving data on (S,G) tree (1 - 65535 sec, default = 185).
spt-thresholdoption
Enable/disable switching to source specific trees.
"disable"Do not switch to Source tree when available.
"enable"Switch to Source tree when available.
spt-threshold-groupdatasource, refer to router access-list (maximum 1)
Groups allowed to switch to source tree.
ssmoption
Enable/disable source specific multicast.
"disable"Do not allow source specific multicast.
"enable"Allow source specific multicast.
ssm-rangedatasource, refer to router access-list (maximum 1)
Groups allowed to source specific multicast.

"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
router-idIPv4 address
Router ID.
spf-timersint array
SPF calculation frequency.
summary-addresstable

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/router/ospf/area

Attribute ListDescriptions
authenticationoption
Authentication type.
"none"None.
"text"Text.
"md5"MD5.

Summary default cost of stub or NSSA area.
filter-listtable
idIPv4 address, master key
Area entry IP address.
nssa-default-information-originateoption
Redistribute, advertise, or do not originate Type-7 default route into NSSA area.
"disable"Do not advertise Type-7 default route.
"enable"Redistribute Type-7 default route from routing table.
"always"Advertise a self-originated Type-7 default route.

"1"Type 1.

"always"Always.

"enable"Enable shortcut option.

"no-summary"No summary.

"nssa"NSSA.

router/policy (table)

Configure IPv4 routing policies.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, move, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/router/policy
Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/router/policy/<policy_seq-num>
Attribute ListDescriptions
actionoption
Action of the policy route.
"deny"Do not search policy route table.
"permit"Use this policy route for forwarding.
commentsstring
Optional comments.
dststring array
Destination IP and mask (x.x.x.x/x).
dst-negateoption
Enable/disable negating destination address match.
"disable"Disable destination address negation.
"enable"Enable destination address negation.
dstaddrdatasource, refer to firewall address, or firewall addrgrp
Destination address name.
end-portunsigned int16
End destination port number (0 - 65535).
end-source-portunsigned int32
End source port number (0 - 65535).
gatewayIPv4 address
IP address of the gateway.
input-devicedatasource, refer to system interface
Incoming interface name.
input-device-negateoption
Enable/disable negation of input device match.
"disable"Disable negation of input device match.
"enable"Enable negation of input device match.
internet-service-customdatasource, refer to firewall internet-service-custom
Custom Destination Internet Service name.
internet-service-iddatasource, refer to firewall internet-service
Destination Internet Service ID.
output-devicedatasource, refer to system interface (maximum 1)
Outgoing interface name.
protocolunsigned int32
Protocol number (0 - 255).
seq-numsequence, master key
Sequence number(1-65535).
srcstring array
Source IP and mask (x.x.x.x/x).
src-negateoption
Enable/disable negating source address match.
"disable"Disable source address negation.
"enable"Enable source address negation.
srcaddrdatasource, refer to firewall address, or firewall addrgrp
Source address name.
start-portunsigned int16
Start destination port number (0 - 65535).
start-source-portunsigned int32
Start source port number (0 - 65535).
statusoption
Enable/disable this policy route.
"disable"Disable this policy route.
"enable"Enable this policy route.
tosstring
Type of service bit pattern.
tos-maskstring
Type of service evaluated bits.

Type of service bit pattern.
tos-maskstring
Type of service evaluated bits.

Object URL:

Attribute ListDescriptions

"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.

Default metric.
distancetable
distribute-listtable
garbage-timerunsigned int32

max-out-metricunsigned int32

networktable
offset-listtable

redistributeobject

update-timerunsigned int32

"1"Version 1.
"2"Version 2.

router/static (table)

Configure IPv4 static routing tables.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/router/static
Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/router/static/<static_seq-num>
Attribute ListDescriptions
bfdoption
Enable/disable Bidirectional Forwarding Detection (BFD).
"disable"Disable Bidirectional Forwarding Detection (BFD).
"enable"Enable Bidirectional Forwarding Detection (BFD).
blackholeoption
Enable/disable black hole.
"disable"Disable black hole.
"enable"Enable black hole.
commentstring
Optional comments.
devicedatasource, refer to system interface (maximum 1)
Gateway out interface or tunnel.
distanceunsigned int32
Administrative distance (1 - 255).
dstIPv4 address/mask
Destination IP and mask for this route.

Name of firewall address or address group.

Enable use of dynamic gateway retrieved from a DHCP or PPP server.
"disable"Disable dynamic gateway.
"enable"Enable dynamic gateway.
gatewayIPv4 address
Gateway IP for this route.
internet-servicedatasource, refer to application internet-service, or firewall internet-service (maximum 1)
Application ID in the Internet service database.
internet-service-customdatasource, refer to application internet-service-custom, or firewall internet-service-custom (maximum 1)
Application name in the Internet service custom database.
link-monitor-exemptoption
Enable/disable withdrawal of this static route when link monitor or health check is down.
"disable"Withdraw this static route when link monitor or health check is down. (default)
"enable"Keep this static route when link monitor or health check is down.
priorityunsigned int32
Administrative priority (0 - 65535).
sdwanoption
Enable/disable egress through SD-WAN.
"disable"Disable SD-WAN access.
"enable"Enable SD-WAN access.
seq-numsequence, master key
Sequence number.
srcIPv4 address/mask
Source prefix for this route.
statusoption
Enable/disable this static route.
"disable"Disable static route.
"enable"Enable static route.
virtual-wan-linkoption
"disable"
"enable"
vrfstring
Virtual Routing Forwarding ID.
weightunsigned int32

switch-controller/802-1X-settings (object)

Configure global 802.1X settings.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/switch-controller/802-1X-settings
Attribute ListDescriptions
link-down-authoption
Interface-reauthentication state to set if a link is down.
"set-unauth"Interface set to unauth when down. Reauthentication is needed.
"no-action"Interface reauthentication is not needed.
max-reauth-attemptunsigned int32
Maximum number of authentication attempts (0 - 15, default = 3).
reauth-periodunsigned int32
Period of time to allow for reauthentication (1 - 1440 sec, default = 60, 0 = disable reauthentication).
tx-periodunsigned int32
802.1X Tx period (seconds, default=30).

switch-controller/custom-command (table)

Configure the FortiGate switch controller to send custom commands to managed FortiSwitch devices.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/switch-controller/custom-command
Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/switch-controller/custom-command/<custom-command_command-name>
Attribute ListDescriptions
commandstring
String of commands to send to FortiSwitch devices (For example (%0a = return key): config switch trunk %0a edit myTrunk %0a set members port1 port2 %0a end %0a).
command-namestring, master key
Command name called by the FortiGate switch controller in the execute command.
descriptionstring
Description.

 

switch-controller/flow-tracking (object)

Configure FortiSwitch flow tracking and export via ipfix/netflow.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/switch-controller/flow-tracking
Attribute ListDescriptions
aggregatestable
collector-ipIPv4 address
Configure collector ip address.
collector-portunsigned int32
Configure collector port number(0-65535, default=0).
formatoption
Configure flow tracking protocol.
"netflow1"Netflow version 1 sampling.
"netflow5"Netflow version 5 sampling.
"netflow9"Netflow version 9 sampling.
"ipfix"Ipfix sampling.
leveloption
Configure flow tracking level.
"vlan"Collects srcip/dstip/srcport/dstport/protocol/tos/vlan from the sample packet.
"ip"Collects srcip/dstip from the sample packet.
"port"Collects srcip/dstip/srcport/dstport/protocol from the sample packet.
"proto"Collects srcip/dstip/protocol from the sample packet.
"mac"Collects smac/dmac from the sample packet.
max-export-pkt-sizeunsigned int32
Configure flow max export packet size (512-9216, default=512 bytes).
sample-modeoption
Configure sample mode for the flow tracking.
"local"Set local mode which samples on the specific switch port.
"perimeter"Set perimeter mode which samples on all switch fabric ports and fortilink port at the ingress.
"device-ingress"Set device -ingress mode which samples across all switch ports at the ingress.
sample-rateunsigned int32
Configure sample rate for the perimeter and device-ingress sampling(0 - 99999).
timeout-generalunsigned int32
Configure flow session general timeout (60-604800, default=3600 seconds).
timeout-icmpunsigned int32
Configure flow session ICMP timeout (60-604800, default=300 seconds).
timeout-maxunsigned int32
Configure flow session max timeout (60-604800, default=604800 seconds).
timeout-tcpunsigned int32
Configure flow session TCP timeout (60-604800, default=3600 seconds).
timeout-tcp-finunsigned int32
Configure flow session TCP FIN timeout (60-604800, default=300 seconds).
timeout-tcp-rstunsigned int32
Configure flow session TCP RST timeout (60-604800, default=120 seconds).
timeout-udpunsigned int32
Configure flow session UDP timeout (60-604800, default=300 seconds).
transportoption
Configure L4 transport protocol for exporting packets.
"udp"UDP protocol.
"tcp"TCP protocol.
"sctp"SCTP protocol.

 

switch-controller/flow-tracking/aggregates (table)

Configure aggregates in which all traffic sessions matching the IP Address will be grouped into the same flow.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/switch-controller/flow-tracking/aggregates
Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/switch-controller/flow-tracking/aggregates/<aggregates_id>
Attribute ListDescriptions
idsequence, master key
Aggregate id.
ipIPv4 address/mask
IP address to group all matching traffic sessions to a flow.

 

switch-controller/global (object)

Configure FortiSwitch global settings.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/switch-controller/global
Attribute ListDescriptions
allow-multiple-interfacesoption
"disable"
"enable"
bounce-quarantined-linkoption
Enable/disable bouncing (administratively bring the link down, up) of a switch port where a quarantined device was seen last. Helps to re-initiate the DHCP process for a device.
"disable"Disable bouncing (administratively bring the link down, up) of a switch port where a quarantined device was seen last.
"enable"Enable bouncing (administratively bring the link down, up) of a switch port where a quarantined device was seen last.
custom-commandtable
default-virtual-switch-vlandatasource, refer to system interface (maximum 1)
Default VLAN for ports when added to the virtual-switch.
disable-discoverystring array
Prevent this FortiSwitch from discovering.
https-image-pushoption
Enable/disable image push to FortiSwitch using HTTPS.
"disable"Disable image push to FortiSwitch using HTTPS.
"enable"Enable image push to FortiSwitch using HTTPS.
log-mac-limit-violationsoption
Enable/disable logs for Learning Limit Violations.
"disable"Disable Learn Limit Violation.
"enable"Enable Learn Limit Violation.
mac-aging-intervalunsigned int32
Time after which an inactive MAC is aged out (10 - 1000000 sec, default = 300, 0 = disable).
mac-event-loggingoption
Enable/disable MAC address event logging.
"disable"Disable MAC address event logging.
"enable"Enable MAC address event logging.
mac-retention-periodunsigned int32
Time in hours after which an inactive MAC is removed from client DB (0 = aged out based on mac-aging-interval).
mac-violation-timerunsigned int32
Set timeout for Learning Limit Violations (0 = disabled).
quarantine-modeoption
Quarantine mode.
"by-vlan"Quarantined device traffic is sent to FortiGate on a separate quarantine VLAN.
"by-redirect"Quarantined device traffic is redirected only to the FortiGate on the received VLAN.
sn-dns-resolutionoption
Enable/disable DNS resolution of the FortiSwitch unit's IP address by use of its serial number.
"disable"Disable DNS resolution of the FortiSwitch unit's IP address by use of its serial number.
"enable"Enable DNS resolution of the FortiSwitch unit's IP address by use of its serial number.
update-user-deviceflags
Control which sources update the device user list.
"mac-cache"Update MAC address from switch-controller mac-cache.
"lldp"Update from FortiSwitch LLDP neighbor database.
"dhcp-snooping"Update from FortiSwitch DHCP snooping client and server databases.
"l2-db"Update from FortiSwitch Network-monitor Layer 2 tracking database.
"l3-db"Update from FortiSwitch Network-monitor Layer 3 tracking database.
vlan-all-modeoption
VLAN configuration mode, user-defined-vlans or all-possible-vlans.
"defined"Include user defined VLANs.
"all"Include all possible VLANs (1-4093).
vlan-optimizationoption
FortiLink VLAN optimization.
"disable"Disable VLAN optimization on FortiSwitch units for auto-generated trunks.
"enable"Enable VLAN optimization on FortiSwitch units for auto-generated trunks.

 

switch-controller/global/custom-command (table)

List of custom commands to be pushed to all FortiSwitches in the VDOM.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/switch-controller/global/custom-command
Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/switch-controller/global/custom-command/<custom-command_command-entry>
Attribute ListDescriptions
command-entrystring, master key
List of FortiSwitch commands.
command-namedatasource, refer to switch-controller custom-command (maximum 1)
Name of custom command to push to all FortiSwitches in VDOM.

 

switch-controller/igmp-snooping (object)

Configure FortiSwitch IGMP snooping global settings.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/switch-controller/igmp-snooping
Attribute ListDescriptions
aging-timeunsigned int32
Maximum number of seconds to retain a multicast snooping entry for which no packets have been seen (15 - 3600 sec, default = 300).
flood-unknown-multicastoption
Enable/disable unknown multicast flooding.
"disable"Disable unknown multicast flooding.
"enable"Enable unknown multicast flooding.

Attribute ListDescriptions
allowaccessflags

"https"HTTPS access.
"ping"PING access.
"ssh"SSH access.
"snmp"SNMP access.
"http"HTTP access.
"telnet"TELNET access.
"fgfm"FortiManager access.
"radius-acct"RADIUS accounting access.
"probe-response"Probe access.
"ftm"FTM access.
"fabric"Security Fabric access.

Automatically allocate interface address and subnet block.
"disable"Disable auto-ip status.
"enable"Enable auto-ip status.
dhcp-serveroption

"disable"Disable DHCP server.
"enable"Enable DHCP server.

"power-negotiation"PoE+ classification TLV.

"disable"Disable automatic MCLAG inter chassis link.
"enable"Enable automatic MCLAG inter chassis link.

Auto inter-switch LAG port group ID (0 - 9).

"location-identification"Location identificaion TLVs.

switch-controller/lldp-profile/med-network-policy (table)

Configuration method to edit Media Endpoint Discovery (MED) network policy type-length-value (TLV) categories.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/switch-controller/lldp-profile/<lldp-profile_name>/med-network-policy
Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/switch-controller/lldp-profile/<lldp-profile_name>/med-network-policy/<med-network-policy_name>
Attribute ListDescriptions
assign-vlanoption
Enable/disable VLAN assignment when this profile is applied on managed FortiSwitch port.
"disable"Disable VLAN assignment when this profile is applied on port.
"enable"Enable VLAN assignment when this profile is applied on port.
dscpunsigned int32
Advertised Differentiated Services Code Point (DSCP) value, a packet header value indicating the level of service requested for traffic, such as high priority or best effort delivery.
namestring, master key
Policy type name.
priorityunsigned int32
Advertised Layer 2 priority (0 - 7; from lowest to highest priority).
statusoption
Enable or disable this TLV.
"disable"Do not transmit this network policy TLV.
"enable"Transmit this TLV if a VLAN has been addded to the port.
vlanunsigned int32
ID of VLAN to advertise, if configured on port (0 - 4094, 0 = priority tag).
vlan-intfdatasource, refer to system interface, or fsp vlan (maximum 1)
VLAN interface to advertise; if configured on port.

 

switch-controller/lldp-settings (object)

Configure FortiSwitch LLDP settings.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/switch-controller/lldp-settings
Attribute ListDescriptions
device-detectionoption
Enable/disable dynamic detection of LLDP neighbor devices for VLAN assignment.
"disable"Disable dynamic detection of LLDP neighbor devices.
"enable"Enable dynamic detection of LLDP neighbor devices.
fast-start-intervalunsigned int32
Frequency of LLDP PDU transmission from FortiSwitch for the first 4 packets when the link is up (2 - 5 sec, default = 2, 0 = disable fast start).
management-interfaceoption
Primary management interface to be advertised in LLDP and CDP PDUs.
"internal"Use internal interface.
"mgmt"Use management interface.
tx-holdunsigned int32
Number of tx-intervals before local LLDP data expires (1 - 16, default = 4). Packet TTL is tx-hold * tx-interval.
tx-intervalunsigned int32
Frequency of LLDP PDU transmission from FortiSwitch (5 - 4095 sec, default = 30). Packet TTL is tx-hold * tx-interval.

Object URL:

Attribute ListDescriptions
altitudestring
+/- Floating point no. eg. 117.47.
altitude-unitoption
m ( meters), f ( floors).
"m"set altitude unit meters
"f"set altitude unit floors
datumoption
WGS84, NAD83, NAD83/MLLW.
"WGS84"set coordinates datum WGS84
"NAD83"set coordinates datum NAD83
"NAD83/MLLW"set coordinates datum NAD83/MLLW
latitudestring
Floating point start with ( +/- ) or end with ( N or S ) eg. +/-16.67 or 16.67N.
longitudestring
Floating point start with ( +/- ) or end with ( E or W ) eg. +/-26.789 or 26.789E.

Attribute ListDescriptions
link-down-authoption
Authentication state to set if a link is down.
"set-unauth"Interface set to unauth when down. Reauthentication is needed.
"no-action"Interface reauthentication is not needed.
local-overrideoption
Enable to override global 802.1X settings on individual FortiSwitches.
"disable"Use global 802.1X settings.
"enable"Override global 802.1X settings.
max-reauth-attemptunsigned int32
Maximum number of authentication attempts (0 - 15, default = 3).
reauth-periodunsigned int32
Reauthentication time interval (1 - 1440 min, default = 60, 0 = disable).
tx-periodunsigned int32
802.1X Tx period (seconds, default=30).

Object URL:

Attribute ListDescriptions
access-modeoption
Access mode of the port.
"normal"Normal mode.
"nac"NAC mode.
aggregator-modeoption
LACP member select mode.
"bandwidth"Member selection based on largest total bandwidth of links of similar speed.
"count"Member selection based on largest count of similar link speed.
allowed-vlansdatasource, refer to switch-controller vlan, system interface, or fsp vlan
Configure switch port tagged vlans
allowed-vlans-alloption
Enable/disable all defined vlans on this port.
"disable"Disable all defined VLANs on this port.
"enable"Enable all defined VLANs on this port.
