system/global (object)

Configure global attributes.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/system/global
Attribute ListDescriptions
admin-concurrentoption
Enable/disable concurrent administrator logins. (Use policy-auth-concurrent for firewall authenticated users.)
"disable"Disable admin concurrent login.
"enable"Enable admin concurrent login.
admin-console-timeoutunsigned int32
Console login timeout that overrides the admintimeout value. (15 - 300 seconds) (15 seconds to 5 minutes). 0 the default, disables this timeout.
admin-hsts-max-ageunsigned int32
HTTPS Strict-Transport-Security header max-age in seconds. A value of 0 will reset any HSTS records in the browser.When admin-https-redirect is disabled the header max-age will be 0.
admin-https-pki-requiredoption
Enable/disable admin login method. Enable to force administrators to provide a valid certificate to log in if PKI is enabled. Disable to allow administrators to log in with a certificate or password.
"disable"Admin users can login by providing a valid certificate or password.
"enable"Admin users must provide a valid certificate when PKI is enabled for HTTPS admin access.
admin-https-redirectoption
Enable/disable redirection of HTTP administration access to HTTPS.
"disable"Disable redirecting HTTP administration access to HTTPS.
"enable"Enable redirecting HTTP administration access to HTTPS.
admin-https-ssl-versionsflags
Allowed TLS versions for web administration.
"tlsv1-1"TLS 1.1.
"tlsv1-2"TLS 1.2.
"tlsv1-3"TLS 1.3.
admin-lockout-durationunsigned int32
Amount of time in seconds that an administrator account is locked out after reaching the admin-lockout-threshold for repeated failed login attempts.
admin-lockout-thresholdunsigned int32
Number of failed login attempts before an administrator account is locked out for the admin-lockout-duration.
admin-login-maxunsigned int32
Maximum number of administrators who can be logged in at the same time (1 - 100, default = 100)
admin-maintaineroption
Enable/disable maintainer administrator login. When enabled, the maintainer account can be used to log in from the console after a hard reboot. The password is "bcpb" followed by the FortiGate unit serial number. You have limited time to complete this login.
"disable"Disable login for special user (maintainer).
"enable"Enable login for special user (maintainer).
admin-portunsigned int32
Administrative access port for HTTP. (1 - 65535, default = 80).
admin-reset-buttonoption
press the reset button can reset to factory default
"disable"press the reset button cannot reset to factory default
"enable"press the reset button can reset to factory default
admin-restrict-localoption
Enable/disable local admin authentication restriction when remote authenticator is up and running. (default = disable)
"disable"Disable local admin authentication restriction.
"enable"Enable local admin authentication restriction.
admin-scpoption
Enable/disable using SCP to download the system configuration. You can use SCP as an alternative method for backing up the configuration.
"disable"Disable allow system configuration download by SCP.
"enable"Enable allow system configuration download by SCP.
admin-server-certdatasource, refer to vpn certificate local, or certificate local (maximum 1)
Server certificate that the FortiGate uses for HTTPS administrative connections.
admin-sportunsigned int32
Administrative access port for HTTPS. (1 - 65535, default = 443).
admin-ssh-grace-timeunsigned int32
Maximum time in seconds permitted between making an SSH connection to the FortiGate unit and authenticating (10 - 3600 sec (1 hour), default 120).
admin-ssh-passwordoption
Enable/disable password authentication for SSH admin access.
"disable"Disable password authentication for SSH admin access.
"enable"Enable password authentication for SSH admin access.
admin-ssh-portunsigned int32
Administrative access port for SSH. (1 - 65535, default = 22).
admin-ssh-v1option
Enable/disable SSH v1 compatibility.
"disable"Disable SSH v1 compatibility.
"enable"Enable SSH v1 compatibility.
admin-telnetoption
Enable/disable TELNET service.
"disable"Disable TELNET service.
"enable"Enable TELNET service.
admin-telnet-portunsigned int32
Administrative access port for TELNET. (1 - 65535, default = 23).
admintimeoutunsigned int16
Number of minutes before an idle administrator session times out (1 - 480 minutes (8 hours), default = 5). A shorter idle timeout is more secure.
aliasstring
Alias for your FortiGate unit.
allow-traffic-redirectoption
Disable to allow traffic to be routed back on a different interface.
"disable"Disable allow traffic redirect.
"enable"Enable allow traffic redirect.
anti-replayoption
Level of checking for packet replay and TCP sequence checking.
"disable"Disable anti-replay check.
"loose"Loose anti-replay check.
"strict"Strict anti-replay check.
arp-max-entryunsigned int32
Maximum number of dynamically learned MAC addresses that can be added to the ARP table (131072 - 2147483647, default = 131072).
auth-certdatasource, refer to vpn certificate local, or certificate local (maximum 1)
Server certificate that the FortiGate uses for HTTPS firewall authentication connections.
auth-http-portunsigned int32
User authentication HTTP port. (1 - 65535, default = 1000).
auth-https-portunsigned int32
User authentication HTTPS port. (1 - 65535, default = 1003).
auth-keepaliveoption
Enable to prevent user authentication sessions from timing out when idle.
"disable"Disable use of keep alive to extend authentication.
"enable"Enable use of keep alive to extend authentication.
auth-session-limitoption
Action to take when the number of allowed user authenticated sessions is reached.
"block-new"Block new user authentication attempts.
"logout-inactive"Logout the most inactive user authenticated sessions.
auto-auth-extension-deviceoption
Enable/disable automatic authorization of dedicated Fortinet extension devices.
"disable"Disable automatic authorization of dedicated Fortinet extension device globally.
"enable"Enable automatic authorization of dedicated Fortinet extension device globally.
autorun-log-fsckoption
Enable/disable automatic log partition check after ungraceful shutdown.
"disable"Disable automatic log partition check after ungraceful shutdown.
"enable"Enable automatic log partition check after ungraceful shutdown.
av-affinitystring
Affinity setting for AV scanning (hexadecimal value up to 256 bits in the format of xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx).
av-failopenoption
Set the action to take if the FortiGate is running low on memory or the proxy connection limit has been reached.
"off"Stop accepting new AV sessions when entering conserve mode, but continue to process current active sessions.
"pass"Bypass the antivirus system when memory is low. Antivirus scanning resumes when the low memory condition is resolved.
"one-shot"Bypass the antivirus system when memory is low.
av-failopen-sessionoption
When enabled and a proxy for a protocol runs out of room in its session table, that protocol goes into failopen mode and enacts the action specified by av-failopen.
"disable"Disable AV fail open session option.
"enable"Enable AV fail open session option.
batch-cmdboption
Enable/disable batch mode, allowing you to enter a series of CLI commands that will execute as a group once they are loaded.
"disable"Disable batch mode to execute in CMDB server.
"enable"Enable batch mode to execute in CMDB server.
block-session-timerunsigned int32
Duration in seconds for blocked sessions (1 - 300 sec (5 minutes), default = 30).
br-fdb-max-entryunsigned int32
Maximum number of bridge forwarding database (FDB) entries.
cert-chain-maxunsigned int32
Maximum number of certificates that can be traversed in a certificate chain.
cfg-revert-timeoutunsigned int32
Time-out for reverting to the last saved configuration. (10 - 4294967295 seconds, default = 600).
cfg-saveoption
Configuration file save mode for CLI changes.
"automatic"Automatically save config.
"manual"Manually save config.
"revert"Manually save config and revert the config when timeout.
check-protocol-headeroption
Level of checking performed on protocol headers. Strict checking is more thorough but may affect performance. Loose checking is ok in most cases.
"loose"Check protocol header loosely.
"strict"Check protocol header strictly.
check-reset-rangeoption
Configure ICMP error message verification. You can either apply strict RST range checking or disable it.
"disable"Disable RST range check.
"strict"Check RST range strictly.
cli-audit-logoption
Enable/disable CLI audit log.
"disable"Disable CLI audit log.
"enable"Enable CLI audit log.
cloud-communicationoption
Enable/disable all cloud communication.
"disable"Disable all cloud-related settings.
"enable"Allow cloud communication.
clt-cert-reqoption
Enable/disable requiring administrators to have a client certificate to log into the GUI using HTTPS.
"disable"Disable require client certificate for GUI login.
"enable"Enable require client certificate for GUI login.
cpu-use-thresholdunsigned int32
Threshold at which CPU usage is reported. (% of total CPU, default = 90).
csr-ca-attributeoption
Enable/disable the CA attribute in certificates. Some CA servers reject CSRs that have the CA attribute.
"disable"Disable CA attribute in CSR.
"enable"Enable CA attribute in CSR.
daily-restartoption
Enable/disable daily restart of FortiGate unit. Use the restart-time option to set the time of day for the restart.
"disable"Disable daily reboot of the FortiGate.
"enable"Enable daily reboot of the FortiGate.
default-service-source-portstring
Default service source port range. (default=1-65535)
device-idle-timeoutunsigned int32
Time in seconds that a device must be idle to automatically log the device user out. (30 - 31536000 sec (30 sec to 1 year), default = 300).
dh-paramsoption
Number of bits to use in the Diffie-Hellman exchange for HTTPS/SSH protocols.
"1024"1024 bits.
"1536"1536 bits.
"2048"2048 bits.
"3072"3072 bits.
"4096"4096 bits.
"6144"6144 bits.
"8192"8192 bits.
dnsproxy-worker-countunsigned int32
DNS proxy worker count. For a FortiGate unit with multiple logical CPUs, the number of DNS processes may be set to 1 to the number of logical CPUs.
dp-fragment-timerunsigned int32
DP fragment session timeout (1 - 65535 sec, default = 120).
dp-pinhole-timerunsigned int32
DP pinhole session timeout (30 - 120 sec, default = 120).
dp-rsync-timerunsigned int32
DP rsync session timeout (1 - 65535 sec, default = 300).
dp-tcp-normal-timerunsigned int32
DP tcp normal timeout (1 - 65535 sec, default = 3605).
dp-udp-idle-timerunsigned int32
DP udp idle timer (0 - 86400 sec, default = 0). Default is to follow udp-idle-timer.
dstoption
Enable/disable daylight saving time.
"disable"Disable daylight saving time.
"enable"Enable daylight saving time.
edit-vdom-promptoption
Enable/disable edit new VDOM prompt.
"disable"Disable edit new VDOM prompt.
"enable"Enable edit new VDOM prompt.
faz-disk-buffer-sizeunsigned int32
Maximum disk buffer size to temporarily store logs destined for FortiAnalyzer. To be used in the event that FortiAnalyzer is unavailalble.
fds-statisticsoption
Enable/disable sending IPS, Application Control, and AntiVirus data to FortiGuard. This data is used to improve FortiGuard services and is not shared with external parties and is protected by Fortinet's privacy policy.
"disable"Disable FortiGuard statistics.
"enable"Enable FortiGuard statistics.
fds-statistics-periodunsigned int32
FortiGuard statistics collection period in minutes. (1 - 1440 min (1 min to 24 hours), default = 60).
fec-portunsigned int32
Local UDP port for Forward Error Correction (49152 - 65535).
fgd-alert-subscriptionflags
Type of alert to retrieve from FortiGuard.
"advisory"Retrieve FortiGuard advisories, report and news alerts.
"latest-threat"Retrieve latest FortiGuard threats alerts.
"latest-virus"Retrieve latest FortiGuard virus alerts.
"latest-attack"Retrieve latest FortiGuard attack alerts.
"new-antivirus-db"Retrieve FortiGuard AV database release alerts.
"new-attack-db"Retrieve FortiGuard IPS database release alerts.
forticontroller-proxyoption
Enable/disable FortiController proxy.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
forticontroller-proxy-portunsigned int32
FortiController proxy port (1024 - 49150).
fortiextenderoption
Enable/disable FortiExtender.
"disable"Disable FortiExtender controller.
"enable"Enable FortiExtender controller.
fortiextender-data-portunsigned int32
FortiExtender data port (1024 - 49150, default = 25246).
fortiextender-vlan-modeoption
Enable/disable FortiExtender VLAN mode.
"disable"Disable FortiExtender VLAN mode.
"enable"Enable FortiExtender VLAN mode.
fortiservice-portunsigned int32
FortiService port (1 - 65535, default = 8013). Used by FortiClient endpoint compliance. Older versions of FortiClient used a different port.
fortitoken-cloudoption
Enable/disable FortiToken Cloud service.
"disable"Disable FortiToken Cloud service.
"enable"Enable FortiToken Cloud service.
gui-allow-default-hostnameoption
Enable/disable the factory default hostname warning on the GUI setup wizard.
"disable"Do not display the feature in GUI.
"enable"Display the feature in GUI.
gui-allow-incompatible-fabric-fgtoption
Enable/disable Allow FGT with incompatible firmware to be treated as compatible in security fabric on the GUI. May cause unexpected error.
"disable"Do not display the feature in GUI.
"enable"Display the feature in GUI.
gui-certificatesoption
Enable/disable the System > Certificate GUI page, allowing you to add and configure certificates from the GUI.
"disable"Do not display the feature in GUI.
"enable"Display the feature in GUI.
gui-custom-languageoption
Enable/disable custom languages in GUI.
"disable"Do not display the feature in GUI.
"enable"Display the feature in GUI.
gui-date-formatoption
Default date format used throughout GUI.
"yyyy/MM/dd"Year/Month/Day.
"dd/MM/yyyy"Day/Month/Year.
"MM/dd/yyyy"Month/Day/Year.
"yyyy-MM-dd"Year-Month-Day.
"dd-MM-yyyy"Day-Month-Year.
"MM-dd-yyyy"Month-Day-Year.
gui-date-time-sourceoption
Source from which the FortiGate GUI uses to display date and time entries.
"system"Use this FortiGate unit's configured timezone.
"browser"Use the web browser's timezone.
gui-device-latitudestring
Add the latitude of the location of this FortiGate to position it on the Threat Map.
gui-device-longitudestring
Add the longitude of the location of this FortiGate to position it on the Threat Map.
gui-display-hostnameoption
Enable/disable displaying the FortiGate's hostname on the GUI login page.
"disable"Do not display the feature in GUI.
"enable"Display the feature in GUI.
gui-firmware-upgrade-setup-warningoption
"disable"
"enable"
gui-firmware-upgrade-warningoption
Enable/disable the firmware upgrade warning on the GUI.
"disable"Do not display the feature in GUI.
"enable"Display the feature in GUI.
gui-fortisandbox-cloudoption
Enable/disable displaying FortiSandbox Cloud on the GUI.
"disable"Do not display the feature in GUI.
"enable"Display the feature in GUI.
gui-ipv6option
Enable/disable IPv6 settings on the GUI.
"disable"Do not display the feature in GUI.
"enable"Display the feature in GUI.
gui-lines-per-pageunsigned int32
gui-themeoption
Color scheme for the administration GUI.
"blue"Light blue theme.
"green"Green theme.
"melongene"Melongene theme (eggplant color).
"mariner"Mariner theme (dark blue color).
"neutrino"Neutrino theme.
gui-wireless-opensecurityoption
Enable/disable wireless open security option on the GUI.
"disable"Do not display the feature in GUI.
"enable"Display the feature in GUI.
honor-dfoption
Enable/disable honoring of Don't-Fragment (DF) flag.
"disable"Disable honoring of Don't-Fragment flag.
"enable"Enable honoring of Don't-Fragment flag.
hostnamestring
FortiGate unit's hostname. Most models will truncate names longer than 24 characters. Some models support hostnames up to 35 characters.
igmp-state-limitunsigned int32
Maximum number of IGMP memberships (96 - 64000, default = 3200).
internal-switch-modeoption
Internal switch mode.
"interface"
internal-switch-speedflags
Internal port speed.
"auto"
"10full"10M full.
"10half"10M half.
"100full"100M full.
"100half"100M half.
"1000full"1000M Full
ip-src-port-rangeunsigned int16 range
IP source port range used for traffic originating from the FortiGate unit.
ips-affinitystring
Affinity setting for IPS (hexadecimal value up to 256 bits in the format of xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx; allowed CPUs must be less than total number of IPS engine daemons).
ipsec-asic-offloadoption
Enable/disable ASIC offloading (hardware acceleration) for IPsec VPN traffic. Hardware acceleration can offload IPsec VPN sessions and accelerate encryption and decryption.
"disable"Disable ASIC offload for IPsec VPN.
"enable"Enable ASIC offload for IPsec VPN.
ipsec-hmac-offloadoption
Enable/disable offloading (hardware acceleration) of HMAC processing for IPsec VPN.
"disable"Disable offload IPsec HMAC processing to hardware.
"enable"Enable offload IPsec HMAC processing to hardware if possible.
ipsec-qat-offloadoption
Enable/disable QAT offloading (Intel QuickAssist) for IPsec VPN traffic. QuickAssist can accelerate IPsec encryption and decryption.
"disable"Disable QAT offload for IPsec VPN.
"enable"Enable QAT offload for IPsec VPN.
ipsec-soft-dec-asyncoption
Enable/disable software decryption asynchronization (using multiple CPUs to do decryption) for IPsec VPN traffic.
"disable"Disable software decryption asynchronization for IPsec VPN.
"enable"Enable software decryption asynchronization for IPsec VPN.
ipv6-accept-dadunsigned int32
Enable/disable acceptance of IPv6 Duplicate Address Detection (DAD).
ipv6-allow-anycast-probeoption
Enable/disable IPv6 address probe through Anycast.
"disable"Disable probing of IPv6 address space through Anycast
"enable"Enable probing of IPv6 address space through Anycast
irq-time-accountingoption
Configure CPU IRQ time accounting mode.
"auto"Automatically switch CPU accounting mode.
"force"Force the use of CPU IRQ time accounting mode.
languageoption
GUI display language.
"english"English.
"simch"Simplified Chinese.
"japanese"Japanese.
"korean"Korean.
"spanish"Spanish.
"trach"Traditional Chinese.
"french"French.
"portuguese"Portuguese.
ldapconntimeoutunsigned int32
Global timeout for connections with remote LDAP servers in milliseconds (1 - 300000, default 500).
legacy-poe-device-supportoption
Enable/disable legacy POE device support.
"disable"Disable legacy POE device support.
"enable"Enable legacy POE device support.
lldp-receptionoption
Enable/disable Link Layer Discovery Protocol (LLDP) reception.
"disable"Disable reception of Link Layer Discovery Protocol (LLDP).
"enable"Enable reception of Link Layer Discovery Protocol (LLDP).
lldp-transmissionoption
Enable/disable Link Layer Discovery Protocol (LLDP) transmission.
"disable"Disable transmission of Link Layer Discovery Protocol (LLDP).
"enable"Enable transmission of Link Layer Discovery Protocol (LLDP).
log-ssl-connectionoption
Enable/disable logging of SSL connection events.
"disable"Disable logging of SSL connection events.
"enable"Enable logging of SSL connection events.
log-uuid-addressoption
Enable/disable insertion of address UUIDs to traffic logs.
"disable"Disable insertion of address UUID to traffic logs.
"enable"Enable insertion of address UUID to traffic logs.
log-uuid-policyoption
"disable"
"enable"
login-timestampoption
Enable/disable login time recording.
"disable"Disable login time recording.
"enable"Enable login time recording.
long-vdom-nameoption
Enable/disable long VDOM name support.
"disable"Disable long VDOM name support.
"enable"Enable long VDOM name support.
management-vdomdatasource, refer to system vdom (maximum 1)
Management virtual domain name.
max-route-cache-sizeunsigned int32
Maximum number of IP route cache entries (0 - 2147483647).
memory-use-threshold-extremeunsigned int32
Threshold at which memory usage is considered extreme (new sessions are dropped) (% of total RAM, default = 95).
memory-use-threshold-greenunsigned int32
Threshold at which memory usage forces the FortiGate to exit conserve mode (% of total RAM, default = 82).
memory-use-threshold-redunsigned int32
Threshold at which memory usage forces the FortiGate to enter conserve mode (% of total RAM, default = 88).
miglog-affinitystring
Affinity setting for logging (64-bit hexadecimal value in the format of xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx).
miglogd-childrenunsigned int32
Number of logging (miglogd) processes to be allowed to run. Higher number can reduce performance; lower number can slow log processing time. No logs will be dropped or lost if the number is changed.
multi-factor-authenticationoption
Enforce all login methods to require an additional authentication factor (default = optional).
"optional"Do not enforce all login methods to require an additional authentication factor (controlled by user settings).
"mandatory"Enforce all login methods to require an additional authentication factor.
ndp-max-entryunsigned int32
Maximum number of NDP table entries (set to 65,536 or higher; if set to 0, kernel holds 65,536 entries).
optimize-flow-modeoption
Flow mode optimization option.
"disable"Disable flow mode optimization.
"enable"Enable flow mode optimization.
per-user-bwloption
Enable/disable per-user black/white list filter.
"disable"Disable per-user black/white list filter.
"enable"Enable per-user black/white list filter.
policy-auth-concurrentunsigned int32
Number of concurrent firewall use logins from the same user (1 - 100, default = 0 means no limit).
post-login-banneroption
Enable/disable displaying the administrator access disclaimer message after an administrator successfully logs in.
"disable"Disable post-login banner.
"enable"Enable post-login banner.
pre-login-banneroption
Enable/disable displaying the administrator access disclaimer message on the login page before an administrator logs in.
"disable"Disable pre-login banner.
"enable"Enable pre-login banner.
private-data-encryptionoption
Enable/disable private data encryption using an AES 128-bit key or passpharse.
"disable"Disable private data encryption using an AES 128-bit key.
"enable"Enable private data encryption using an AES 128-bit key.
proxy-auth-lifetimeoption
Enable/disable authenticated users lifetime control. This is a cap on the total time a proxy user can be authenticated for after which re-authentication will take place.
"disable"Disable authenticated users lifetime control.
"enable"Enable authenticated users lifetime control.
proxy-auth-lifetime-timeoutunsigned int32
Lifetime timeout in minutes for authenticated users (5 - 65535 min, default=480 (8 hours)).
proxy-auth-timeoutunsigned int32
Authentication timeout in minutes for authenticated users (1 - 300 min, default = 10).
proxy-hardware-accelerationoption
Enable/disable email proxy hardware acceleration.
"disable"Disable email proxy hardware acceleration.
"enable"Enable email proxy hardware acceleration.
proxy-re-authentication-modeoption
Control if users must re-authenticate after a session is closed, traffic has been idle, or from the point at which the user was first created.
"session"Proxy re-authentication timeout begins at the closure of the session.
"traffic"Proxy re-authentication timeout begins after traffic has not been received.
"absolute"Proxy re-authentication timeout begins when the user was first created.
proxy-worker-countunsigned int32
Proxy worker count.
qsfp28-40g-portstring array
Set port(s) to 40Gbps
radius-portunsigned int16
RADIUS service port number.
reboot-upon-config-restoreoption
Enable/disable reboot of system upon restoring configuration.
"disable"Disable reboot of system upon restoring configuration.
"enable"Enable reboot of system upon restoring configuration.
refreshunsigned int32
Statistics refresh interval second(s) in GUI.
remoteauthtimeoutunsigned int32
Number of seconds that the FortiGate waits for responses from remote RADIUS, LDAP, or TACACS+ authentication servers. (1-300 sec, default = 5).
reset-sessionless-tcpoption
Action to perform if the FortiGate receives a TCP packet but cannot find a corresponding session in its session table. NAT/Route mode only.
"disable"Disable reset session-less TCP.
"enable"Enable reset session-less TCP.
restart-timetime
Daily restart time (hh:mm).
revision-backup-on-logoutoption
Enable/disable back-up of the latest configuration revision when an administrator logs out of the CLI or GUI.
"disable"Disable revision config backup automatically when logout.
"enable"Enable revision config backup automatically when logout.
revision-image-auto-backupoption
Enable/disable back-up of the latest configuration revision after the firmware is upgraded.
"disable"Disable revision image backup automatically when upgrading image.
"enable"Enable revision image backup automatically when upgrading image.
scanunit-countunsigned int32
Number of scanunits. The range and the default depend on the number of CPUs. Only available on FortiGate units with multiple CPUs.
security-rating-result-submissionoption
Enable/disable the submission of Security Rating results to FortiGuard.
"disable"Disable submission of Security Rating results to FortiGuard.
"enable"Enable submission of Security Rating results to FortiGuard.
security-rating-run-on-scheduleoption
Enable/disable scheduled runs of Security Rating.
"disable"Disable scheduled runs of Security Rating.
"enable"Enable scheduled runs of Security Rating.
send-pmtu-icmpoption
Enable/disable sending of path maximum transmission unit (PMTU) - ICMP destination unreachable packet and to support PMTUD protocol on your network to reduce fragmentation of packets.
"disable"Disable sending of PMTU ICMP destination unreachable packet.
"enable"Enable sending of PMTU ICMP destination unreachable packet.
show-backplane-intfoption
show/hide backplane interfaces
"disable"hide backplane interfaces
"enable"show backplane interfaces
snat-route-changeoption
Enable/disable the ability to change the static NAT route.
"disable"Disable SNAT route change.
"enable"Enable SNAT route change.
special-file-23-supportoption
Enable/disable detection of those special format files when using Data Leak Protection.
"disable"Disable detection of those special format files when using Data Leak Protection.
"enable"Enable detection of those special format files when using Data Leak Protection.
split-portstring array
Split port(s) to multiple 10Gbps ports.
ssd-trim-dateunsigned int32
Date within a month to run ssd trim.
ssd-trim-freqoption
How often to run SSD Trim (default = weekly). SSD Trim prevents SSD drive data loss by finding and isolating errors.
"daily"Run SSD Trim Daily.
"weekly"Run SSD Trim Weekly.
"monthly"Run SSD Trim Monthly.
"hourly"Run SSD Trim Hourly.
"never"Never Run SSD Trim.
ssd-trim-hourunsigned int32
Hour of the day on which to run SSD Trim (0 - 23, default = 1).
ssd-trim-minunsigned int32
Minute of the hour on which to run SSD Trim (0 - 59, 60 for random).
ssd-trim-weekdayoption
Day of week to run SSD Trim.
"sunday"Sunday
"monday"Monday
"tuesday"Tuesday
"wednesday"Wednesday
"thursday"Thursday
"friday"Friday
"saturday"Saturday
ssh-cbc-cipheroption
Enable/disable CBC cipher for SSH access.
"disable"Disable CBC cipher for SSH access.
"enable"Enable CBC cipher for SSH access.
ssh-hmac-md5option
Enable/disable HMAC-MD5 for SSH access.
"disable"Disable HMAC-MD5 for SSH access.
"enable"Enable HMAC-MD5 for SSH access.
ssh-kex-sha1option
Enable/disable SHA1 key exchange for SSH access.
"disable"Disable SHA1 for SSH key exchanges.
"enable"Enable SHA1 for SSH key exchanges.
ssh-mac-weakoption
Enable/disable HMAC-SHA1 and UMAC-64-ETM for SSH access.
"disable"Disable HMAC-SHA1 and UMAC-64-ETM for SSH access.
"enable"Enable HMAC-SHA1 and UMAC-64-ETM for SSH access.
ssl-min-proto-versionoption
Minimum supported protocol version for SSL/TLS connections (default = TLSv1.2).
"TLSv1"TLSv1.
"TLSv1-1"TLSv1.1.
"TLSv1-2"TLSv1.2.
"SSLv3"SSLv3.
"TLSv1-3"TLSv1.3.
ssl-static-key-ciphersoption
Enable/disable static key ciphers in SSL/TLS connections (e.g. AES128-SHA, AES256-SHA, AES128-SHA256, AES256-SHA256).
"disable"Disable static key ciphers in SSL/TLS connections.
"enable"Enable static key ciphers in SSL/TLS connections.
sslvpn-cipher-hardware-accelerationoption
Enable/disable SSL-VPN hardware acceleration.
"disable"Disable SSL-VPN cipher hardware acceleration.
"enable"Enable SSL-VPN cipher hardware acceleration.
sslvpn-ems-sn-checkoption
Enable/disable verification of EMS serial number in SSL-VPN connection.
"disable"Disable verification of EMS serial number in SSL-VPN connection.
"enable"Enable verification of EMS serial number in SSL-VPN connection.
sslvpn-kxp-hardware-accelerationoption
Enable/disable SSL-VPN KXP hardware acceleration.
"disable"Disable KXP SSL-VPN hardware acceleration.
"enable"Enable KXP SSL-VPN hardware acceleration.
sslvpn-max-worker-countunsigned int32
Maximum number of SSL-VPN processes. Upper limit for this value is the number of CPUs and depends on the model. Default value of zero means the SSLVPN daemon decides the number of worker processes.
sslvpn-plugin-version-checkoption
Enable/disable checking browser's plugin version by SSL-VPN.
"disable"Disable SSL-VPN automatic checking of browser plug-in version.
"enable"Enable SSL-VPN automatic checking of browser plug-in version.
strict-dirty-session-checkoption
Enable to check the session against the original policy when revalidating. This can prevent dropping of redirected sessions when web-filtering and authentication are enabled together. If this option is enabled, the FortiGate unit deletes a session if a routing or policy change causes the session to no longer match the policy that originally allowed the session.
"disable"Disable strict dirty-session check.
"enable"Enable strict dirty-session check.
strong-cryptooption
Enable to use strong encryption and only allow strong ciphers (AES, 3DES) and digest (SHA1) for HTTPS/SSH/TLS/SSL functions.
"disable"Disable strong crypto for HTTPS/SSH/TLS/SSL.
"enable"Enable strong crypto for HTTPS/SSH/TLS/SSL.
switch-controlleroption
Enable/disable switch controller feature. Switch controller allows you to manage FortiSwitch from the FortiGate itself.
"disable"Disable switch controller feature.
"enable"Enable switch controller feature.
switch-controller-reserved-networkIPv4 address/mask
Enable reserved network subnet for controlled switches. This is available when the switch controller is enabled.
sys-perf-log-intervalunsigned int32
Time in minutes between updates of performance statistics logging. (1 - 15 min, default = 5, 0 = disabled).
tcp-halfclose-timerunsigned int32
Number of seconds the FortiGate unit should wait to close a session after one peer has sent a FIN packet but the other has not responded (1 - 86400 sec (1 day), default = 120).
tcp-halfopen-timerunsigned int32
Number of seconds the FortiGate unit should wait to close a session after one peer has sent an open session packet but the other has not responded (1 - 86400 sec (1 day), default = 10).
tcp-optionoption
Enable SACK, timestamp and MSS TCP options.
"disable"Disable TCP option.
"enable"Enable TCP option.
tcp-timewait-timerunsigned int32
Length of the TCP TIME-WAIT state in seconds.
tftpoption
Enable/disable TFTP.
"disable"Disable TFTP.
"enable"Enable TFTP.

traffic-priorityoption
Choose Type of Service (ToS) or Differentiated Services Code Point (DSCP) for traffic prioritization in traffic shaping.
"tos"IP TOS.
"dscp"DSCP (DiffServ) DS.
traffic-priority-leveloption
Default system-wide level of priority for traffic prioritization.
"high"High priority.
"medium"Medium priority.
"low"Low priority.
two-factor-email-expiryunsigned int32
Email-based two-factor authentication session timeout (30 - 300 seconds (5 minutes), default = 60).
two-factor-fac-expiryunsigned int32
FortiAuthenticator token authentication session timeout (10 - 3600 seconds (1 hour), default = 60).
two-factor-ftk-expiryunsigned int32
FortiToken authentication session timeout (60 - 600 sec (10 minutes), default = 60).
two-factor-ftm-expiryunsigned int32
FortiToken Mobile session timeout (1 - 168 hours (7 days), default = 72).
two-factor-sms-expiryunsigned int32
SMS-based two-factor authentication session timeout (30 - 300 sec, default = 60).
udp-idle-timerunsigned int32
UDP connection session timeout. This command can be useful in managing CPU and memory resources (1 - 86400 seconds (1 day), default = 60).
url-filter-affinitystring
URL filter CPU affinity.
url-filter-countunsigned int32
URL filter daemon count.
user-server-certdatasource, refer to vpn certificate local, or certificate local (maximum 1)
Certificate to use for https user authentication.
vdom-modeoption
Enable/disable support for split/multiple virtual domains (VDOMs).
"no-vdom"Disable split/multiple VDOMs mode.
"multi-vdom"Enable multiple VDOMs mode.
"split-vdom"Enable split VDOMs mode.
vip-arp-rangeoption
Controls the number of ARPs that the FortiGate sends for a Virtual IP (VIP) address range.
"restricted"Send ARPs for the first 8192 addresses in VIP range.
"unlimited"Send ARPs for all addresses in VIP range.
virtual-switch-vlanoption
Enable/disable virtual switch VLAN.
"disable"Disable virtual switch VLAN.
"enable"Enable virtual switch VLAN.
wad-affinitystring
Affinity setting for wad (hexadecimal value up to 256 bits in the format of xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx).
wad-csvc-cs-countunsigned int32
Number of concurrent WAD-cache-service object-cache processes.
wad-csvc-db-countunsigned int32
Number of concurrent WAD-cache-service byte-cache processes.
wad-memory-change-granularityunsigned int32
Minimum percentage change in system memory usage detected by the wad daemon prior to adjusting TCP window size for any active connection.
wad-source-affinityoption
Enable/disable dispatching traffic to WAD workers based on source affinity.
"disable"Disable dispatching traffic to WAD workers based on source affinity.
"enable"Enable dispatching traffic to WAD workers based on source affinity.
wad-worker-countunsigned int32
Number of explicit proxy WAN optimization daemon (WAD) processes. By default WAN optimization, explicit proxy, and web caching is handled by all of the CPU cores in a FortiGate unit.
wifi-ca-certificatedatasource, refer to vpn certificate ca, or certificate ca (maximum 1)
CA certificate that verifies the WiFi certificate.
wifi-certificatedatasource, refer to vpn certificate local, or certificate local (maximum 1)
Certificate to use for WiFi authentication.
wimax-4g-usboption
Enable/disable comparability with WiMAX 4G USB devices.
"disable"Disable WiMax 4G.
"enable"Enable WiMax 4G.
wireless-controlleroption
Enable/disable the wireless controller feature to use the FortiGate unit to manage FortiAPs.
"disable"Disable wireless controller.
"enable"Enable wireless controller.
wireless-controller-portunsigned int32
Port used for the control channel in wireless controller mode (wireless-mode is ac). The data channel port is the control channel port number plus one (1024 - 49150, default = 5246).
wireless-modeoption
Wireless mode setting.
"ac"Wireless controller with local wireless.
"client"Wireless client mode.
"fwfap"Obsolete wireless AP mode.
xstools-update-frequencyunsigned int32
Xenserver tools daemon update frequency (30 - 300 sec, default = 60).

 

system/gre-tunnel (table)

Configure GRE tunnel.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/system/gre-tunnel
Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/system/gre-tunnel/<gre-tunnel_name>
Attribute ListDescriptions
checksum-receptionoption
Enable/disable validating checksums in received GRE packets.
"disable"Do not validate checksums in received GRE packets.
"enable"Validate checksums in received GRE packets.
checksum-transmissionoption
Enable/disable including checksums in transmitted GRE packets.
"disable"Do not include checksums in transmitted GRE packets.
"enable"Include checksums in transmitted GRE packets.
diffservcodestring
DiffServ setting to be applied to GRE tunnel outer IP header.
dscp-copyingoption
Enable/disable DSCP copying.
"disable"Disable DSCP copying.
"enable"Enable DSCP copying.
interfacedatasource, refer to system interface (maximum 1)
Interface name.
ip-versionoption
IP version to use for VPN interface.
"4"Use IPv4 addressing for gateways.
"6"Use IPv6 addressing for gateways.
keepalive-failtimesunsigned int32
Number of consecutive unreturned keepalive messages before a GRE connection is considered down (1 - 255).
keepalive-intervalunsigned int32
Keepalive message interval (0 - 32767, 0 = disabled).
key-inboundunsigned int32
Require received GRE packets contain this key (0 - 4294967295).
key-outboundunsigned int32
Include this key in transmitted GRE packets (0 - 4294967295).
local-gwIPv4 address
IP address of the local gateway.
local-gw6IPv6 address
IPv6 address of the local gateway.
namestring, master key
Tunnel name.
remote-gwIPv4 address
IP address of the remote gateway.
remote-gw6IPv6 address
IPv6 address of the remote gateway.
sequence-number-receptionoption
Enable/disable validating sequence numbers in received GRE packets.
"disable"Do not validate sequence number in received GRE packets.
"enable"Validate sequence numbers in received GRE packets.
sequence-number-transmissionoption
Enable/disable including of sequence numbers in transmitted GRE packets.
"disable"Include sequence numbers in transmitted GRE packets.
"enable"Do not include sequence numbers in transmitted GRE packets.

 

system/ha (object)

Configure HA.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/system/ha
Attribute ListDescriptions
arpsunsigned int8
Number of gratuitous ARPs (1 - 60). Lower to reduce traffic. Higher to reduce failover time.
arps-intervalunsigned int32
Time between gratuitous ARPs (1 - 20 sec). Lower to reduce failover time. Higher to reduce traffic.
authenticationoption
Enable/disable heartbeat message authentication.
"disable"Disable heartbeat message authentication.
"enable"Enable heartbeat message authentication.
board-failover-toleranceunsigned int32
Worker board failure failover threshold.
chassis-idunsigned int32
chassis id
cpu-thresholdstring
Dynamic weighted load balancing CPU usage weight and high and low thresholds.
encryptionoption
Enable/disable heartbeat message encryption.
"disable"Disable heartbeat message encryption.
"enable"Enable heartbeat message encryption.
frupoption
"disable"
"enable"
frup-settingsobject
ftp-proxy-thresholdstring
Dynamic weighted load balancing weight and high and low number of FTP proxy sessions.
gratuitous-arpsoption
Enable/disable gratuitous ARPs. Disable if link-failed-signal enabled.
"disable"Disable gratuitous ARPs.
"enable"Enable gratuitous ARPs.
group-idunsigned int16
HA group ID (0 - 255). Must be the same for all members.
group-namestring
Cluster group name. Must be the same for all members.
ha-directoption
Enable/disable using ha-mgmt interface for syslog, SNMP, remote authentication (RADIUS), FortiAnalyzer, FortiSandbox, sFlow, and Netflow.
"disable"Disable using ha-mgmt interface for syslog, SNMP, remote authentication (RADIUS), FortiAnalyzer, FortiManager, FortiSandbox, sFlow, and Netflow.
"enable"Enable using ha-mgmt interface for syslog, SNMP, remote authentication (RADIUS), FortiAnalyzer, FortiManager, FortiSandbox, sFlow, and Netflow.
ha-eth-typestring
HA heartbeat packet Ethertype (4-digit hex).
ha-mgmt-interfacestable
ha-mgmt-statusoption
Enable to reserve interfaces to manage individual cluster units.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
ha-port-dtag-modeoption
HA port double-tagging mode.
"proprietary"Proprietary mode.
"double-tagging"Double tagging mode.
ha-port-outer-tpidoption
Set HA port outer tpid.
"0x8100"HA outer TPID 0x8100
"0x88a8"HA outer TPID 0x88a8
"0x9100"HA outer TPID 0x9100
ha-uptime-diff-marginunsigned int32
Normally you would only reduce this value for failover testing.
hb-intervalunsigned int16
Time between sending heartbeat packets (1 - 20 (100*ms)). Increase to reduce false positives.
hb-lost-thresholdunsigned int16
Number of lost heartbeats to signal a failure (1 - 60). Increase to reduce false positives.
hbdevhbdev
Heartbeat interfaces. Must be the same for all members.
hbdev-second-vlan-idunsigned int32
second VLAN id to use for HA heartbeat (1-4094).
hbdev-vlan-idunsigned int32
VLAN id to use for HA heartbeat (1-4094).
hc-eth-typestring
Transparent mode HA heartbeat packet Ethertype (4-digit hex).
hello-holddownunsigned int32
Time to wait before changing from hello to work state (5 - 300 sec).
http-proxy-thresholdstring
Dynamic weighted load balancing weight and high and low number of HTTP proxy sessions.
imap-proxy-thresholdstring
Dynamic weighted load balancing weight and high and low number of IMAP proxy sessions.
keypassword
l2ep-eth-typestring
Telnet session HA heartbeat packet Ethertype (4-digit hex).
link-failed-signaloption
Enable to shut down all interfaces for 1 sec after a failover. Use if gratuitous ARPs do not update network.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
load-balance-alloption
Enable to load balance TCP sessions. Disable to load balance proxy sessions only.
"disable"Disable load balance.
"enable"Enable load balance.
logical-snoption
Enable/disable usage of the logical serial number.
"disable"Disable usage of the logical serial number.
"enable"Enable usage of the logical serial number.
memory-compatible-modeoption
Enable/disable memory compatible mode.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
memory-thresholdstring
Dynamic weighted load balancing memory usage weight and high and low thresholds.
minimum-worker-thresholdunsigned int32
The minimum number of operating workers to cause a content clustering chassis failover.
modeoption
HA mode. Must be the same for all members. FGSP requires standalone.
"standalone"Standalone mode.
"a-a"Active-active mode.
"a-p"Active-passive mode.
monitordatasource, refer to system interface (maximum 64)
Interfaces to check for port monitoring (or link failure).
multicast-ttlunsigned int32
HA multicast TTL on primary (5 - 3600 sec).
nntp-proxy-thresholdstring
Dynamic weighted load balancing weight and high and low number of NNTP proxy sessions.
overrideoption
Enable and increase the priority of the unit that should always be primary.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
override-wait-timeunsigned int32
Delay negotiating if override is enabled (0 - 3600 sec). Reduces how often the cluster negotiates.
passwordpassword
Cluster password. Must be the same for all members.
pingserver-failover-thresholdunsigned int32
Remote IP monitoring failover threshold (0 - 50).
pingserver-flip-timeoutunsigned int32
Time to wait in minutes before renegotiating after a remote IP monitoring failover.
pingserver-monitor-interfacedatasource, refer to system interface (maximum 64)
Interfaces to check for remote IP monitoring.
pingserver-slave-force-resetoption
"disable"
"enable"
pop3-proxy-thresholdstring
Dynamic weighted load balancing weight and high and low number of POP3 proxy sessions.
priorityunsigned int32
Increase the priority to select the primary unit (0 - 255).
route-holdunsigned int32
Time to wait between routing table updates to the cluster (0 - 3600 sec).
route-ttlunsigned int32
TTL for primary unit routes (5 - 3600 sec). Increase to maintain active routes during failover.
route-waitunsigned int32
Time to wait before sending new routes to the cluster (0 - 3600 sec).
scheduleoption
Type of A-A load balancing. Use none if you have external load balancers.
"none"None.
"hub"Hub.
"leastconnection"Least connection.
"round-robin"Round robin.
"weight-round-robin"Weight round robin.
"random"Random.
"ip"IP.
"ipport"IP port.
secondary-vclusterobject
session-pickupoption
Enable/disable session pickup. Enabling it can reduce session down time when fail over happens.
"disable"Disable session pickup.
"enable"Enable session pickup.
session-pickup-connectionlessoption
Enable/disable UDP and ICMP session sync.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
session-pickup-delayoption
Enable to sync sessions longer than 30 sec. Only longer lived sessions need to be synced.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
session-pickup-expectationoption
Enable/disable session helper expectation session sync for FGSP.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
session-pickup-natoption
Enable/disable NAT session sync for FGSP.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.

"disable"
"enable"
smtp-proxy-thresholdstring

ssd-failoveroption

"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.

Enable/disable FGSP configuration synchronization.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.

"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.

"disable"Disable configuration synchronization.
"enable"Enable configuration synchronization.

"disable"Disable HA packet distribution to multiple CPUs.
"enable"Enable HA packet distribution to multiple CPUs.
unicast-hboption
Enable/disable unicast heartbeat.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.

Unicast heartbeat netmask.

uninterruptible-upgradeoption

"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
vcluster-idunsigned int32

"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
vdomdatasource, refer to system vdom
VDOMs in virtual cluster 1.
weightarray
Weight-round-robin weight for each cluster unit. Syntax <priority> <weight>.

Configure interfaces.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/system/interface

Attribute ListDescriptions
ac-namestring
PPPoE server name.
aggregatestring
algorithmoption
Frame distribution algorithm.
"L2"Use layer 2 address for distribution.
"L3"Use layer 3 address for distribution.
"L4"Use layer 4 information for distribution.
aliasstring
Alias will be displayed with the interface name to make it easier to distinguish.

Permitted types of management access to this interface.
"https"HTTPS access.
"ping"PING access.
"ssh"SSH access.

Description.

"sdwan"Set outgoing interface by SD-WAN or policy routing rules.

"enable"DHCP relay agent.

"regular"Regular DHCP relay.
"ipsec"DHCP relay for IPsec.
dhcp-renew-timeunsigned int32
DHCP renew time in seconds (300-604800), 0 means use the renew time provided by the server.
disc-retry-timeoutunsigned int32
Time in seconds to wait before retrying to start a PPPoE discovery, 0 means no timeout.
disconnect-thresholdunsigned int32
Time in milliseconds to wait before sending a notification that this interface is down or disconnected.
distanceunsigned int32
Distance for routes learned through PPPoE or DHCP, lower distance indicates preferred route.
dns-server-overrideoption
Enable/disable use DNS acquired by DHCP or PPPoE.
"disable"No not use DNS acquired by DHCP or PPPoE.
"enable"Use DNS acquired by DHCP or PPPoE.
drop-fragmentoption

"disable"Do not drop fragment packets.
"enable"Enable/disable drop fragment packets.

"disable"Disable drop of overlapped fragment packets.
"enable"Enable drop of overlapped fragment packets.
egress-cosoption

"cos2"CoS 2.

estimated-upstream-bandwidthunsigned int32

"disable"Disable explicit FTP proxy on this interface.
"enable"Enable explicit FTP proxy on this interface.
explicit-web-proxyoption
Enable/disable the explicit web proxy on this interface.
"disable"Disable explicit Web proxy on this interface.
"enable"Enable explicit Web proxy on this interface.
externaloption
Enable/disable identifying the interface as an external interface (which usually means it's connected to the Internet).
"disable"Disable identifying the interface as an external interface.
"enable"Enable identifying the interface as an external interface.
fail-action-on-extenderoption
Action on extender when interface fail .
"soft-restart"Soft-restart-on-extender.
"hard-restart"Hard-restart-on-extender.
"reboot"Reboot-on-extender.

Names of the FortiGate interfaces to which the link failure alert is sent.
fail-alert-methodoption
Select link-failed-signal or link-down method to alert about a failed link.
"link-failed-signal"Link-failed-signal.
"link-down"Link-down.
fail-detectoption
Enable/disable fail detection features for this interface.
"disable"Disable interface failed option status.
"enable"Enable interface failed option status.
fail-detect-optionflags
Options for detecting that this interface has failed.
"detectserver"Use a ping server to determine if the interface has failed.
"link-down"Use port detection to determine if the interface has failed.
fortilinkoption
Enable FortiLink to dedicate this interface to manage other Fortinet devices.
"disable"Disable FortiLink to dedicated interface for managing FortiSwitch devices.
"enable"Enable FortiLink to dedicated interface for managing FortiSwitch devices.
fortilink-backup-linkunsigned int32

"lldp"Detect FortiLink neighbors using LLDP protocol.
"fortilink"Detect FortiLink neighbors using FortiLink protocol.

"disable"Disable FortiLink split interface.
"enable"Enable FortiLink split interface to connect member link to different FortiSwitch in stack for uplink redundancy.
fortilink-stackingoption
Enable/disable FortiLink switch-stacking on this interface.
"disable"Disable FortiLink switch stacking.
"enable"Enable FortiLink switch stacking.
forward-domainunsigned int32

"disable"Disable forward error correction (FEC).
"enable"Enable forward error correction (FEC).
"rs-fec"Enable Reed Solomon (CL91) forward-error-correction.
"base-r-fec"Enable Firecode (CL74) forward-error-correction.

"disable"disable Gi Gatekeeper
"enable"enable Gi Gatekeeper

"enable"Enable ICMP accept redirect.

"enable"Enable sending of ICMP redirects.

"disable"Disable determining a user's identity from packet identification.
"enable"Enable determining a user's identity from packet identification.
idle-timeoutunsigned int32
PPPoE auto disconnect after idle timeout seconds, 0 means no timeout.
inbandwidthunsigned int32
Bandwidth limit for incoming traffic (0 - 80000000 kbps), 0 means unlimited.

interfacedatasource, refer to system interface (maximum 1)
Interface name.
internalunsigned int32
Implicitly created.

Interface IPv4 address and subnet mask, syntax: X.X.X.X/24.

"disable"Disable automatic IP address assignment of this interface by FortiIPAM.
"enable"Enable automatic IP address assignment of this interface by FortiIPAM.

"disable"Disable IP/MAC binding.
"enable"Enable IP/MAC binding.

"disable"Disable IPS sniffer mode.
"enable"Enable IPS sniffer mode.

ipv6object

"disable"Disable L2 forwarding.
"enable"Enable L2 forwarding.
l2tp-clientoption
Enable/disable this interface as a Layer 2 Tunnelling Protocol (L2TP) client.
"disable"Disable L2TP client.
"enable"Enable L2TP client.
l2tp-client-settingsobject
lacp-ha-slaveoption
LACP HA slave.
"disable"Block HA slave from sending/receiving LACP messages.
"enable"Allow HA slave to send/receive LACP messages.
lacp-modeoption
LACP mode.
"static"Use static aggregation, do not send and ignore any LACP messages.
"passive"Passively use LACP to negotiate 802.3ad aggregation.
"active"Actively use LACP to negotiate 802.3ad aggregation.
lacp-speedoption
How often the interface sends LACP messages.
"slow"Send LACP message every 30 seconds.
"fast"Send LACP message every second.
lcp-echo-intervalunsigned int32
Time in seconds between PPPoE Link Control Protocol (LCP) echo requests.
lcp-max-echo-failsunsigned int32
Maximum missed LCP echo messages before disconnect.
link-up-delayunsigned int32
Number of milliseconds to wait before considering a link is up.
lldp-network-policydatasource, refer to system lldp network-policy (maximum 1)
LLDP-MED network policy profile.
lldp-receptionoption
Enable/disable Link Layer Discovery Protocol (LLDP) reception.
"disable"Disable reception of Link Layer Discovery Protocol (LLDP).
"enable"Enable reception of Link Layer Discovery Protocol (LLDP).
"vdom"Use VDOM Link Layer Discovery Protocol (LLDP) reception configuration setting.
lldp-transmissionoption
Enable/disable Link Layer Discovery Protocol (LLDP) transmission.
"enable"Enable transmission of Link Layer Discovery Protocol (LLDP).
"disable"Disable transmission of Link Layer Discovery Protocol (LLDP).
"vdom"Use VDOM Link Layer Discovery Protocol (LLDP) transmission configuration setting.
macaddrmac address
Change the interface's MAC address.
managed-subnetwork-sizeoption
Number of IP addresses to be allocated by FortiIPAM and used by this FortiGate unit's DHCP server settings.
"256"Allocate a subnet with 256 IP addresses.
"512"Allocate a subnet with 512 IP addresses.
"1024"Allocate a subnet with 1024 IP addresses.
"2048"Allocate a subnet with 2048 IP addresses.
"4096"Allocate a subnet with 4096 IP addresses.
"8192"Allocate a subnet with 8192 IP addresses.
"16384"Allocate a subnet with 16384 IP addresses.
"32768"Allocate a subnet with 32768 IP addresses.
"65536"Allocate a subnet with 65536 IP addresses.
management-ipIPv4 address/mask
High Availability in-band management IP address of this interface.
max-egress-burst-rateunsigned int32
Max egress burst rate (kbits per sec).
max-egress-rateunsigned int32
Max egress rate (kbits per sec).
measured-downstream-bandwidthunsigned int32
Measured downstream bandwidth (kbps).
measured-upstream-bandwidthunsigned int32
Measured upstream bandwidth (kbps).
mediatypeoption
Select SFP media interface type
"serdes-sfp"SFP using SerDes Media Interface
"sgmii-sfp"SFP using SGMII Media Interface
"cfp2-sr10"Use CFP2-SR10 transceiver
"cfp2-lr4"Use CFP2-LR4 transceiver
"serdes-copper-sfp"Copper SFP using SerDes media Interface.
"sr"Use Short Range transceiver
"cr"Use Copper transceiver
"lr"Use Long Range transceiver
"qsfp28-sr4"Use QSFP28-SR4 transceiver
"qsfp28-lr4"Use QSFP28-LR4 transceiver
"qsfp28-cr4"Use QSFP28-CR4 transceiver
"sr4"Use Short Range transceiver(4 lane)
"cr4"Use Copper transceiver(4 lane)
"lr4"Use Long Range transceiver(4 lane)
memberdatasource, refer to system interface
Physical interfaces that belong to the aggregate or redundant interface.
min-linksunsigned int32
Minimum number of aggregated ports that must be up.
min-links-downoption
Action to take when less than the configured minimum number of links are active.
"operational"Set the aggregate operationally down.
"administrative"Set the aggregate administratively down.
modeoption
Addressing mode (static, DHCP, PPPoE).
"static"Static setting.
"dhcp"External DHCP client mode.
"pppoe"External PPPoE mode.
"pppoa"External PPPoATM mode.
monitor-bandwidthoption
Enable monitoring bandwidth on this interface.
"disable"Disable monitoring bandwidth on this interface.
"enable"Enable monitoring bandwidth on this interface.
mtuunsigned int32
MTU value for this interface.
mtu-overrideoption
Enable to set a custom MTU for this interface.
"disable"Use default MTU (1500).
"enable"Override default MTU.
mux-typeoption
Multiplexer type
"llc-encaps"LLC encapsulation.
"vc-encaps"VC encapsulation.
namestring, master key
Name.
ndiscforwardoption
Enable/disable NDISC forwarding.
"disable"Disable NDISC forwarding.
"enable"Enable NDISC forwarding.
netbios-forwardoption
Enable/disable NETBIOS forwarding.
"disable"Disable NETBIOS forwarding.
"enable"Enable NETBIOS forwarding.
netflow-sampleroption
Enable/disable NetFlow on this interface and set the data that NetFlow collects (rx, tx, or both).
"disable"Disable NetFlow protocol on this interface.
"tx"Monitor transmitted traffic on this interface.
"rx"Monitor received traffic on this interface.
"both"Monitor transmitted/received traffic on this interface.
outbandwidthunsigned int32
Bandwidth limit for outgoing traffic (0 - 80000000 kbps).
padt-retry-timeoutunsigned int32
PPPoE Active Discovery Terminate (PADT) used to terminate sessions after an idle time.
passwordpassword
PPPoE account's password.
phy-modeoption
DSL physical mode.
"adsl"ADSL/ADSL2/ADSL2+.
"vdsl"VDSL.
poeoption
Enable/disable PoE status.
"disable"Disable PoE status.
"enable"Enable PoE status.
polling-intervalunsigned int32
sFlow polling interval (1 - 255 sec).
pppoe-unnumbered-negotiateoption
Enable/disable PPPoE unnumbered negotiation.
"disable"Disable IP address negotiating for unnumbered.
"enable"Enable IP address negotiating for unnumbered.
pptp-auth-typeoption
PPTP authentication type.
"auto"Automatically choose authentication.
"pap"PAP authentication.
"chap"CHAP authentication.
"mschapv1"MS-CHAPv1 authentication.
"mschapv2"MS-CHAPv2 authentication.
pptp-clientoption
Enable/disable PPTP client.
"disable"Disable PPTP client.
"enable"Enable PPTP client.
pptp-passwordpassword
PPTP password.
pptp-server-ipIPv4 address
PPTP server IP address.
pptp-timeoutunsigned int32
Idle timer in minutes (0 for disabled).
pptp-userstring
PPTP user name.
preserve-session-routeoption
Enable/disable preservation of session route when dirty.
"disable"Disable preservation of session route when dirty.
"enable"Enable preservation of session route when dirty.
priorityunsigned int32
Priority of learned routes.
priority-overrideoption
Enable/disable fail back to higher priority port once recovered.
"disable"Disable fail back to higher priority port once recovered.
"enable"Enable fail back to higher priority port once recovered.
proxy-captive-portaloption
Enable/disable proxy captive portal on this interface.
"disable"Disable proxy captive portal on this interface.
"enable"Enable proxy captive portal on this interface.
redundant-interfacestring
remote-ipIPv4 address/mask
Remote IP address of tunnel.
replacemsg-override-groupdatasource, refer to system replacemsg-group (maximum 1)
Replacement message override group.
retransmissionoption
Enable/disable DSL retransmission.
"disable"Disable retransmission.
"enable"Enable retransmission.
ring-rxunsigned int32

ring-txunsigned int32

roleoption
Interface role.
"lan"Connected to local network of endpoints.
"wan"Connected to Internet.
"dmz"Connected to server zone.
"undefined"Interface has no specific role.
sample-directionoption
Data that NetFlow collects (rx, tx, or both).
"rx"Monitor received traffic on this interface.
"tx"Monitor transmitted traffic on this interface.
"both"Monitor transmitted/received traffic on this interface.
sample-rateunsigned int32
sFlow sample rate (10 - 99999).
secondary-IPoption
Enable/disable adding a secondary IP to this interface.
"disable"Disable secondary IP.
"enable"Enable secondary IP.
secondaryiptable

"slave"802.1X slave mode.

"enable"Enable MAC authentication bypass.
"mac-auth-only"Enable MAC authentication bypass without EAP.

"none"No security option.
"captive-portal"Captive portal authentication.
"802.1X"802.1X port-based authentication.
security-redirect-urlstring

Enable/disable sFlow on this interface.
"disable"Disable sFlow protocol on this interface.
"enable"Enable sFlow protocol on this interface.
snmp-indexunsigned int32
Permanent SNMP Index of the interface.
speedoption
Interface speed. The default setting and the options available depend on the interface hardware.
"auto"Automatically adjust speed.
"10full"10M full-duplex.
"10half"10M half-duplex.
"100full"100M full-duplex.
"100half"100M half-duplex.
"1000full"1000M full-duplex.
"1000half"1000M half-duplex.
"10000full"10G full-duplex.
"1000auto"1000M auto adjust.
"10000auto"10G auto.
"40000full"40G full-duplex.
"100Gfull"100G full-duplex.
"25000full"25G full-duplex.
"40000auto"40G auto.
"25000auto"25G auto.
"100Gauto"100G auto.
spillover-thresholdunsigned int32
Egress Spillover threshold (0 - 16776000 kbps), 0 means unlimited.
src-checkoption
Enable/disable source IP check.
"disable"Disable source IP check.
"enable"Enable source IP check.
statusoption
Bring the interface up or shut the interface down.
"down"Shut the interface down.
"up"Bring the interface up.
stpoption
Enable/disable STP.
"disable"Disable STP.
"enable"Enable STP.
stp-ha-slaveoption
Control STP behaviour on HA slave.
"disable"Disable STP negotiation on HA slave.
"enable"Enable STP negotiation on HA slave.
"priority-adjust"Enable STP negotiation on HA slave and make priority lower than HA master.
stpforwardoption
Enable/disable STP forwarding.
"disable"Disable STP forwarding.
"enable"Enable STP forwarding.
stpforward-modeoption
Configure STP forwarding mode.
"rpl-all-ext-id"Replace all extension IDs (root, bridge).
"rpl-bridge-ext-id"Replace the bridge extension ID only.
"rpl-nothing"Replace nothing.
substoption
Enable to always send packets from this interface to a destination MAC address.
"disable"Do not send packets from this interface.
"enable"Send packets from this interface.
substitute-dst-macmac address
Destination MAC address that all packets are sent to from this interface.
swc-vlanunsigned int32
switchstring
switch-controller-access-vlanoption
Block FortiSwitch port-to-port traffic.
"disable"Allow normal VLAN traffic.
"enable"Block FortiSwitch port-to-port traffic on the VLAN, only permitting traffic to and from the FortiGate.

"disable"Disable ARP inspection for FortiSwitch devices.
"enable"Enable ARP inspection for FortiSwitch devices.

"disable"Disable DHCP snooping for FortiSwitch devices.
"enable"Enable DHCP snooping for FortiSwitch devices.

"disable"Disable DHCP snooping insert option82 for FortiSwitch devices.
"enable"Enable DHCP snooping insert option82 for FortiSwitch devices.

"enable"Enable DHCP snooping verify source MAC for FortiSwitch devices.

"none"VLAN for generic purpose.
"default-vlan"Default VLAN (native) assigned to all switch ports upon discovery.
"quarantine"VLAN for quarantined traffic.
"voice"VLAN dedicated for voice devices.
"rspan"VLAN for RSPAN/ERSPAN mirrored traffic.
"video"VLAN dedicated for camera devices.
"nac"VLAN dedicated for NAC onboarding devices.

"enable"Enable IGMP snooping.

"enable"Enable IGMP snooping fast-leave.

"disable"Disable IGMP snooping proxy.
"enable"Enable IGMP snooping proxy.

Limit the number of dynamic MAC addresses on this VLAN (1 - 128, 0 = no limit, default).

VLAN to use for FortiLink management purposes.

"atm"Asynchronous transfer mode.

"physical"Physical interface.

system/interface/client-options (table)

DHCP client options.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/system/interface/<interface_name>/client-options
Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/system/interface/<interface_name>/client-options/<client-options_id>
Attribute ListDescriptions
codeunsigned int32
DHCP client option code.
idsequence, master key
ID.
ipstring array
DHCP option IPs.
typeoption
DHCP client option type.
"hex"DHCP option in hex.
"string"DHCP option in string.
"ip"DHCP option in IP.
"fqdn"DHCP option in domain search option format.
valuestring
DHCP client option value.

"rapid"
"iapd"
"iana"

"disable"Disable DHCPv6 relay
"enable"Enable DHCPv6 relay.

"regular"Regular DHCP relay.

"snmp"SNMP access.
"http"HTTP access.

"fgfm"FortiManager access.

"disable"Disable using the DNS server acquired by DHCP.

ip6-link-mtuunsigned int32

"enable"Enable the managed IPv6 flag.

ip6-min-intervalunsigned int32

"static"Static setting.
"dhcp"DHCPv6 client mode.
"pppoe"IPv6 over PPPoE mode.
"delegated"IPv6 address with delegated prefix.

"disable"Disable the other IPv6 flag.
"enable"Enable the other IPv6 flag.

ip6-reachable-timeunsigned int32

ip6-retrans-timeunsigned int32

"disable"Disable sending advertisements about this interface.
"enable"Enable sending advertisements about this interface.

Subnet to routing prefix, syntax: xxxx:xxxx:xxxx:xxxx:xxxx:xxxx:xxxx:xxxx/xxx
ip6-upstream-interfacedatasource, refer to system interface (maximum 1)
Interface name providing delegated information.
nd-certdatasource, refer to certificate local, or vpn certificate local (maximum 1)
Neighbor discovery certificate.
nd-cga-modifierstring
Neighbor discovery CGA modifier.
nd-modeoption
Neighbor discovery mode.
"basic"Do not support SEND.
"SEND-compatible"Support SEND.
nd-security-levelunsigned int32
Neighbor discovery security level (0 - 7; 0 = least secure, default = 0).
nd-timestamp-deltaunsigned int32
Neighbor discovery timestamp delta value (1 - 3600 sec; default = 300).
nd-timestamp-fuzzunsigned int32
Neighbor discovery timestamp fuzz factor (1 - 60 sec; default = 1).
unique-autoconf-addroption
Enable/disable unique auto config address.
"disable"Disable unique auto-configuration address.
"enable"Enable unique auto-configuration address.

"disable"Disable virtual MAC for VRRP.
"enable"Enable virtual MAC for VRRP.

system/interface/ipv6/vrrp6 (table)

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/system/interface/<interface_name>/ipv6/vrrp6
Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/system/interface/<interface_name>/ipv6/vrrp6/<vrrp6_vrid>
Attribute ListDescriptions
accept-modeoption
Enable/disable accept mode.
"disable"Disable accept mode.
"enable"Enable accept mode.
adv-intervalunsigned int32
Advertisement interval (1 - 255 seconds).
preemptoption
Enable/disable preempt mode.
"disable"Disable preempt mode.
"enable"Enable preempt mode.
priorityunsigned int32
Priority of the virtual router (1 - 255).
start-timeunsigned int32
Startup time (1 - 255 seconds).
statusoption
Enable/disable VRRP.
"disable"Disable VRRP.
"enable"Enable VRRP.
vrdst6IPv6 address array
Monitor the route to this destination.
vrgrpunsigned int32
VRRP group ID (1 - 65535).
vridunsigned int32, master key
Virtual router identifier (1 - 255).
vrip6IPv6 address
IPv6 address of the virtual router.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:

Attribute ListDescriptions
auth-typeoption
L2TP authentication type.
"auto"Automatically choose authentication.
"pap"PAP authentication.
"chap"CHAP authentication.
"mschapv1"MS-CHAPv1 authentication.
"mschapv2"MS-CHAPv2 authentication.
defaultgwoption
Enable/disable default gateway.
"disable"Disable default gateway.
"enable"Enable default gateway.
distanceunsigned int32
Distance of learned routes.
ipIPv4 address/mask
mtuunsigned int32
L2TP MTU.
passwordpassword
L2TP password.
peer-hoststring
L2TP peer host address.
peer-maskIPv4 mask
L2TP peer mask.
peer-portunsigned int32
L2TP peer port number.
priorityunsigned int32
Priority of learned routes.
userstring

"ping"PING access.

"fgfm"FortiManager access.
"radius-acct"RADIUS accounting access.
"probe-response"Probe access.
"ftm"FTM access.
"fabric"Security Fabric access.

VRRP configuration.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/system/interface/<interface_name>/vrrp
Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/system/interface/<interface_name>/vrrp/<vrrp_vrid>
Attribute ListDescriptions
accept-modeoption
Enable/disable accept mode.
"disable"Disable accept mode.
"enable"Enable accept mode.
adv-intervalunsigned int32
Advertisement interval (1 - 255 seconds).
ignore-default-routeoption
Enable/disable ignoring of default route when checking destination.
"disable"Disable ignoring of default route when checking destination.
"enable"Enable ignoring of default route when checking destination.
preemptoption
Enable/disable preempt mode.
"disable"Disable preempt mode.
"enable"Enable preempt mode.
priorityunsigned int32
Priority of the virtual router (1 - 255).
proxy-arptable
start-timeunsigned int32
Startup time (1 - 255 seconds).
statusoption
Enable/disable this VRRP configuration.
"disable"Disable this VRRP configuration.
"enable"Enable this VRRP configuration.
versionoption
VRRP version.
"2"VRRP version 2.
"3"VRRP version 3.
vrdstIPv4 address array
Monitor the route to this destination.
vrdst-priorityunsigned int32
Priority of the virtual router when the virtual router destination becomes unreachable (0 - 254).
vrgrpunsigned int32
VRRP group ID (1 - 65535).
vridunsigned int32, master key
Virtual router identifier (1 - 255).
vripIPv4 address
IP address of the virtual router.

system/ips (object)

Configure IPS system settings.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/system/ips
Attribute ListDescriptions
override-signature-hold-by-idoption
Enable/disable override of hold of triggering signatures that are specified by IDs regardless of hold.
"disable"Do not trigger the signatures that are on hold.
"enable"Allow the signatures specified by IDs to be triggered even if they are on hold.
signature-hold-timestring
Time to hold and monitor IPS signatures. Format <#d##h> (day range: 0 - 7, hour range: 0 - 23, max hold time: 7d0h, default hold time: 0d0h).

Attribute ListDescriptions
algorithmoption

"L3"Use layer 3 address for distribution.
"L4"Use layer 4 information for distribution.
"round-robin"Per-packet round-robin distribution.
"redundant"Use first tunnel that is up for all traffic.
"weighted-round-robin"Weighted round-robin distribution.
memberdatasource, refer to vpn ipsec phase1-interface
Member tunnels of the aggregate.
namestring, master key

system/link-monitor (table)

Configure Link Health Monitor.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/system/link-monitor
Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/system/link-monitor/<link-monitor_name>
Attribute ListDescriptions
addr-modeoption
Address mode (IPv4 or IPv6).
"ipv4"IPv4 mode.
"ipv6"IPv6 mode.
failtimeunsigned int32
Number of retry attempts before the server is considered down (1 - 10, default = 5)
gateway-ipIPv4 address
Gateway IP address used to probe the server.
gateway-ip6IPv6 address
Gateway IPv6 address used to probe the server.
http-agentstring
String in the http-agent field in the HTTP header.
http-getstring
If you are monitoring an HTML server you can send an HTTP-GET request with a custom string. Use this option to define the string.
http-matchstring
String that you expect to see in the HTTP-GET requests of the traffic to be monitored.
intervalunsigned int32
Detection interval in milliseconds (500 - 3600 * 1000 msec, default = 500).
namestring, master key
Link monitor name.
packet-sizeunsigned int32
Packet size of a twamp test session,
passwordpassword
Twamp controller password in authentication mode
portunsigned int32
Port number of the traffic to be used to monitor the server.
probe-countunsigned int32
Number of most recent probes that should be used to calculate latency and jitter (5 - 30, default = 30).
probe-timeoutunsigned int32
Time to wait before a probe packet is considered lost (500 - 5000 msec, default = 500).
protocolflags
Protocols used to monitor the server.
"ping"PING link monitor.
"tcp-echo"TCP echo link monitor.
"udp-echo"UDP echo link monitor.
"http"HTTP-GET link monitor.
"twamp"TWAMP link monitor.
"ping6"
recoverytimeunsigned int32
Number of successful responses received before server is considered recovered (1 - 10, default = 5).
security-modeoption
Twamp controller security mode.
"none"Unauthenticated mode.
"authentication"Authenticated mode.
serverstring array
IP address of the server(s) to be monitored.
source-ipIPv4 address
Source IP address used in packet to the server.
source-ip6IPv6 address
Source IPv6 address used in packet to the server.
srcintfdatasource, refer to system interface (maximum 1)
Interface that receives the traffic to be monitored.
statusoption
Enable/disable this link monitor.
"disable"Disable this link monitor.
"enable"Enable this link monitor.
update-cascade-interfaceoption
Enable/disable update cascade interface.
"disable"Disable update cascade interface.
"enable"Enable update cascade interface.
update-static-routeoption
Enable/disable updating the static route.
"disable"Disable updating the static route.
"enable"Enable updating the static route.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/system/lldp/network-policy/<network-policy_name>/guest
Attribute ListDescriptions
dscpunsigned int32
Differentiated Services Code Point (DSCP) value to advertise.
priorityunsigned int32
802.1P CoS/PCP to advertise (0 - 7; from lowest to highest priority).
statusoption
Enable/disable advertising this policy.
"disable"Disable advertising this LLDP network policy.
"enable"Enable advertising this LLDP network policy.
tagoption
Advertise tagged or untagged traffic.
"none"Advertise that untagged frames should be used.
"dot1q"Advertise that 802.1Q (VLAN) tagging should be used.
"dot1p"Advertise that 802.1P priority tagging (VLAN 0) should be used.
vlanunsigned int32
802.1Q VLAN ID to advertise (1 - 4094).

system/lte-modem (object)

Configure USB LTE/WIMAX devices.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/system/lte-modem
Attribute ListDescriptions
allow-modify-wireless-profile-tableoption
Allow FortiGate to modify the wireless profile table if the internal LTE modem is running the GENERIC modem firmware.
"disable"Do not allow LTE daemon to modify wireless profile table.
"enable"Allow LTE daemon to modify wireless profile table.
apnstring
Login APN string for PDP-IP packet data calls.
authtypeoption
Authentication type for PDP-IP packet data calls.
"none"Username and password not required.
"pap"Use PAP authentication.
"chap"Use CHAP authentication.
"both"Use PAP/CHAP authentication.
auto-connectoption
Enable/disable modem auto connect.
"disable"Disable modem auto connect.
"enable"Enable modem auto connect.
band-restrictionsstring
Bitmaps for the allowed 3G and LTE bands.Ex: 0000000000000000-0000000000001008 (3G Mask-LTE Mask)
billing-dateunsigned int32
LTE Modem billing date (1 - 31).
connection-auto-switchoption
"disable"
"enable"
data-limitunsigned int32
LTE Modem data limit (0 - 100000) mega bytes, 0 for unlimited data.
data-usage-trackingoption
Enable/disable data usage tracking.
"disable"Disable data usage tracking.
"enable"Enable data usage tracking.
extra-initstring
Extra initialization string for USB LTE/WIMAX devices.
force-wireless-profileunsigned int32
Force to use wireless profile index (1 - 16), 0 if don't force.
gps-portunsigned int32
Modem GPS port index (0 - 20).
gps-serviceoption
Enable/disable GPS daemon.
"disable"Disable GPS daemon.
"enable"Enable GPS daemon.
holddown-timerunsigned int32
Hold down timer (10 - 60 sec).
image-preferenceoption
Modem Image Preference.
"auto-sim"Auto Select Firmware.
"generic"Generic Firmware.
"att"AT&T Firmware.
"verizon"Verizon Firmware.
"telus"Telus Firmware.
"docomo"DOCOMO Firmware.
"softbank"Softbank Firmware.
"sprint"Sprint Firmware.
"no-change"Do not change.
interfacedatasource, refer to system interface (maximum 1)
The interface that the modem is acting as a redundant interface for.
manual-handoveroption
Enable/Disable manual handover from 3G to LTE network.
"disable"Disable 3G to LTE manual handover.
"enable"Enable 3G to LTE manual handover.
modeoption
Modem operation mode.
"standalone"Standalone modem operation mode.
"redundant"Redundant modem operation mode where the modem is used as a backup interface.
modem-portunsigned int32
Modem port index (0 - 20).
network-typeoption
Wireless network type.
"auto"Automatic detection
"umts-3g"UMTS 3G -- For networks use GSM technology
"lte"LTE
"cdma-hrpd"CDMA and HRPD -- For networks use CDMA technology
passwdpassword
Authentication password for PDP-IP packet data calls.
sim-auto-switchoption
"disable"
"enable"
sim-slotunsigned int32
SIM card slot (1 - 2). 1: right slot. 2: left slot.
statusoption
Enable/disable USB LTE/WIMAX device.
"disable"Disable USB LTE/WIMA device.
"enable"Enable USB LTE/WIMA device.
usernamestring
Authentication username for PDP-IP packet data calls.

Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/system/mac-address-table/<mac-address-table_mac>
Attribute ListDescriptions
interfacedatasource, refer to system interface (maximum 1)
Interface name.
macmac address, master key
MAC address.
reply-substitutemac address
New MAC for reply traffic.

 

system/mobile-tunnel (table)

Configure Mobile tunnels, an implementation of Network Mobility (NEMO) extensions for Mobile IPv4 RFC5177.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/system/mobile-tunnel
Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/system/mobile-tunnel/<mobile-tunnel_name>
Attribute ListDescriptions
hash-algorithmoption
Hash Algorithm (Keyed MD5).
"hmac-md5"Keyed MD5.
home-addressIPv4 address
Home IP address (Format: xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx).
home-agentIPv4 address
IPv4 address of the NEMO HA (Format: xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx).
lifetimeunsigned int32
NMMO HA registration request lifetime (180 - 65535 sec, default = 65535).
n-mhae-keystring
NEMO authentication key.
n-mhae-key-typeoption
NEMO authentication key type (ascii or base64).
"ascii"The authentication key is an ASCII string.
"base64"The authentication key is Base64 encoded.
n-mhae-spiunsigned int32
NEMO authentication SPI (default: 256).
namestring, master key
Tunnel name.
networktable
reg-intervalunsigned int32
NMMO HA registration interval (5 - 300, default = 5).
reg-retryunsigned int32
Maximum number of NMMO HA registration retries (1 to 30, default = 3).
renew-intervalunsigned int32
Time before lifetime expiraton to send NMMO HA re-registration (5 - 60, default = 60).
roaming-interfacedatasource, refer to system interface (maximum 1)
Select the associated interface name from available options.
statusoption
Enable/disable this mobile tunnel.
"disable"Disable this mobile tunnel.
"enable"Enable this mobile tunnel.
tunnel-modeoption
NEMO tunnnel mode (GRE tunnel).
"gre"GRE tunnel.
