system/snmp/community (table)

SNMP community configuration.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/system/snmp/community
Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/system/snmp/community/<community_id>
Attribute ListDescriptions
eventsflags
SNMP trap events.
"cpu-high"Send a trap when CPU usage is high.
"mem-low"Send a trap when available memory is low.
"log-full"Send a trap when log disk space becomes low.
"intf-ip"Send a trap when an interface IP address is changed.
"vpn-tun-up"Send a trap when a VPN tunnel comes up.
"vpn-tun-down"Send a trap when a VPN tunnel goes down.
"ha-switch"Send a trap after an HA failover when the backup unit has taken over.
"ha-hb-failure"Send a trap when HA heartbeats are not received.
"ips-signature"Send a trap when IPS detects an attack.
"ips-anomaly"Send a trap when IPS finds an anomaly.
"av-virus"Send a trap when AntiVirus finds a virus.
"av-oversize"Send a trap when AntiVirus finds an oversized file.
"av-pattern"Send a trap when AntiVirus finds file matching pattern.
"av-fragmented"Send a trap when AntiVirus finds a fragmented file.
"fm-if-change"Send a trap when FortiManager interface changes. Send a FortiManager trap.
"fm-conf-change"Send a trap when a configuration change is made by a FortiGate administrator and the FortiGate is managed by FortiManager.
"temperature-high"Send a trap when a temperature sensor registers a temperature that is too high.
"voltage-alert"Send a trap when a voltage sensor registers a voltage that is outside of the normal range.
"ha-member-up"Send a trap when an HA cluster member goes up.
"ha-member-down"Send a trap when an HA cluster member goes down.
"ent-conf-change"Send a trap when an entity MIB change occurs (RFC4133).
"av-conserve"Send a trap when the FortiGate enters conserve mode.
"av-bypass"Send a trap when the FortiGate enters bypass mode.
"av-oversize-passed"Send a trap when AntiVirus passes an oversized file.
"av-oversize-blocked"Send a trap when AntiVirus blocks an oversized file.
"ips-pkg-update"Send a trap when the IPS signature database or engine is updated.
"power-supply-failure"Send a trap when a power supply fails.
"faz-disconnect"Send a trap when a FortiAnalyzer disconnects from the FortiGate.
"fan-failure"Send a trap when a fan fails.
"bgp-established"Send a trap when a BGP FSM transitions to the established state.
"bgp-backward-transition"Send a trap when a BGP FSM goes from a high numbered state to a lower numbered state.
"wc-ap-up"Send a trap when a managed FortiAP comes up.
"wc-ap-down"Send a trap when a managed FortiAP goes down.
"fswctl-session-up"Send a trap when a FortiSwitch controller session comes up.
"fswctl-session-down"Send a trap when a FortiSwitch controller session goes down.
"ips-fail-open"Send a trap when the IPS network buffer is full.
"load-balance-real-server-down"Send a trap when a server load balance real server goes down.
"device-new"Send a trap when a new device is found.
"enter-intf-bypass"Enter interface bypass mode.
"exit-intf-bypass"Exit interface bypass mode.
"per-cpu-high"Send a trap when per-CPU usage is high.
"power-blade-down"Power down blade due to insufficient power.
"confsync_failure"Confsync out-of-sync due to hit max sync turns.
"dhcp"Send a trap when the DHCP server exhausts the IP pool, an IP address already is in use, or a DHCP client interface received a DHCP-NAK.
hoststable
hosts6table
idsequence, master key
Community ID.
namestring
Community name.
query-v1-portunsigned int32
SNMP v1 query port (default = 161).
query-v1-statusoption
Enable/disable SNMP v1 queries.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
query-v2c-portunsigned int32
SNMP v2c query port (default = 161).
query-v2c-statusoption
Enable/disable SNMP v2c queries.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
statusoption
Enable/disable this SNMP community.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
trap-v1-lportunsigned int32
SNMP v1 trap local port (default = 162).
trap-v1-rportunsigned int32
SNMP v1 trap remote port (default = 162).
trap-v1-statusoption
Enable/disable SNMP v1 traps.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
trap-v2c-lportunsigned int32
SNMP v2c trap local port (default = 162).
trap-v2c-rportunsigned int32
SNMP v2c trap remote port (default = 162).
trap-v2c-statusoption
Enable/disable SNMP v2c traps.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.

 

system/snmp/community/hosts (table)

Configure IPv4 SNMP managers (hosts).

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/system/snmp/community/<community_id>/hosts
Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/system/snmp/community/<community_id>/hosts/<hosts_id>
Attribute ListDescriptions
ha-directoption
Enable/disable direct management of HA cluster members.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
host-typeoption
Control whether the SNMP manager sends SNMP queries, receives SNMP traps, or both. No traps will be sent when IP type is subnet.
"any"Accept queries from and send traps to this SNMP manager.
"query"Accept queries from this SNMP manager but do not send traps.
"trap"Send traps to this SNMP manager but do not accept SNMP queries from this SNMP manager.
idsequence, master key
Host entry ID.
ipIPv4 address/mask
IPv4 address of the SNMP manager (host).
source-ipIPv4 address
Source IPv4 address for SNMP traps.

 

system/snmp/community/hosts6 (table)

Configure IPv6 SNMP managers.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/system/snmp/community/<community_id>/hosts6
Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/system/snmp/community/<community_id>/hosts6/<hosts6_id>
Attribute ListDescriptions
ha-directoption
Enable/disable direct management of HA cluster members.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
host-typeoption
Control whether the SNMP manager sends SNMP queries, receives SNMP traps, or both.
"any"Accept queries from and send traps to this SNMP manager.
"query"Accept queries from this SNMP manager but do not send traps.
"trap"Send traps to this SNMP manager but do not accept SNMP queries from this SNMP manager.
idsequence, master key
Host6 entry ID.
ipv6IPv6 prefix
SNMP manager IPv6 address prefix.
source-ipv6IPv6 address
Source IPv6 address for SNMP traps.

 

system/snmp/sysinfo (object)

SNMP system info configuration.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/system/snmp/sysinfo
Attribute ListDescriptions
contact-infostring
Contact information.
descriptionstring
System description.
engine-idstring
Local SNMP engineID string (maximum 24 characters).
locationstring
System location.
statusoption
Enable/disable SNMP.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
trap-high-cpu-thresholdunsigned int16
CPU usage when trap is sent.
trap-log-full-thresholdunsigned int16
Log disk usage when trap is sent.
trap-low-memory-thresholdunsigned int16
Memory usage when trap is sent.

 

system/snmp/user (table)

SNMP user configuration.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/system/snmp/user
Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/system/snmp/user/<user_name>
Attribute ListDescriptions
auth-protooption
Authentication protocol.
"md5"HMAC-MD5-96 authentication protocol.
"sha"HMAC-SHA-96 authentication protocol.
"sha224"HMAC-SHA224 authentication protocol.
"sha256"HMAC-SHA256 authentication protocol.
"sha384"HMAC-SHA384 authentication protocol.
"sha512"HMAC-SHA512 authentication protocol.
auth-pwdpassword
Password for authentication protocol.
eventsflags
SNMP notifications (traps) to send.
"cpu-high"Send a trap when CPU usage is high.
"mem-low"Send a trap when available memory is low.
"log-full"Send a trap when log disk space becomes low.
"intf-ip"Send a trap when an interface IP address is changed.
"vpn-tun-up"Send a trap when a VPN tunnel comes up.
"vpn-tun-down"Send a trap when a VPN tunnel goes down.
"ha-switch"Send a trap after an HA failover when the backup unit has taken over.
"fm-conf-change"Send a trap when a configuration change is made by a FortiGate administrator and the FortiGate is managed by FortiManager.
"ips-signature"Send a trap when IPS detects an attack.
"ips-anomaly"Send a trap when IPS finds an anomaly.
"temperature-high"Send a trap when a temperature sensor registers a temperature that is too high.
"voltage-alert"Send a trap when a voltage sensor registers a voltage that is outside of the normal range.
"av-virus"Send a trap when AntiVirus finds a virus.
"av-oversize"Send a trap when AntiVirus finds an oversized file.
"av-pattern"Send a trap when AntiVirus finds file matching pattern.
"av-fragmented"Send a trap when AntiVirus finds a fragmented file.
"ha-hb-failure"Send a trap when HA heartbeats are not received.
"fan-failure"Send a trap when a fan fails.
"ha-member-up"Send a trap when an HA cluster member goes up.
"ha-member-down"Send a trap when an HA cluster member goes down.
"ent-conf-change"Send a trap when an entity MIB change occurs (RFC4133).
"av-conserve"Send a trap when the FortiGate enters conserve mode.
"av-bypass"Send a trap when the FortiGate enters bypass mode.
"av-oversize-passed"Send a trap when AntiVirus passes an oversized file.
"av-oversize-blocked"Send a trap when AntiVirus blocks an oversized file.
"ips-pkg-update"Send a trap when the IPS signature database or engine is updated.
"fm-if-change"Send a trap when FortiManager interface changes. Send a FortiManager trap.
"power-supply-failure"Send a trap when a power supply fails.
"faz-disconnect"Send a trap when a FortiAnalyzer disconnects from the FortiGate.
"bgp-established"Send a trap when a BGP FSM transitions to the established state.
"bgp-backward-transition"Send a trap when a BGP FSM goes from a high numbered state to a lower numbered state.
"wc-ap-up"Send a trap when a managed FortiAP comes up.
"wc-ap-down"Send a trap when a managed FortiAP goes down.
"fswctl-session-up"Send a trap when a FortiSwitch controller session comes up.
"fswctl-session-down"Send a trap when a FortiSwitch controller session goes down.
"ips-fail-open"Send a trap when the IPS network buffer is full.
"load-balance-real-server-down"Send a trap when a server load balance real server goes down.
"device-new"Send a trap when a new device is found.
"enter-intf-bypass"Enter interface bypass mode.
"exit-intf-bypass"Exit interface bypass mode.
"per-cpu-high"Send a trap when per-CPU usage is high.
"power-blade-down"Power down blade due to insufficient power.
"confsync_failure"Confsync out-of-sync due to hit max sync turns.
"dhcp"Send a trap when the DHCP server exhausts the IP pool, an IP address already is in use, or a DHCP client interface received a DHCP-NAK.
ha-directoption
Enable/disable direct management of HA cluster members.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
namestring, master key
SNMP user name.
notify-hostsIPv4 address array
SNMP managers to send notifications (traps) to.
notify-hosts6IPv6 address array
IPv6 SNMP managers to send notifications (traps) to.
priv-protooption
Privacy (encryption) protocol.
"aes"CFB128-AES-128 symmetric encryption protocol.
"des"CBC-DES symmetric encryption protocol.
"aes256"CFB128-AES-256 symmetric encryption protocol.
"aes256cisco"CFB128-AES-256 symmetric encryption protocol compatible with CISCO.
priv-pwdpassword
Password for privacy (encryption) protocol.
queriesoption
Enable/disable SNMP queries for this user.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
query-portunsigned int32
SNMPv3 query port (default = 161).
security-leveloption
Security level for message authentication and encryption.
"no-auth-no-priv"Message with no authentication and no privacy (encryption).
"auth-no-priv"Message with authentication but no privacy (encryption).
"auth-priv"Message with authentication and privacy (encryption).
source-ipIPv4 address
Source IP for SNMP trap.
source-ipv6IPv6 address
Source IPv6 for SNMP trap.
statusoption
Enable/disable this SNMP user.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
trap-lportunsigned int32
SNMPv3 local trap port (default = 162).
trap-rportunsigned int32
SNMPv3 trap remote port (default = 162).
trap-statusoption
Enable/disable traps for this SNMP user.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.

 

system/speed-test-server (table)

Configure speed test server list.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/system/speed-test-server
Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/system/speed-test-server/<speed-test-server_name>
Attribute ListDescriptions
hosttable
namestring, master key
Speed test server name.
timestampstring
Speed test server timestamp.

 

system/speed-test-server/host (table)

Hosts of the server.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/system/speed-test-server/<speed-test-server_name>/host
Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/system/speed-test-server/<speed-test-server_name>/host/<host_id>
Attribute ListDescriptions
idsequence, master key
Server host ID.
ipIPv4 address
Server host IPv4 address.
passwordpassword
Speed test host password.
portunsigned int32
Server host port number to communicate with client.
userstring
Speed test host user name.

Configure SSO admin users.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/system/sso-admin
Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/system/sso-admin/<sso-admin_name>
Attribute ListDescriptions
accprofiledatasource, refer to system accprofile (maximum 1)
SSO admin user access profile.
gui-ignore-release-overview-versionstring
namestring, master key
SSO admin name.
vdomdatasource, refer to system vdom
Virtual domain(s) that the administrator can access.

 

system/standalone-cluster (object)

Configure FortiGate Session Life Support Protocol (FGSP) cluster attributes.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/system/standalone-cluster
Attribute ListDescriptions
encryptionoption
Enable/disable encryption when synchronizing sessions.
"disable"Disable encryption when synchronizing sessions.
"enable"Enable encryption when synchronizing sessions.
group-member-idunsigned int32
Cluster member ID (0 - 15).
layer2-connectionoption
Indicate whether layer 2 connections are present among FGSP members.
"unavailable"There does not exist layer 2 connection among FGSP members.
"available"There exist layer 2 connections among FGSP members.
psksecretpassword
Pre-shared secret for session synchronization (ASCII string or hexadecimal encoded with a leading 0x).
session-sync-devdatasource, refer to system interface (maximum 8)
Offload session-sync process to kernel and sync sessions using connected interface(s) directly.
standalone-group-idunsigned int32
Cluster group ID (0 - 255). Must be the same for all members.

 

system/storage (table)

Configure logical storage.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/system/storage
Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/system/storage/<storage_name>
Attribute ListDescriptions
devicestring
Partition device.
media-statusoption
The physical status of current media.
"disable"Storage is disabled.
"enable"Storage is enabled.
"fail"Storage have some fail sector.
namestring, master key
Storage name.
orderunsigned int32
Set storage order.
partitionstring
Label of underlying partition.
sizeunsigned int32
Partition size.
statusoption
Enable/disable storage.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
usageoption
Use hard disk for logging or WAN Optimization (default = log).
"log"Use hard disk for logging.
"wanopt"Use hard disk for WAN Optimization.
wanopt-modeoption
WAN Optimization mode (default = mix).
"mix"Use hard disk for WAN Optimization mix mode.
"wanopt"Use hard disk for WAN Optimization wanopt mode.
"webcache"Use hard disk for WAN Optimization webcache mode.

 

system/stp (object)

Configure Spanning Tree Protocol (STP).

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/system/stp
Attribute ListDescriptions
forward-delayunsigned int32
Forward delay (4 - 30 sec, default = 15).
hello-timeunsigned int32
Hello time (1 - 10 sec, default = 2).
max-ageunsigned int32
Maximum packet age (6 - 40 sec, default = 20).
max-hopsunsigned int32
Maximum number of hops (1 - 40, default = 20).
switch-priorityoption
STP switch priority; the lower the number the higher the priority (select from 0, 4096, 8192, 12288, 16384, 20480, 24576, 28672, 32768, 36864, 40960, 45056, 49152, 53248, and 57344).
"0"
"4096"
"8192"
"12288"
"16384"
"20480"
"24576"
"28672"
"32768"
"36864"
"40960"
"45056"
"49152"
"53248"
"57344"

 

system/switch-interface (table)

Configure software switch interfaces by grouping physical and WiFi interfaces.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/system/switch-interface
Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/system/switch-interface/<switch-interface_name>
Attribute ListDescriptions
intra-switch-policyoption
Allow any traffic between switch interfaces or require firewall policies to allow traffic between switch interfaces.
"implicit"Traffic between switch members is implicitly allowed.
"explicit"Traffic between switch members must match firewall policies.
mac-ttlunsigned int32
Duration for which MAC addresses are held in the ARP table (300 - 8640000 sec, default = 300).
memberdatasource, refer to system interface
Names of the interfaces that belong to the virtual switch.
namestring, master key
Interface name (name cannot be in use by any other interfaces, VLANs, or inter-VDOM links).
spanoption
Enable/disable port spanning. Port spanning echoes traffic received by the software switch to the span destination port.
"disable"Disable port spanning.
"enable"Enable port spanning.
span-dest-portdatasource, refer to system interface (maximum 1)
SPAN destination port name. All traffic on the SPAN source ports is echoed to the SPAN destination port.
span-directionoption
The direction in which the SPAN port operates, either: rx, tx, or both.
"rx"Copies only received packets from source SPAN ports to the destination SPAN port.
"tx"Copies only transmitted packets from source SPAN ports to the destination SPAN port.
"both"Copies both received and transmitted packets from source SPAN ports to the destination SPAN port.
span-source-portdatasource, refer to system interface
Physical interface name. Port spanning echoes all traffic on the SPAN source ports to the SPAN destination port.
typeoption
Type of switch based on functionality: switch for normal functionality, or hub to duplicate packets to all port members.
"switch"Switch for normal switch functionality (available in NAT mode only).
"hub"Hub to duplicate packets to all member ports.
vdomdatasource, refer to system vdom (maximum 1)
VDOM that the software switch belongs to.

 

system/tos-based-priority (table)

Configure Type of Service (ToS) based priority table to set network traffic priorities.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/system/tos-based-priority
Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/system/tos-based-priority/<tos-based-priority_id>
Attribute ListDescriptions
idsequence, master key
Item ID.
priorityoption
ToS based priority level to low, medium or high (these priorities match firewall traffic shaping priorities) (default = medium).
"high"High priority.
"medium"Medium priority.
"low"Low priority.
tosunsigned int32
Value of the ToS byte in the IP datagram header (0-15, 8: minimize delay, 4: maximize throughput, 2: maximize reliability, 1: minimize monetary cost, and 0: default service).

 

system/vdom (table)

Configure virtual domain.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/system/vdom
Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/system/vdom/<vdom_name>
Attribute ListDescriptions
flagunsigned int32
Flag.
namestring, master key
VDOM name.
short-namestring
VDOM short name.
vcluster-idunsigned int32
Virtual cluster ID (0 - 4294967295).

 

system/vdom-dns (object)

Configure DNS servers for a non-management VDOM.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/system/vdom-dns
Attribute ListDescriptions
dns-over-tlsoption
Enable/disable/enforce DNS over TLS.
"disable"Disable DNS over TLS.
"enable"Use TLS for DNS queries if TLS is available.
"enforce"Use only TLS for DNS queries. Does not fall back to unencrypted DNS queries if TLS is unavailable.
interfacedatasource, refer to system interface (maximum 1)
Specify outgoing interface to reach server.
interface-select-methodoption
Specify how to select outgoing interface to reach server.
"auto"Set outgoing interface automatically.
"sdwan"Set outgoing interface by SD-WAN or policy routing rules.
"specify"Set outgoing interface manually.
ip6-primaryIPv6 address
Primary IPv6 DNS server IP address for the VDOM.
ip6-secondaryIPv6 address
Secondary IPv6 DNS server IP address for the VDOM.
primaryIPv4 address
Primary DNS server IP address for the VDOM.
secondaryIPv4 address
Secondary DNS server IP address for the VDOM.
server-hostnamestring array
DNS server host name list.
source-ipIPv4 address
Source IP for communications with the DNS server.
ssl-certificatedatasource, refer to certificate local, or vpn certificate local (maximum 1)
Name of local certificate for SSL connections.
vdom-dnsoption
Enable/disable configuring DNS servers for the current VDOM.
"disable"Disable configuring DNS servers for the current VDOM.
"enable"Enable configuring DNS servers for the current VDOM.

 

system/vdom-exception (table)

Global configuration objects that can be configured independently across different ha peers for all VDOMs or for the defined VDOM scope.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/system/vdom-exception
Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/system/vdom-exception/<vdom-exception_id>
Attribute ListDescriptions
idsequence, master key
Index <1-4096>.
objectoption
Name of the configuration object that can be configured independently for all VDOMs.
"log.fortianalyzer.setting"
"log.fortianalyzer.override-setting"
"vpn.ipsec.phase1-interface"
"vpn.ipsec.phase2-interface"
"router.bgp"
"router.route-map"
"router.prefix-list"
"firewall.ippool"
"log.fortianalyzer2.setting"
"log.fortianalyzer2.override-setting"
"log.fortianalyzer3.setting"
"log.fortianalyzer3.override-setting"
"log.fortianalyzer-cloud.setting"
"log.fortianalyzer-cloud.override-setting"
"system.central-management"
"system.csf"
"user.radius"
"system.virtual-wan-link"
"log.syslogd.setting"
"log.syslogd.override-setting"
"log.syslogd2.setting"
"log.syslogd2.override-setting"
"log.syslogd3.setting"
"log.syslogd3.override-setting"
"log.syslogd4.setting"
"log.syslogd4.override-setting"
"firewall.vip"
"firewall.vip6"
"firewall.vip46"
"firewall.vip64"
"firewall.ippool6"
"router.static"
"router.static6"
"system.interface"
"system.sdwan"
"system.saml"
oidunsigned int32
Object ID.
scopeoption
Determine whether the configuration object can be configured separately for all VDOMs or if some VDOMs share the same configuration.
"all"Object configuration independent for all VDOMs.
"inclusive"Object configuration independent for the listed VDOMs. Other VDOMs use the global configuration.
"exclusive"Use the global object configuration for the listed VDOMs. Other VDOMs can be configured independently.
vdomdatasource, refer to system vdom
Names of the VDOMs.

"ethernet"Ethernet VDOM link.

"vcluster1"Virtual cluster 1.

system/vdom-property (table)

Configure VDOM property.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/system/vdom-property
Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/system/vdom-property/<vdom-property_name>
Attribute ListDescriptions
custom-serviceint array
Maximum guaranteed number of firewall custom services.
descriptionstring
Description.
dialup-tunnelint array
Maximum guaranteed number of dial-up tunnels.
firewall-addressint array
Maximum guaranteed number of firewall addresses (IPv4, IPv6, multicast).
firewall-addrgrpint array
Maximum guaranteed number of firewall address groups (IPv4, IPv6).
firewall-policyint array
Maximum guaranteed number of firewall policies (policy, policy46, policy64, DoS-policy4, DoS-policy6, multicast).
ipsec-phase1int array
Maximum guaranteed number of VPN IPsec phase 1 tunnels.
ipsec-phase1-interfaceint array
Maximum guaranteed number of VPN IPsec phase1 interface tunnels.
ipsec-phase2int array
Maximum guaranteed number of VPN IPsec phase 2 tunnels.
ipsec-phase2-interfaceint array
Maximum guaranteed number of VPN IPsec phase2 interface tunnels.
log-disk-quotaint array
Log disk quota in MB (range depends on how much disk space is available).
namedatasource, refer to system vdom (maximum 1), master key
VDOM name.
onetime-scheduleint array
Maximum guaranteed number of firewall one-time schedules.
proxyint array
Maximum guaranteed number of concurrent proxy users.
recurring-scheduleint array
Maximum guaranteed number of firewall recurring schedules.
service-groupint array
Maximum guaranteed number of firewall service groups.
sessionint array
Maximum guaranteed number of sessions.
snmp-indexunsigned int32
Permanent SNMP Index of the virtual domain (1 - 2147483647).
sslvpnint array
Maximum guaranteed number of SSL-VPNs.
userint array
Maximum guaranteed number of local users.
user-groupint array
Maximum guaranteed number of user groups.

 

system/vdom-radius-server (table)

Configure a RADIUS server to use as a RADIUS Single Sign On (RSSO) server for this VDOM.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/system/vdom-radius-server
Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/system/vdom-radius-server/<vdom-radius-server_name>
Attribute ListDescriptions
namedatasource, refer to system vdom (maximum 1), master key
Name of the VDOM that you are adding the RADIUS server to.
radius-server-vdomdatasource, refer to system vdom (maximum 1)
Use this option to select another VDOM containing a VDOM RSSO RADIUS server to use for the current VDOM.
statusoption
Enable/disable the RSSO RADIUS server for this VDOM.
"disable"Disable the RSSO RADIUS server for this VDOM.
"enable"Enable the RSSO RADIUS server for this VDOM.

 

system/vdom-sflow (object)

Configure sFlow per VDOM to add or change the IP address and UDP port that FortiGate sFlow agents in this VDOM use to send sFlow datagrams to an sFlow collector.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/system/vdom-sflow
Attribute ListDescriptions
collector-ipIPv4 address
IP address of the sFlow collector that sFlow agents added to interfaces in this VDOM send sFlow datagrams to (default = 0.0.0.0).
collector-portunsigned int32
UDP port number used for sending sFlow datagrams (configure only if required by your sFlow collector or your network configuration) (0 - 65535, default = 6343).
source-ipIPv4 address
Source IP address for sFlow agent.
vdom-sflowoption
Enable/disable the sFlow configuration for the current VDOM.
"disable"Disable sFlow for this VDOM.
"enable"Enable sFlow for this VDOM.

 

system/virtual-switch (table)

Configure virtual hardware switch interfaces.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/system/virtual-switch
Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/system/virtual-switch/<virtual-switch_name>
Attribute ListDescriptions
namestring, master key
Name of the virtual switch.
physical-switchdatasource, refer to system physical-switch (maximum 1)
Physical switch parent.
porttable
spanoption
Enable/disable SPAN.
"disable"Disable SPAN.
"enable"Enable SPAN.
span-dest-portstring
SPAN destination port.
span-directionoption
SPAN direction.
"rx"SPAN receive direction only.
"tx"SPAN transmit direction only.
"both"SPAN both directions.
span-source-portstring
SPAN source port.
vlanunsigned int32
VLAN.

 

system/virtual-switch/port (table)

Configure member ports.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/global/system/virtual-switch/<virtual-switch_name>/port

Attribute ListDescriptions
aliasstring
Alias.
mediatypeoption
"cfp2-sr10"
"cfp2-lr4"
namestring, master key
Physical interface name.
poeoption
Enable/disable PoE status.
"disable"Disable PoE status.
"enable"Enable PoE status.
speedoption
Interface speed.
"auto"Automatically adjust speed.
"10full"10M full-duplex.
"10half"10M half-duplex.
"100full"100M full-duplex.
"100half"100M half-duplex.
"1000full"1000M full-duplex.
"1000half"1000M half-duplex.
"10000full"10G full-duplex.
"1000auto"1000M auto adjust.
"10000auto"10G auto.
"40000full"40G full-duplex.
"100Gfull"100G full-duplex.
statusoption
Interface status.
"down"Interface down.
"up"Interface up.

 

system/vne-tunnel (object)

Configure virtual network enabler tunnel.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/system/vne-tunnel
Attribute ListDescriptions
auto-asic-offloadoption
Enable/disable tunnel ASIC offloading.
"disable"Disable ASIC offloading.
"enable"Enable auto ASIC offloading.
bmr-hostnamepassword
BMR hostname.
brIPv6 address
Border relay IPv6 address.
interfacedatasource, refer to system interface (maximum 1)
Interface name.
ipv4-addressIPv4 address/mask
Tunnel IPv4 address and netmask.
modeoption
VNE tunnel mode.
"map-e"Map-e mode.
"fixed-ip"Fixed-ip mode.
ssl-certificatedatasource, refer to certificate local, or vpn certificate local (maximum 1)
Name of local certificate for SSL connections.
statusoption
Enable/disable VNE tunnel.
"disable"Disable VNE tunnel.
"enable"Enable VNE tunnel.
update-urlstring
URL of provisioning server.

 

system/vxlan (table)

Configure VXLAN devices.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/system/vxlan
Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/system/vxlan/<vxlan_name>
Attribute ListDescriptions
dstportunsigned int32
VXLAN destination port (1 - 65535, default = 4789).
interfacedatasource, refer to system interface (maximum 1)
Outgoing interface for VXLAN encapsulated traffic.
ip-versionoption
IP version to use for the VXLAN interface and so for communication over the VXLAN. IPv4 or IPv6 unicast or multicast.
"ipv4-unicast"Use IPv4 unicast addressing over the VXLAN.
"ipv6-unicast"Use IPv6 unicast addressing over the VXLAN.
"ipv4-multicast"Use IPv4 multicast addressing over the VXLAN.
"ipv6-multicast"Use IPv6 multicast addressing over the VXLAN.
multicast-ttlunsigned int32
VXLAN multicast TTL (1-255, default = 0).
namestring, master key
VXLAN device or interface name. Must be a unique interface name.
remote-ipstring array
IPv4 address of the VXLAN interface on the device at the remote end of the VXLAN.
remote-ip6string array
IPv6 IP address of the VXLAN interface on the device at the remote end of the VXLAN.
vniunsigned int32
VXLAN network ID.

 

system/wccp (table)

Configure WCCP.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/system/wccp
Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/system/wccp/<wccp_service-id>
Attribute ListDescriptions
assignment-bucket-formatoption
Assignment bucket format for the WCCP cache engine.
"cisco-implementation"Cisco bucket format.
"wccp-v2"WCCP-v2 bucket format.
assignment-dstaddr-maskIPv4 mask
Assignment destination address mask.
assignment-methodoption
Hash key assignment preference.
"HASH"HASH assignment method.
"MASK"MASK assignment method.
"any"HASH or MASK.
assignment-srcaddr-maskIPv4 mask
Assignment source address mask.
assignment-weightunsigned int32
Assignment of hash weight/ratio for the WCCP cache engine.
authenticationoption
Enable/disable MD5 authentication.
"disable"Disable MD5 authentication.
"enable"Enable MD5 authentication.
cache-engine-methodoption
Method used to forward traffic to the routers or to return to the cache engine.
"GRE"GRE encapsulation.
"L2"L2 rewrite.
cache-idIPv4 address
IP address known to all routers. If the addresses are the same, use the default 0.0.0.0.
forward-methodoption
Method used to forward traffic to the cache servers.
"GRE"GRE encapsulation.
"L2"L2 rewrite.
"any"GRE or L2.
group-addressIPv4 address
IP multicast address used by the cache routers. For the FortiGate to ignore multicast WCCP traffic, use the default 0.0.0.0.
passwordpassword
Password for MD5 authentication.
portsint array
Service ports.
ports-definedoption
Match method.
"source"Source port match.
"destination"Destination port match.
primary-hashflags
Hash method.
"src-ip"Source IP hash.
"dst-ip"Destination IP hash.
"src-port"Source port hash.
"dst-port"Destination port hash.
priorityunsigned int32
Service priority.
protocolunsigned int32
Service protocol.
return-methodoption
Method used to decline a redirected packet and return it to the FortiGate.
"GRE"GRE encapsulation.
"L2"L2 rewrite.
"any"GRE or L2.
router-idIPv4 address
IP address known to all cache engines. If all cache engines connect to the same FortiGate interface, use the default 0.0.0.0.
router-listIPv4 address array
IP addresses of one or more WCCP routers.
server-liststring array
IP addresses and netmasks for up to four cache servers.
server-typeoption
Cache server type.
"forward"Forward server.
"proxy"Proxy server.
service-idstring, master key
Service ID.
service-typeoption
WCCP service type used by the cache server for logical interception and redirection of traffic.
"standard"Standard service.
"dynamic"Dynamic service.
"auto"

"enable"400 ns long guard interval.

 

system/zone (table)

Configure zones to group two or more interfaces. When a zone is created you can configure policies for the zone instead of individual interfaces in the zone.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/system/zone
Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/system/zone/<zone_name>
Attribute ListDescriptions
descriptionstring
Description.
interfacedatasource, refer to system interface
Add interfaces to this zone. Interfaces must not be assigned to another zone or have firewall policies defined.
intrazoneoption
Allow or deny traffic routing between different interfaces in the same zone (default = deny).
"allow"Allow traffic between interfaces in the zone.
"deny"Deny traffic between interfaces in the zone.
namestring, master key
Zone name.
taggingtable

user/setting (object)

Configure user authentication setting.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/user/setting
Attribute ListDescriptions
auth-blackout-timeunsigned int32
Time in seconds an IP address is denied access after failing to authenticate five times within one minute.
auth-ca-certdatasource, refer to vpn certificate local, or certificate local (maximum 1)
HTTPS CA certificate for policy authentication.
auth-certdatasource, refer to vpn certificate local, or certificate local (maximum 1)
HTTPS server certificate for policy authentication.
auth-http-basicoption
Enable/disable use of HTTP basic authentication for identity-based firewall policies.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
auth-invalid-maxunsigned int32
Maximum number of failed authentication attempts before the user is blocked.
auth-lockout-durationunsigned int32
Lockout period in seconds after too many login failures.
auth-lockout-thresholdunsigned int32
Maximum number of failed login attempts before login lockout is triggered.
auth-on-demandoption
Always/implicitly trigger firewall authentication on demand.
"always"Always trigger firewall authentication on demand.
"implicitly"Implicitly trigger firewall authentication on demand.
auth-portal-timeoutunsigned int32
Time in minutes before captive portal user have to re-authenticate (1 - 30 min, default 3 min).
auth-portstable
auth-secure-httpoption
Enable/disable redirecting HTTP user authentication to more secure HTTPS.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
auth-src-macoption
Enable/disable source MAC for user identity.
"disable"Disable source MAC for user identity.
"enable"Enable source MAC for user identity.
auth-ssl-allow-renegotiationoption
Allow/forbid SSL re-negotiation for HTTPS authentication.
"disable"Forbid SSL re-negotiation.
"enable"Allow SSL re-negotiation.
auth-ssl-min-proto-versionoption
Minimum supported protocol version for SSL/TLS connections (default is to follow system global setting).
"default"Follow system global setting.
"TLSv1-1"TLSv1.1.
"TLSv1-2"TLSv1.2.
"SSLv3"SSLv3.
"TLSv1"TLSv1.
auth-timeoutunsigned int32
Time in minutes before the firewall user authentication timeout requires the user to re-authenticate.
auth-timeout-typeoption
Control if authenticated users have to login again after a hard timeout, after an idle timeout, or after a session timeout.
"idle-timeout"Idle timeout.
"hard-timeout"Hard timeout.
"new-session"New session timeout.
auth-typeflags
Supported firewall policy authentication protocols/methods.
"http"Allow HTTP authentication.
"https"Allow HTTPS authentication.
"ftp"Allow FTP authentication.
"telnet"Allow TELNET authentication.
per-policy-disclaimeroption
Enable/disable per policy disclaimer.
"disable"Disable per policy disclaimer.
"enable"Enable per policy disclaimer.
radius-ses-timeout-actoption
Set the RADIUS session timeout to a hard timeout or to ignore RADIUS server session timeouts.
"hard-timeout"Use session timeout from RADIUS as hard-timeout.
"ignore-timeout"Ignore session timeout from RADIUS.

vpn/certificate/setting (object)

VPN certificate setting.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/vpn/certificate/setting
Attribute ListDescriptions
certname-dsa1024datasource, refer to vpn certificate local (maximum 1)
1024 bit DSA key certificate for re-signing server certificates for SSL inspection.
certname-dsa2048datasource, refer to vpn certificate local (maximum 1)
2048 bit DSA key certificate for re-signing server certificates for SSL inspection.
certname-ecdsa256datasource, refer to vpn certificate local (maximum 1)
256 bit ECDSA key certificate for re-signing server certificates for SSL inspection.
certname-ecdsa384datasource, refer to vpn certificate local (maximum 1)
384 bit ECDSA key certificate for re-signing server certificates for SSL inspection.
certname-ecdsa521datasource, refer to vpn certificate local (maximum 1)
521 bit ECDSA key certificate for re-signing server certificates for SSL inspection.
certname-ed25519datasource, refer to vpn certificate local (maximum 1)
253 bit EdDSA key certificate for re-signing server certificates for SSL inspection.
certname-ed448datasource, refer to vpn certificate local (maximum 1)
456 bit EdDSA key certificate for re-signing server certificates for SSL inspection.
certname-rsa1024datasource, refer to vpn certificate local (maximum 1)
1024 bit RSA key certificate for re-signing server certificates for SSL inspection.
certname-rsa2048datasource, refer to vpn certificate local (maximum 1)
2048 bit RSA key certificate for re-signing server certificates for SSL inspection.
certname-rsa4096datasource, refer to vpn certificate local (maximum 1)
4096 bit RSA key certificate for re-signing server certificates for SSL inspection.
check-ca-certoption
Enable/disable verification of the user certificate and pass authentication if any CA in the chain is trusted (default = enable).
"disable"Disable verification of the user certificate.
"enable"Enable verification of the user certificate.
check-ca-chainoption
Enable/disable verification of the entire certificate chain and pass authentication only if the chain is complete and all of the CAs in the chain are trusted (default = disable).
"disable"Disable verification of the entire certificate chain.
"enable"Enable verification of the entire certificate chain.
cmp-key-usage-checkingoption
Enable/disable server certificate key usage checking in CMP mode (default = enable).
"disable"Disable server certificate key usage checking in CMP mode.
"enable"Enable server certificate key usage checking in CMP mode.
cmp-save-extra-certsoption
Enable/disable saving extra certificates in CMP mode (default = disable).
"disable"Disable saving extra certificates in CMP mode.
"enable"Enable saving extra certificates in CMP mode.
cn-matchoption
When searching for a matching certificate, control how to find matches in the cn attribute of the certificate subject name.
"substring"Find a match if any string in a certificate subject name cn attribute name matches the name being searched for.
"value"Find a match if the cn attribute value string is an exact match with the name being searched for.
interfacedatasource, refer to system interface (maximum 1)
Specify outgoing interface to reach server.
interface-select-methodoption
Specify how to select outgoing interface to reach server.
"auto"Set outgoing interface automatically.
"sdwan"Set outgoing interface by SD-WAN or policy routing rules.
"specify"Set outgoing interface manually.
ocsp-default-serverdatasource, refer to vpn certificate ocsp-server (maximum 1)
Default OCSP server.
ocsp-optionoption
Specify whether the OCSP URL is from certificate or configured OCSP server.
"certificate"Use URL from certificate.
"server"Use URL from configured OCSP server.
ocsp-statusoption
Enable/disable receiving certificates using the OCSP.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
ssl-min-proto-versionoption
Minimum supported protocol version for SSL/TLS connections (default is to follow system global setting).
"default"Follow system global setting.
"TLSv1"TLSv1.
"TLSv1-1"TLSv1.1.
"TLSv1-2"TLSv1.2.
"SSLv3"SSLv3.
ssl-ocsp-source-ipIPv4 address
Source IP address to use to communicate with the OCSP server.
strict-crl-checkoption
Enable/disable strict mode CRL checking.
"disable"Disable strict mode CRL checking.
"enable"Enable strict mode CRL checking.
strict-ocsp-checkoption
Enable/disable strict mode OCSP checking.
"disable"Disable strict mode OCSP checking.
"enable"Enable strict mode OCSP checking.
subject-matchoption
When searching for a matching certificate, control how to find matches in the certificate subject name.
"substring"Find a match if any string in the certificate subject name matches the name being searched for.
"value"Find a match if any attribute value string in a certificate subject name is an exact match with the name being searched for.

vpn/ipsec/manualkey (table)

Configure IPsec manual keys.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/vpn/ipsec/manualkey
Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/vpn/ipsec/manualkey/<manualkey_name>
Attribute ListDescriptions
authenticationoption
Authentication algorithm. Must be the same for both ends of the tunnel.
"null"Null.
"md5"MD5.
"sha1"SHA1.
"sha256"SHA256.
"sha384"SHA384.
"sha512"SHA512.
authkeypassword
Hexadecimal authentication key in 16-digit (8-byte) segments separated by hyphens.
enckeypassword
Hexadecimal encryption key in 16-digit (8-byte) segments separated by hyphens.
encryptionoption
Encryption algorithm. Must be the same for both ends of the tunnel.
"null"Null.
"des"DES.
"3des"3DES.
"aes128"AES128.
"aes192"AES192.
"aes256"AES256.
"aria128"ARIA128.
"aria192"ARIA192.
"aria256"ARIA256.
"seed"Seed.
interfacedatasource, refer to system interface (maximum 1)
Name of the physical, aggregate, or VLAN interface.
local-gwIPv4 address
Local gateway.
localspistring
Local SPI, a hexadecimal 8-digit (4-byte) tag. Discerns between two traffic streams with different encryption rules.
namestring, master key
IPsec tunnel name.
npu-offloadoption
Enable/disable NPU offloading.
"disable"Disable NPU offloading.
"enable"Enable NPU offloading.
remote-gwIPv4 address
Peer gateway.
remotespistring
Remote SPI, a hexadecimal 8-digit (4-byte) tag. Discerns between two traffic streams with different encryption rules.

 

vpn/ipsec/manualkey-interface (table)

Configure IPsec manual keys.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/vpn/ipsec/manualkey-interface
Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/vpn/ipsec/manualkey-interface/<manualkey-interface_name>
Attribute ListDescriptions
addr-typeoption
IP version to use for IP packets.
"4"Use IPv4 addressing for IP packets.
"6"Use IPv6 addressing for IP packets.
auth-algoption
Authentication algorithm. Must be the same for both ends of the tunnel.
"null"
"md5"
"sha1"
"sha256"
"sha384"
"sha512"
auth-keypassword
Hexadecimal authentication key in 16-digit (8-byte) segments separated by hyphens.
enc-algoption
Encryption algorithm. Must be the same for both ends of the tunnel.
"null"
"des"
"3des"
"aes128"
"aes192"
"aes256"
"aria128"
"aria192"
"aria256"
"seed"
enc-keypassword
Hexadecimal encryption key in 16-digit (8-byte) segments separated by hyphens.
interfacedatasource, refer to system interface (maximum 1)
Name of the physical, aggregate, or VLAN interface.
ip-versionoption
IP version to use for VPN interface.
"4"Use IPv4 addressing for gateways.
"6"Use IPv6 addressing for gateways.
local-gwIPv4 address
IPv4 address of the local gateway's external interface.
local-gw6IPv6 address
Local IPv6 address of VPN gateway.
local-spistring
Local SPI, a hexadecimal 8-digit (4-byte) tag. Discerns between two traffic streams with different encryption rules.
namestring, master key
IPsec tunnel name.
npu-offloadoption
Enable/disable offloading IPsec VPN manual key sessions to NPUs.
"disable"Disable NPU offloading.
"enable"Enable NPU offloading.
remote-gwIPv4 address
IPv4 address of the remote gateway's external interface.
remote-gw6IPv6 address
Remote IPv6 address of VPN gateway.
remote-spistring
Remote SPI, a hexadecimal 8-digit (4-byte) tag. Discerns between two traffic streams with different encryption rules.

 

vpn/ipsec/phase1 (table)

Configure VPN remote gateway.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/vpn/ipsec/phase1
Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/vpn/ipsec/phase1/<phase1_name>
Attribute ListDescriptions
acct-verifyoption
Enable/disable verification of RADIUS accounting record.
"disable"Disable verification of RADIUS accounting record.
"enable"Enable verification of RADIUS accounting record.
add-gw-routeoption
Enable/disable automatically add a route to the remote gateway.
"disable"Do not automatically add a route to the remote gateway.
"enable"Automatically add a route to the remote gateway.
add-routeoption
Enable/disable control addition of a route to peer destination selector.
"disable"Do not add a route to destination of peer selector.
"enable"Add route to destination of peer selector.
assign-ipoption
Enable/disable assignment of IP to IPsec interface via configuration method.
"disable"Do not assign an IP address to the IPsec interface.
"enable"Assign an IP address to the IPsec interface.
assign-ip-fromoption
Method by which the IP address will be assigned.
"range"Assign IP address from locally defined range.
"usrgrp"Assign IP address via user group.
"dhcp"Assign IP address via DHCP.
"name"Assign IP address from firewall address or group.
authmethodoption
Authentication method.
"psk"PSK authentication method.
"signature"Signature authentication method.
authmethod-remoteoption
Authentication method (remote side).
"psk"PSK authentication method.
"signature"Signature authentication method.
authpasswdpassword
XAuth password (max 35 characters).
authusrstring
XAuth user name.
authusrgrpdatasource, refer to user group (maximum 1)
Authentication user group.
auto-negotiateoption
Enable/disable automatic initiation of IKE SA negotiation.
"disable"Disable automatic initiation of IKE SA negotiation.
"enable"Enable automatic initiation of IKE SA negotiation.
backup-gatewaystring array
Instruct unity clients about the backup gateway address(es).
bannerstring
Message that unity client should display after connecting.
cert-id-validationoption
Enable/disable cross validation of peer ID and the identity in the peer's certificate as specified in RFC 4945.
"disable"Disable cross validation of peer ID and the identity in the peer's certificate as specified in RFC 4945.
"enable"Enable cross validation of peer ID and the identity in the peer's certificate as specified in RFC 4945.
certificatedatasource, refer to vpn certificate local
Names of up to 4 signed personal certificates.
childless-ikeoption
Enable/disable childless IKEv2 initiation (RFC 6023).
"disable"Disable childless IKEv2 initiation (RFC 6023).
"enable"Enable childless IKEv2 initiation (RFC 6023).
client-auto-negotiateoption
Enable/disable allowing the VPN client to bring up the tunnel when there is no traffic.
"disable"Disable allowing the VPN client to bring up the tunnel when there is no traffic.
"enable"Enable allowing the VPN client to bring up the tunnel when there is no traffic.
client-keep-aliveoption
Enable/disable allowing the VPN client to keep the tunnel up when there is no traffic.
"disable"Disable allowing the VPN client to keep the tunnel up when there is no traffic.
"enable"Enable allowing the VPN client to keep the tunnel up when there is no traffic.
commentsstring
Comment.
dhcp-ra-giaddrIPv4 address
Relay agent gateway IP address to use in the giaddr field of DHCP requests.
dhcp6-ra-linkaddrIPv6 address
Relay agent IPv6 link address to use in DHCP6 requests.
dhgrpflags
DH group.
"1"DH Group 1.
"2"DH Group 2.
"5"DH Group 5.
"14"DH Group 14.
"15"DH Group 15.
"16"DH Group 16.
"17"DH Group 17.
"18"DH Group 18.
"19"DH Group 19.
"20"DH Group 20.
"21"DH Group 21.
"27"DH Group 27.
"28"DH Group 28.
"29"DH Group 29.
"30"DH Group 30.
"31"DH Group 31.
"32"DH Group 32.
digital-signature-authoption
Enable/disable IKEv2 Digital Signature Authentication (RFC 7427).
"disable"Disable IKEv2 Digital Signature Authentication (RFC 7427).
"enable"Enable IKEv2 Digital Signature Authentication (RFC 7427).
distanceunsigned int32
Distance for routes added by IKE (1 - 255).
dns-modeoption
DNS server mode.
"auto"Use default DNS servers.
"manual"Manually configure DNS servers.
domainstring
Instruct unity clients about the default DNS domain.
dpdoption
Dead Peer Detection mode.
"disable"Disable Dead Peer Detection.
"on-idle"Trigger Dead Peer Detection when IPsec is idle.
"on-demand"Trigger Dead Peer Detection when IPsec traffic is sent but no reply is received from the peer.
dpd-retrycountunsigned int32
Number of DPD retry attempts.
dpd-retryintervalint array
DPD retry interval.
eapoption
Enable/disable IKEv2 EAP authentication.
"disable"Disable IKEv2 EAP authentication.
"enable"Enable IKEv2 EAP authentication.
eap-exclude-peergrpdatasource, refer to user peergrp (maximum 1)
Peer group excluded from EAP authentication.
eap-identityoption
IKEv2 EAP peer identity type.
"use-id-payload"Use IKEv2 IDi payload to resolve peer identity.
"send-request"Use EAP identity request to resolve peer identity.
enforce-unique-idoption
Enable/disable peer ID uniqueness check.
"disable"Disable peer ID uniqueness enforcement.
"keep-new"Enforce peer ID uniqueness, keep new connection if collision found.
"keep-old"Enforce peer ID uniqueness, keep old connection if collision found.
esnoption
Extended sequence number (ESN) negotiation.
"disable"Disable extended sequence number.
"require"Require extended sequence number.
"allow"Allow extended sequence number.
fec-baseunsigned int32
Number of base Forward Error Correction packets (1 - 100).
fec-egressoption
Enable/disable Forward Error Correction for egress IPsec traffic.
"disable"Disable Forward Error Correction for egress IPsec traffic.
"enable"Enable Forward Error Correction for egress IPsec traffic.
fec-ingressoption
Enable/disable Forward Error Correction for ingress IPsec traffic.
"disable"Disable Forward Error Correction for ingress IPsec traffic.
"enable"Enable Forward Error Correction for ingress IPsec traffic.
fec-receive-timeoutunsigned int32
Timeout in milliseconds before dropping Forward Error Correction packets (1 - 10000).
fec-redundantunsigned int32
Number of redundant Forward Error Correction packets (0 - 100, when fec-codec is reed-solomon or 1 when fec-codec is xor .
fec-send-timeoutunsigned int32
Timeout in milliseconds before sending Forward Error Correction packets (1 - 1000).
forticlient-enforcementoption
Enable/disable FortiClient enforcement.
"disable"Disable FortiClient enforcement.
"enable"Enable FortiClient enforcement.
fragmentationoption
Enable/disable fragment IKE message on re-transmission.
"disable"Disable intra-IKE fragmentation support.
"enable"Enable intra-IKE fragmentation support on re-transmission.
fragmentation-mtuunsigned int32
IKE fragmentation MTU (500 - 16000).
group-authenticationoption
Enable/disable IKEv2 IDi group authentication.
"disable"Disable IKEv2 IDi group authentication.
"enable"Enable IKEv2 IDi group authentication.
group-authentication-secretpassword
Password for IKEv2 IDi group authentication. (ASCII string or hexadecimal indicated by a leading 0x.)
ha-sync-esp-seqnooption
Enable/disable sequence number jump ahead for IPsec HA.
"disable"Disable HA syncing of ESP sequence numbers.
"enable"Enable HA syncing of ESP sequence numbers.
idle-timeoutoption
Enable/disable IPsec tunnel idle timeout.
"disable"Disable IPsec tunnel idle timeout.
"enable"Enable IPsec tunnel idle timeout.
idle-timeoutintervalunsigned int32
IPsec tunnel idle timeout in minutes (5 - 43200).
ike-versionoption
IKE protocol version.
"1"Use IKEv1 protocol.
"2"Use IKEv2 protocol.
include-local-lanoption
Enable/disable allow local LAN access on unity clients.
"disable"Disable local LAN access on Unity clients.
"enable"Enable local LAN access on Unity clients.
interfacedatasource, refer to system interface (maximum 1)
Local physical, aggregate, or VLAN outgoing interface.

"disable"IPsec tunnel is not used as a transit gateway for an autoscale instance.
"enable"IPsec tunnel is used as a transit gateway for an autoscale instance.
typeoption
Remote gateway type.
"static"Remote VPN gateway has fixed IP address.

"disable"Disable.
"client"Enable as client.
"pap"Enable as server PAP.

"auto"Enable as server auto.

"31"DH Group 31.
"32"DH Group 32.
digital-signature-authoption
Enable/disable IKEv2 Digital Signature Authentication (RFC 7427).
"disable"Disable IKEv2 Digital Signature Authentication (RFC 7427).
"enable"Enable IKEv2 Digital Signature Authentication (RFC 7427).
distanceunsigned int32
Distance for routes added by IKE (1 - 255).
dns-modeoption
DNS server mode.
"auto"Use default DNS servers.
"manual"Manually configure DNS servers.
domainstring
Instruct unity clients about the default DNS domain.
dpdoption
Dead Peer Detection mode.
"disable"Disable Dead Peer Detection.
"on-idle"Trigger Dead Peer Detection when IPsec is idle.
"on-demand"Trigger Dead Peer Detection when IPsec traffic is sent but no reply is received from the peer.
dpd-retrycountunsigned int32
Number of DPD retry attempts.
dpd-retryintervalint array
DPD retry interval.
eapoption
Enable/disable IKEv2 EAP authentication.
"disable"Disable IKEv2 EAP authentication.
"enable"Enable IKEv2 EAP authentication.
eap-exclude-peergrpdatasource, refer to user peergrp (maximum 1)
Peer group excluded from EAP authentication.
eap-identityoption
IKEv2 EAP peer identity type.
"use-id-payload"Use IKEv2 IDi payload to resolve peer identity.
"send-request"Use EAP identity request to resolve peer identity.
encap-local-gw4IPv4 address
Local IPv4 address of GRE/VXLAN tunnel.
encap-local-gw6IPv6 address
Local IPv6 address of GRE/VXLAN tunnel.
encap-remote-gw4IPv4 address
Remote IPv4 address of GRE/VXLAN tunnel.
encap-remote-gw6IPv6 address
Remote IPv6 address of GRE/VXLAN tunnel.
encapsulationoption
Enable/disable GRE/VXLAN encapsulation.
"none"No additional encapsulation.
"gre"GRE encapsulation.
"vxlan"VXLAN encapsulation.
encapsulation-addressoption
Source for GRE/VXLAN tunnel address.
"ike"Use IKE/IPsec gateway addresses.
"ipv4"Specify separate GRE/VXLAN tunnel address.
"ipv6"Specify separate GRE/VXLAN tunnel address.
enforce-unique-idoption
Enable/disable peer ID uniqueness check.
"disable"Disable peer ID uniqueness enforcement.
"keep-new"Enforce peer ID uniqueness, keep new connection if collision found.
"keep-old"Enforce peer ID uniqueness, keep old connection if collision found.
esnoption
Extended sequence number (ESN) negotiation.
"disable"Disable extended sequence number.
"require"Require extended sequence number.
"allow"Allow extended sequence number.
exchange-interface-ipoption
Enable/disable exchange of IPsec interface IP address.
"disable"Disable exchange of IPsec interface IP address.
"enable"Enable exchange of IPsec interface IP address.
exchange-ip-addr4IPv4 address
IPv4 address to exchange with peers.
exchange-ip-addr6IPv6 address
IPv6 address to exchange with peers
fec-baseunsigned int32
Number of base Forward Error Correction packets (1 - 100).
fec-egressoption
Enable/disable Forward Error Correction for egress IPsec traffic.
"disable"Disable Forward Error Correction for egress IPsec traffic.
"enable"Enable Forward Error Correction for egress IPsec traffic.
fec-ingressoption
Enable/disable Forward Error Correction for ingress IPsec traffic.
"disable"Disable Forward Error Correction for ingress IPsec traffic.
"enable"Enable Forward Error Correction for ingress IPsec traffic.
fec-receive-timeoutunsigned int32
Timeout in milliseconds before dropping Forward Error Correction packets (1 - 10000).
fec-redundantunsigned int32
Number of redundant Forward Error Correction packets (0 - 100, when fec-codec is reed-solomon or 1 when fec-codec is xor .
fec-send-timeoutunsigned int32
Timeout in milliseconds before sending Forward Error Correction packets (1 - 1000).
forticlient-enforcementoption
Enable/disable FortiClient enforcement.
"disable"Disable FortiClient enforcement.
"enable"Enable FortiClient enforcement.
fragmentationoption
Enable/disable fragment IKE message on re-transmission.
"disable"Disable intra-IKE fragmentation support.
"enable"Enable intra-IKE fragmentation support on re-transmission.
fragmentation-mtuunsigned int32
IKE fragmentation MTU (500 - 16000).
group-authenticationoption
Enable/disable IKEv2 IDi group authentication.
"disable"Disable IKEv2 IDi group authentication.
"enable"Enable IKEv2 IDi group authentication.
group-authentication-secretpassword
Password for IKEv2 IDi group authentication. (ASCII string or hexadecimal indicated by a leading 0x.)
ha-sync-esp-seqnooption
Enable/disable sequence number jump ahead for IPsec HA.
"disable"Disable HA syncing of ESP sequence numbers.
"enable"Enable HA syncing of ESP sequence numbers.
idle-timeoutoption
Enable/disable IPsec tunnel idle timeout.
"disable"Disable IPsec tunnel idle timeout.
"enable"Enable IPsec tunnel idle timeout.
idle-timeoutintervalunsigned int32
IPsec tunnel idle timeout in minutes (5 - 43200).
ike-versionoption
IKE protocol version.
"1"Use IKEv1 protocol.
"2"Use IKEv2 protocol.
include-local-lanoption
Enable/disable allow local LAN access on unity clients.
"disable"Disable local LAN access on Unity clients.
"enable"Enable local LAN access on Unity clients.
interfacedatasource, refer to system interface (maximum 1)
Local physical, aggregate, or VLAN outgoing interface.
ip-fragmentationoption
Determine whether IP packets are fragmented before or after IPsec encapsulation.
"pre-encapsulation"Fragment before IPsec encapsulation.
"post-encapsulation"Fragment after IPsec encapsulation (RFC compliant).
ip-versionoption
IP version to use for VPN interface.
"4"Use IPv4 addressing for gateways.
"6"Use IPv6 addressing for gateways.
ipv4-dns-server1IPv4 address
IPv4 DNS server 1.
ipv4-dns-server2IPv4 address
IPv4 DNS server 2.
ipv4-dns-server3IPv4 address
IPv4 DNS server 3.
ipv4-end-ipIPv4 address
End of IPv4 range.
ipv4-exclude-rangetable
ipv4-namedatasource, refer to firewall address, or firewall addrgrp (maximum 1)
IPv4 address name.
ipv4-netmaskIPv4 mask
IPv4 Netmask.
ipv4-split-excludedatasource, refer to firewall address, or firewall addrgrp (maximum 1)
IPv4 subnets that should not be sent over the IPsec tunnel.
ipv4-split-includedatasource, refer to firewall addrgrp, or firewall address (maximum 1)
IPv4 split-include subnets.
ipv4-start-ipIPv4 address
Start of IPv4 range.
ipv4-wins-server1IPv4 address
WINS server 1.
ipv4-wins-server2IPv4 address
WINS server 2.

IPv6 DNS server 1.

IPv6 DNS server 3.
ipv6-end-ipIPv6 address
End of IPv6 range.
ipv6-exclude-rangetable
ipv6-namedatasource, refer to firewall address6, or firewall addrgrp6 (maximum 1)
IPv6 address name.
ipv6-prefixunsigned int32
IPv6 prefix.
ipv6-split-excludedatasource, refer to firewall address6, or firewall addrgrp6 (maximum 1)
IPv6 subnets that should not be sent over the IPsec tunnel.
ipv6-split-includedatasource, refer to firewall address6, or firewall addrgrp6 (maximum 1)
IPv6 split-include subnets.
ipv6-start-ipIPv6 address
Start of IPv6 range.
keepaliveunsigned int32
NAT-T keep alive interval.
keylifeunsigned int32
Time to wait in seconds before phase 1 encryption key expires.
local-gwIPv4 address
IPv4 address of the local gateway's external interface.
local-gw6IPv6 address
IPv6 address of the local gateway's external interface.
localidstring
Local ID.
localid-typeoption
Local ID type.
"auto"Select ID type automatically.
"fqdn"Use fully qualified domain name.
"user-fqdn"Use user fully qualified domain name.
"keyid"Use key-id string.
"address"Use local IP address.
"asn1dn"Use ASN.1 distinguished name.
mesh-selector-typeoption
Add selectors containing subsets of the configuration depending on traffic.
"disable"Disable.
"subnet"Enable addition of matching subnet selector.
"host"Enable addition of host to host selector.
modeoption
The ID protection mode used to establish a secure channel.
"main"Main mode.
"aggressive"Aggressive mode.
mode-cfgoption
Enable/disable configuration method.
"disable"Disable Configuration Method.
"enable"Enable Configuration Method.
monitordatasource, refer to vpn ipsec phase1-interface (maximum 1)
IPsec interface as backup for primary interface.
monitor-hold-down-delayunsigned int32
Time to wait in seconds before recovery once primary re-establishes.
monitor-hold-down-timestring
Time of day at which to fail back to primary after it re-establishes.
monitor-hold-down-typeoption
Recovery time method when primary interface re-establishes.
"immediate"Fail back immediately after primary recovers.
"delay"Number of seconds to delay fail back after primary recovers.
"time"Specify a time at which to fail back after primary recovers.
monitor-hold-down-weekdayoption
Day of the week to recover once primary re-establishes.
"sunday"Sunday.
"monday"Monday.
"tuesday"Tuesday.
"wednesday"Wednesday.
"thursday"Thursday.
"friday"Friday.
"saturday"Saturday.
"everyday"Every Day.
namestring, master key
IPsec remote gateway name.
nattraversaloption
Enable/disable NAT traversal.
"disable"Disable IPsec NAT traversal.
"enable"Enable IPsec NAT traversal.
"forced"Force IPsec NAT traversal on.
negotiate-timeoutunsigned int32
IKE SA negotiation timeout in seconds (1 - 300).
net-deviceoption
Enable/disable kernel device creation.
"disable"Do not create a kernel device for tunnels.
"enable"Create a kernel device for every tunnel.
network-idunsigned int32
VPN gateway network ID.
network-overlayoption
Enable/disable network overlays.
"enable"Enable network overlays.
"disable"Disable network overlays.
npu-offloadoption
Enable/disable offloading NPU.
"disable"Disable NPU offloading.
"enable"Enable NPU offloading.
passive-modeoption
Enable/disable IPsec passive mode for static tunnels.
"disable"Disable IPsec passive mode.
"enable"Enable IPsec passive mode.
peerdatasource, refer to user peer (maximum 1)
Accept this peer certificate.
peergrpdatasource, refer to user peergrp (maximum 1)
Accept this peer certificate group.
peeridstring
Accept this peer identity.
peertypeoption
Accept this peer type.
"any"Accept any peer ID.
"one"Accept this peer ID.
"dialup"Accept peer ID in dialup group.
"peer"Accept this peer certificate.
"peergrp"Accept this peer certificate group.
ppkoption
Enable/disable IKEv2 Postquantum Preshared Key (PPK).
"disable"Disable use of IKEv2 Postquantum Preshared Key (PPK).
"allow"Allow, but do not require, use of IKEv2 Postquantum Preshared Key (PPK).
"require"Require use of IKEv2 Postquantum Preshared Key (PPK).
ppk-identitystring
IKEv2 Postquantum Preshared Key Identity.
ppk-secretpassword
IKEv2 Postquantum Preshared Key (ASCII string or hexadecimal encoded with a leading 0x).
priorityunsigned int32

proposaloption

Enable/disable re-authentication upon IKE SA lifetime expiration.
"disable"Disable IKE SA re-authentication.
"enable"Enable IKE SA re-authentication.
rekeyoption

"disable"Disable phase1 rekey.
"enable"Enable phase1 rekey.

Digital Signature Authentication RSA signature format.
"pkcs1"RSASSA PKCS#1 v1.5.
"pss"RSASSA Probabilistic Signature Scheme (PSS).

"enable"Enable saving XAuth username and password on VPN clients.

"disable"Disable sending certificate chain.
"enable"Enable sending certificate chain.

"sha2-256"SHA2-256.
"sha2-384"SHA2-384.
"sha2-512"SHA2-512.
split-include-servicedatasource, refer to firewall service custom, or firewall service group (maximum 1)

suite-boption
Use Suite-B.
"disable"Do not use UI suite.
"suite-b-gcm-128"Use Suite-B-GCM-128.
"suite-b-gcm-256"Use Suite-B-GCM-256.
transit-gatewayoption
IPsec tunnel created by autoscaling to be used as a transit gateway.
"disable"IPsec tunnel is not used as a transit gateway for an autoscale instance.
"enable"IPsec tunnel is used as a transit gateway for an autoscale instance.
tunnel-searchoption
Tunnel search method for when the interface is shared.
"selectors"Search for tunnel in selectors.
"nexthop"Search for tunnel using nexthop.
typeoption
Remote gateway type.
"static"Remote VPN gateway has fixed IP address.
"dynamic"Remote VPN gateway has dynamic IP address.
"ddns"Remote VPN gateway has dynamic IP address and is a dynamic DNS client.
unity-supportoption
Enable/disable support for Cisco UNITY Configuration Method extensions.
"disable"Disable Cisco Unity Configuration Method Extensions.
"enable"Enable Cisco Unity Configuration Method Extensions.
usrgrpdatasource, refer to user group (maximum 1)
User group name for dialup peers.
vniunsigned int32
VNI of VXLAN tunnel.
wizard-typeoption
GUI VPN Wizard Type.
"custom"Custom VPN configuration.
"dialup-forticlient"Dial Up - FortiClient Windows, Mac and Android.
"dialup-ios"Dial Up - iPhone / iPad Native IPsec Client.
"dialup-android"Dial Up - Android Native IPsec Client.
"dialup-cisco"Dial Up - Cisco IPsec Client.
"static-fortigate"Site to Site - FortiGate.
"static-cisco"Site to Site - Cisco.
"dialup-windows"Dial Up - Windows Native IPsec Client.
"dialup-fortigate"Dial Up - FortiGate.
"dialup-cisco-fw"Dialup Up - Cisco Firewall.
"simplified-static-fortigate"Site to Site - FortiGate (SD-WAN).
"hub-fortigate-auto-discovery"Hub role in a Hub-and-Spoke auto-discovery VPN.
"spoke-fortigate-auto-discovery"Spoke role in a Hub-and-Spoke auto-discovery VPN.
xauthtypeoption
XAuth type.
"disable"Disable.
"client"Enable as client.
"pap"Enable as server PAP.
"chap"Enable as server CHAP.
"auto"Enable as server auto.

 

vpn/ipsec/phase1-interface/ipv4-exclude-range (table)

Configuration Method IPv4 exclude ranges.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/vpn/ipsec/phase1-interface/<phase1-interface_name>/ipv4-exclude-range
Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/vpn/ipsec/phase1-interface/<phase1-interface_name>/ipv4-exclude-range/<ipv4-exclude-range_id>
Attribute ListDescriptions
end-ipIPv4 address
End of IPv4 exclusive range.
idsequence, master key
ID.
start-ipIPv4 address
Start of IPv4 exclusive range.

Object URL:

Object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/vpn/ipsec/phase1-interface/<phase1-interface_name>/ipv6-exclude-range/<ipv6-exclude-range_id>
Attribute ListDescriptions

End of IPv6 exclusive range.
idsequence, master key
ID.
start-ipIPv6 address
Start of IPv6 exclusive range.

Configure VPN autokey tunnel.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/vpn/ipsec/phase2

Attribute ListDescriptions
add-routeoption
Enable/disable automatic route addition.
"disable"Do not add route for remote proxy ID.
"enable"Add route for remote proxy ID.
"phase1"Add route according to phase1 add-route setting.
auto-negotiateoption
Enable/disable IPsec SA auto-negotiation.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
commentsstring
Comment.

Enable/disable DHCP-IPsec.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.

"enable"Enable setting.

"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
route-overlapoption
Action for overlapping routes.
"use-old"Use the old route and do not add the new route.
"use-new"Delete the old route and add the new route.
"allow"Allow overlapping routes.
selector-matchoption
Match type to use when comparing selectors.
"auto"Use subset or exact match depending on selector address type.
"subset"Match selectors by subset.
"exact"Match selectors exactly.
single-sourceoption

"disable"Source IP range will be accepted.
"enable"Only single source IP will be accepted.

use-natipoption
Enable to use the FortiGate public IP as the source selector when outbound NAT is used.
"disable"Do not modify source selector when using outbound NAT.
"enable"Replace source selector with interface IP when using outbound NAT.

 

vpn/ipsec/phase2-interface (table)

Configure VPN autokey tunnel.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/vpn/ipsec/phase2-interface

dst-addr-typeoption
Remote proxy ID type.
"subnet"IPv4 subnet.
"range"IPv4 range.
"ip"IPv4 IP.
"name"IPv4 firewall address or group name.
"subnet6"IPv6 subnet.
"range6"IPv6 range.
"ip6"IPv6 IP.
"name6"IPv6 firewall address or group name.
dst-end-ipIPv4 address
Remote proxy ID IPv4 end.
dst-end-ip6IPv6 address
Remote proxy ID IPv6 end.
dst-namedatasource, refer to firewall addrgrp, or firewall address (maximum 1)
Remote proxy ID name.
dst-name6datasource, refer to firewall address6, or firewall addrgrp6 (maximum 1)
Remote proxy ID name.
dst-portunsigned int32
Quick mode destination port (1 - 65535 or 0 for all).
dst-start-ipIPv4 address
Remote proxy ID IPv4 start.
dst-start-ip6IPv6 address
Remote proxy ID IPv6 start.
dst-subnetIPv4 address/mask
Remote proxy ID IPv4 subnet.
dst-subnet6IPv6 prefix
Remote proxy ID IPv6 subnet.
encapsulationoption
ESP encapsulation mode.
"tunnel-mode"Use tunnel mode encapsulation.
"transport-mode"Use transport mode encapsulation.
ipv4-dfoption
Enable/disable setting and resetting of IPv4 'Don't Fragment' bit.
"disable"Reset IPv4 DF.
"enable"Set IPv4 DF.
keepaliveoption
Enable/disable keep alive.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
keylife-typeoption
Keylife type.
"seconds"Key life in seconds.
"kbs"Key life in kilobytes.
"both"Key life both.
keylifekbsunsigned int32
Phase2 key life in number of kilobytes of traffic (5120 - 4294967295).
keylifesecondsunsigned int32
Phase2 key life in time in seconds (120 - 172800).
l2tpoption
Enable/disable L2TP over IPsec.
"disable"Disable L2TP over IPsec.
"enable"Enable L2TP over IPsec.
namestring, master key
IPsec tunnel name.
pfsoption
Enable/disable PFS feature.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
phase1namedatasource, refer to vpn ipsec phase1-interface (maximum 1)
Phase 1 determines the options required for phase 2.
proposaloption
Phase2 proposal.
"null-md5"
"null-sha1"
"des-null"
"3des-null"
"des-md5"
"des-sha1"
"3des-md5"
"3des-sha1"
"aes128-md5"
"aes128-sha1"
"aes192-md5"
"aes192-sha1"
"aes256-md5"
"aes256-sha1"
"aes128-null"
"aes192-null"
"aes256-null"
"null-sha256"
"des-sha256"
"3des-sha256"
"aes128-sha256"
"aes192-sha256"
"aes256-sha256"
"des-sha384"
"des-sha512"
"3des-sha384"
"3des-sha512"
"aes128-sha384"
"aes128-sha512"
"aes192-sha384"
"aes192-sha512"
"aes256-sha384"
"aes256-sha512"
"null-sha384"
"null-sha512"
"aria128-null"
"aria128-md5"
"aria128-sha1"
"aria128-sha256"
"aria128-sha384"
"aria128-sha512"
"aria192-null"
"aria192-md5"
"aria192-sha1"
"aria192-sha256"
"aria192-sha384"
"aria192-sha512"
"aria256-null"
"aria256-md5"
"aria256-sha1"
"aria256-sha256"
"aria256-sha384"
"aria256-sha512"

"seed-md5"
"seed-sha1"
"seed-sha256"
"seed-sha384"
"seed-sha512"
"aes128gcm"
"aes256gcm"
"chacha20poly1305"
protocolunsigned int32
Quick mode protocol selector (1 - 255 or 0 for all).
replayoption
Enable/disable replay detection.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
route-overlapoption
Action for overlapping routes.
"use-old"Use the old route and do not add the new route.
"use-new"Delete the old route and add the new route.
"allow"Allow overlapping routes.
single-sourceoption
Enable/disable single source IP restriction.
"disable"Source IP range will be accepted.
"enable"Only single source IP will be accepted.
src-addr-typeoption
Local proxy ID type.
"subnet"IPv4 subnet.
"range"IPv4 range.
"ip"IPv4 IP.
"name"IPv4 firewall address or group name.
"subnet6"IPv6 subnet.
"range6"IPv6 range.
"ip6"IPv6 IP.
"name6"IPv6 firewall address or group name.
src-end-ipIPv4 address
Local proxy ID end.
src-end-ip6IPv6 address
Local proxy ID IPv6 end.
src-namedatasource, refer to firewall addrgrp, or firewall address (maximum 1)
Local proxy ID name.
src-name6datasource, refer to firewall address6, or firewall addrgrp6 (maximum 1)

src-portunsigned int32

Local proxy ID start.

Local proxy ID IPv6 start.

Attribute ListDescriptions

"disable"Disable compress
"enable"Enable compress

End IP.

Enable/disable IPsec enforcement.
"disable"Disable enforce-ipsec
"enable"Enable enforce-ipsec

lcp-max-echo-failsunsigned int32
Maximum number of missed LCP echo messages before disconnect.

Start IP.
statusoption

"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.

vpn/ocvpn (object)

Configure Overlay Controller VPN settings.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Table object/pm/config/device/<device_name>/vdom/<vdom_name>/vpn/ocvpn
Attribute ListDescriptions

"disable"Disable ADVPN auto-discovery shortcuts.
"enable"Enable ADVPN auto-discovery shortcuts.

Enable/disable EAP client authentication.
"disable"Disable EAP client authentication.
"enable"Enable EAP client authentication.

forticlient-accessobject

Enable/disable multipath redundancy.
"disable"Disable multipath redundancy.
"enable"Enable multipath redundancy.

Enable/disable inter-overlay source NAT.
"disable"Disable inter-overlay source NAT.
"enable"Enable inter-overlay source NAT.

poll-intervalunsigned int32

"secondary-hub"Register device as secondary hub.

statusoption

"disable"Disable Overlay Controller VPN.
"enable"Enable Overlay Controller VPN.
wan-interfacedatasource, refer to system interface (maximum 256)
